target: Одолеть <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>

target: Прогресс миссии

target: Стартовая точка

target: Отмена

target: Появился выход.

source: guildhest
target: гильдхест

source: Cultist rosary
target: Чётки культиста

source: Cultist orbs destroyed
target: Сфера культистов уничтожена

source: Sealed barrier broken
target: Запечатанный барьер разрушен

source: You seem surprised. Did you not cross our gates in search of blood?
target: Вы удивлены. Но не вы ли прошли чрез наши врата в поисках крови?

source: Come hither, children of the dawn. The undying master will drink deep tonight!
target: Сюда, дети рассвета. Бессмертный господин изопьёт из ваших душ!

source: Tiny Keys
target: Маленькие ключи

source: Find the bloody parchment
target: Найдите кровавый пергамент

source: Find the green key
target: Найдите зелёный ключ

source: Find the yellow key
target: Найдите желтый ключ

source: Photocells
target: Фотоэлемент

source: Activate confession chamber terminal
target: Активируйте терминал палат исповеди

source: Open the abacination chamber door
target: Откройте дверь комнаты ослепления

source: Activate the Fool's Rest terminal
target: Активируйте терминал в Покое Дурака

source: The guildhest is complete! Come and collect your reward.
target: Гильдхест выполнен! Заберите свою награду.

source: Eliminate all targets.
target: Устраните все цели.

source: Slay <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
target: Сразите <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.

source: Capture <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.
target: Поймайте <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>.

source: Escort <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> to the specified location.
target: Сопроводите <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> до указанной локации.

source: A fine display! Now come, collect your reward.
target: Прекрасное зрелище! А теперь, заберите свою награду.

source:
Done, are we?
Then haul your bloody arses over here so's we can leave this awful place!
target:
Мы закончили?
Тогда несите свои задницы сюда чтобы мы как можно быстрее ушли из этого ужасного места!

source: That was...adequate. Back to me, adventurer.
target: Достаточно. Возвращайтесь ко мне, авантюристы.

source: You've a knack for this, haven't you? 'Twas as if I were watching myself, ten summers past!
target: А у тебя талант, не так ли? Как будто я смотрю на себя молодого!

source: Defeat one enemy group at a time.
target: Одолейте по одной группе врагов за раз.

source: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
target: Если <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> заметит тебя, он отдаст приказ на атаку всем остальным. Избегайте его поле зрения и разбирайтесь по одному миньону за раз.

source: If <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> spots you, he will order all remaining targets to attack. Stay out of his line of sight and tackle his minions one at a time.
target: Если <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> заметит тебя, он отдаст приказ на атаку всем остальным. Избегайте его поле зрения и разбирайтесь по одному миньону за раз.

source: Steady there! Only a fool with a death wish would engage both parties at once!
target: Не гони коней! Только самоубийца нападет сразу на обе группы!

source: Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.
target: Don't be so bloody eager to march headlong into peril! Try luring the beasts away from the goobbue without alarming the mossy lout.

source: Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!
target: Executed to perfection! Now put the seedkin down!

source: The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!
target: The goobbue has seen you and alerted his scrags! Slay as many as you can before jumpin' in bed with the giant, or you won't survive another bell!

source: Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!
target: Get up! You won't do your allies any good lying sprawled across the grass like a beached whale!

source: What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!
target: What in the seven hells are you fools doing!? Fall back and regroup!

source: Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.
target: Might be I was mistaken about you all. I'd say your chances of victory are a notch above dismal.

source: You've come this far, now finish him!
target: You've come this far, now finish him!

source: When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!
target: When threatened, <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> will summon reinforcements. Stay alert!

source: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
target: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.

source: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.
target: Beware of <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s new weaponskill.

source: The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.
target: The stronger of your allies would be wise to draw the enemy's attention away from the weaker.

source: Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.
target: Those allies specialized in dealing damage will find their attacks more effective when dealt from the enemy's flank or rear.

source: Reinforcements! Move to intercept!
target: Reinforcements! Move to intercept!

source: Another wave! But unlike the last!
target: Another wave! But unlike the last!

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.
target: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var> to open the first gate.

source: Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.
target: Defeat the enemies and use the lever to open the gate.

source: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.
target: Defeat <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> before the yarzons break free.

source: Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.
target: Behind you! Slay the lesser enemies before concentrating your efforts on the true threat.

source: Pull the lever and open the gate!
target: Pull the lever and open the gate!

source: Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!
target: Quickly! Those boulders will not hold the yarzons back for long!

source: There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.
target: There to the left of the gate! A second swarm of yarzons has appeared! Hurry and fell the gigantoad or you will have the vilekin to deal with, as well.

source: A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.
target: A swarm of yarzons has broken through! Your attention is best focused on clearing away the six-legged vilekin before returning to the gigantoad.

source: A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!
target: A second swarm approaches quickly! Ready yourselves!

source: A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!
target: A superb display of strength and speed! Well done!

source: The boulders are beginning to crack!
target: The boulders are beginning to crack!

source: The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!
target: The boulders will crumble at any moment, allowing the yarzons entry!

source: Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.
target: Now pull the lever to open the gate...but only when you are ready for what waits on the other side.

source: My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.
target: My orders are to aid you to victory. You only make it harder on yourselves by disregarding them.

source: Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.
target: Now that those two are out of the way, concentrate your efforts on the hog.

source: Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.
target: Something tells me there will be more if you cannot make swift work of that toad.

source: The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.
target: The first gate is open! Tend to your wounds before advancing to the second.

source: The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.
target: The second gate is open! One more, and you will have breached the gigantoad's lair.

source: The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!
target: The third gate has fallen! The lord of the lair awaits beyond!

source: The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.
target: The safety mechanism on the gate will deactivate once all threats in the area have been removed.

source: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.
target: <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020302 /var>)) /var> will attempt to heal <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>.

source: Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.
target: Use fire sprite cores to light the herb patch and release slumber-inducing smoke into the air.

source: Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.
target: Your orders are to capture the gil turtle. The best manner in which to accomplish this task is by first weakening the poor creature.

source: The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.
target: The craven bandits who spirited away the turtle would not have you reclaim their prize, and will heal the creature's wounds with hopes that their efforts will discourage you into leaving. Draw the turtle away from the conjurers.

source: In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!
target: In its current weakened state, the gil turtle will be unable to resist the effects of the herbs. Now quickly! We require fire sprite cores!

source: Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.
target: Use the core to light the herb patch lying before me.

source: The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!
target: The herbs are aflame! Now do what you must to draw the gil turtle into the smoke!

source: And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.
target: And so the gentle giant succumbs to slumber's blissful embrace. Our work here is complete.

source: Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.
target: Those efts may prove troublesome if left alone. Slay the wavekin before the situation becomes problematic.

source: Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!
target: Out of cores? Well then claim new ones! You'd think that much was obvious!

source:
Stay your blades!
The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!
target:
Stay your blades!
The client specifically stated that he wished his pet returned alive!

source: You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!
target: You blundering half-wits! Now what are we to tell Lord Adeledji!

source: The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.
target: The smoke will have little effect on the turtle while in his current condition.

source: Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.
target: Releasing the smoke now would be useless. I shall tend to the herbs while you see to the gil turtle.

source: Fire sprite cores
target: Fire sprite cores

source: Silence those bandits!
target: Silence those bandits!

source: Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.
target: Lure enemies away from the ruptured pollen clusters before engaging them.

source: Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.
target: Stay clear of the ruptured pollen clusters when engaging enemies.

source: If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.
target: If inhaled the pollen will set fire to your lungs and sap your strength. Draw the creatures a safe distance from the noisome mist and then engage.

source: Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.
target: Do not let down your guard. The battle has only just begun.

source: It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.
target: It may take some coercing to draw that one from the mist.

source: Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!
target: Leave the mist at once! You will need all your strength to defeat these horrors of the wood!

source: Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!
target: Maneuver clear of the raining pollen clusters lest you find yourself caught in their mist!

source: The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!
target: The wind! It carries away the mist! The Matron smiles upon us!

source: The mist, it returns!
target: The mist, it returns!

source:
The creature has left the pollen mist!
Now is your chance! Strike it down!
target:
The creature has left the pollen mist!
Now is your chance! Strike it down!

source: Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!
target: Your foe weakens with every blow you land! Do not let up!

source: Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!
target: Yes! I do believe you have him! It won't be much longer now!

source: Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.
target: Defeat the roaming bandits before engaging the stationary targets.

source: Beware of reinforcements.
target: Beware of reinforcements.

source: Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.
target: Prevent the conjurers from healing their wounded companions.

source: Redbellies! To me!
target: Redbellies! To me!

source: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
target: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!

source: Where are all my men!?
target: Where are all my men!?

source: Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.
target: Ware the scouts, for they will alert their brethren of your presence.

source: The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!
target: The swarmpoint has summoned reinforcements! Locate them immediately!

source: Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.
target: Their conjurers will spell your end. Silence the casters so that there are none who might heal the swarmpoint.

source: Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.
target: Keep your eyes open for roaming bandits who will join the fray! Remember this when situating your battles.

source: Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.
target: Without their conjurers to heal them, you should make quick work of the others.

source: The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.
target: The swarmpoint is known for his unmatchable strength. Send your hardiest allies to bear the brunt of his might while the others slowly drain his vitality.

source:
Reinforcements!
See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.
target:
Reinforcements!
See to the conjurers before your efforts are rendered to naught.

source: Another unit! You know what you must do!
target: Another unit! You know what you must do!

source: Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!
target: Not all their spellweavers are masters of the curative arts. Learn to distinguish the healers from the rest!

source: Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!
target: Lo! There is a conjurer in your midst! Find the cur and slay him!

source: Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.
target: Use the guild-issue items to your advantage.

source: Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.
target: Take care not to succumb to the enfeebling effects of the charmed creatures' attacks.

source: Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.
target: Beware the enfeebling properties of Briaxio's attacks.

source: Reinforcements called
target: Reinforcements called

source: Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.
target: Beware! The foul poisons of these creatures will disrupt your humours and send your body into fits.

source: Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.
target: Do not let the poisons overwhelm you! Use the time between battles to purge the toxins from your veins.

source: Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!
target: Confirm that each of your allies knows his role. One misstep could mean a man poisoned, paralyzed...or worse!

source: Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.
target: Use the spell Esuna to your advantage! And if that fails you, a good old antidote will often do the trick.

source: Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!
target: Without an ally to draw his magicks away from the others, Briaxio will unleash his bane on all of you!

source: Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.
target: Briaxio's followers have rushed to his aid! Send several of your allies to drive off the reinforcements while those remaining keep Briaxio under control.

source: Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.
target: Destroy the goblins' makeshift barricades and continue up the Matron's Lethe.

source: Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.
target: Avoid Stikflix Grumblytoss's bombs.

source: The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.
target: The goblins hide behind their barricades. You must destroy these obstacles to reach them. However, be always aware of their bombs.

source: The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.
target: The bombs wielded by Stikflix Grumblytoss are much deadlier and have a greater blast radius than those used by his ragtag army.

source: Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!
target: Remember your roles within the party and communicate with your allies. Those are the keys to victory!

source: If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.
target: If a bomb is tossed your way, do not panic. Simply retreat until it detonates and then return to the front lines.

source: I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!
target: I shall give the goblins credit where credit is due. It must have taken them a half-turn of the sun to drag these crates into place... Now demolish them!

source: The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!
target: The first station is toppled, but another lies near the top of the heavenspillar. Forward, adventurers!

source: The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!
target: The goblins' leader, Stikflix Grumblytoss, awaits ahead! Give him no quarter!

source: Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.
target: Stikflix Grumblytoss may not appear to be the most formidable of foes, but his realm-shaking explosives make him a force to be reckoned with. If one happens to land in your vicinity, you would take my advice and run.

source: Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.
target: Rotten jam will emerge from the stale bubbles if ignored. Burst them before they burst on their own.

source: When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.
target: When burst, acid bubbles will emit a harmful, corrosive liquid. Avoid attacking them at all costs.

source: Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!
target: Rotten jam! That's why I warned you to burst the stale bubbles. Now you have that <var 1A 02 /var>thing<var 1A 01 /var> to deal with!

source: That wasn't so hard now, was it?
target: That wasn't so hard now, was it?

source:
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!?
See to the bubbles afore they see to you!
target:
What did the damn morbol do, pass wind!?
See to the bubbles afore they see to you!

source:
I reckon you've done this before.
That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.
target:
I reckon you've done this before.
That was some proper combat, if I do say so meself.

source: What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?
target: What are you fixing to do? Get us all killed?

source: Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?
target: Not another! Just the smell alone is enough to make a man retch! Do away with the thing, would you?

source: The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!
target: The stale bubbles, not the acid bubbles, you mud-brained dullard!

source: Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!
target: Send the damned thing back to the hell it slithered up from!

source: Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!
target: Good eyes, adventurers! Good eyes!

source: Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.
target: Not the most pleasant buggers to fight, are they? Maybe next time you'll heed me words and burst the bubbles first.

source: See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!
target: See the bastard's vines start to twitch? The creature grows weak!

source: Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.
target: Leave them stale bubbles be, and from them'll drop a dollop of rancid ooze almost as foul as me ma's gruel. If you don't want to see that happen, burst the bubbles quick.

source: Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.
target: Buso draws his strength from the blue flames. Extinguish the flames to make him more susceptible to your attacks.

source: A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.
target: A new blue flame will appear where <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var> is slain. Choose your battles.

source: If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.
target: If you are branded with Buso's Mark of Pain, distance yourself from your allies so that they are not caught in the Dark Dome.

source: Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...
target: Those horrible blue flames─they're the aetherial traces of slain voidsent. Our Lifestream won't have the stuff, so the essence remains trapped in the corporeal realm. Buso taps that essence...

source: You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.
target: You cannot slay a void hound without it leaving behind a flame. If you are to cull the beasts, be ready to deal swiftly with the consequences of your actions.

source: Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!
target: Buso readies the Mark of Pain! Once marked, you cannot escape the fate you are dealt...but you can spare your allies!

source:
Go! Smother the blue flames!
It's the only way to see Buso weakened!
target:
Go! Smother the blue flames!
It's the only way to see Buso weakened!

source:
Damn! Another blue flame is lit!
Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!
target:
Damn! Another blue flame is lit!
Buso grows stronger every moment he basks in its unholy light!

source:
Rise up, adventurer!
This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!
target:
Rise up, adventurer!
This battle is not yet lost! Remember the blue flames!

source: Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!
target: Only one flame remains! Quickly! See it out!

source:
Now is your chance!
Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!
target:
Now is your chance!
Tear the fiend limb from limb...from limb from limb!

source: Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!
target: Buso seeks to mark those allies who douse his flames!

source:
One of you has been marked!
For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!
target:
One of you has been marked!
For Twelve's sake and the sake of the others, run!

source: Thrust him back into the void!
target: Thrust him back into the void!

source: Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!
target: Draw Buso away from the blue flames before extinguishing them!

source: Meet a Longstop ally
target: Meet a Longstop ally

source: Access Brayflox's Runstop
target: Access Brayflox's Runstop

source: Access Mudstop Watergush
target: Access Mudstop Watergush

source: Arrive in the heart of the Longstop
target: Arrive in the heart of the Longstop

source: Clear the Hall of the Cesti
target: Clear the Hall of the Cesti

source: Activate the chain winches
target: Activate the chain winches

source: Clear the Hall of the Secutores
target: Clear the Hall of the Secutores

source: Defeat Tangata
target: Defeat Tangata

source: Activate the coral trigger
target: Выберите правильный коралл

source: Open the hidden door
target: Откройте потайную дверь

source: Discover the pirate captain
target: Отыщите капитана пиратов

source: Obtain the Waverider Gate key
target: Заполучите ключ от Врат наездников

source: Watch carefully. Order can be discovered in the shadows' movements, if you would but seek it.
target: Watch carefully. Order can be discovered in the shadows' movements, if you would but seek it.

source: You are doing well. The beast weakens.
target: You are doing well. The beast weakens.

source: There is little life left in this one, but do not let down your guard. The battle is far from over.
target: There is little life left in this one, but do not let down your guard. The battle is far from over.

source: Never before have I seen such mastery of the battlefield. You have far exceeded my expectations, adventurers.
target: Never before have I seen such mastery of the battlefield. You have far exceeded my expectations, adventurers.

source: Watch for <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s order to self-destruct.
target: Watch for <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var>'s order to self-destruct.

source: The servitors will self-destruct once approached. Either strike them from afar, or avoid them altogether.
target: The servitors will self-destruct once approached. Either strike them from afar, or avoid them altogether.

source: All rise for Her Royal Highness! When angered, the queen will order her remaining subjects to self-destruct. Do not get caught in the blast.
target: All rise for Her Royal Highness! When angered, the queen will order her remaining subjects to self-destruct. Do not get caught in the blast.

source: The servitors will not hesitate to self-destruct. Steel your defenses!
target: The servitors will not hesitate to self-destruct. Steel your defenses!

source: Bomb chars are just as quick to burst as the servitors. Fall back!
target: Bomb chars are just as quick to burst as the servitors. Fall back!

source: There! To the rear! The bomb chars advance!
target: There! To the rear! The bomb chars advance!

source: There is no end to the bomb chars. Turn your eyes elsewhere.
target: There is no end to the bomb chars. Turn your eyes elsewhere.

source: He who slumbers is doomed to bear the blast's full force. Silence the slimes, lest you succumb to the flames.
target: He who slumbers is doomed to bear the blast's full force. Silence the slimes, lest you succumb to the flames.

source: The queen's subjects number in the thousands. You cannot dispel them all!
target: The queen's subjects number in the thousands. You cannot dispel them all!

source: The order has been given! Scatter!
target: The order has been given! Scatter!

source: That was but one baronet amongst many. He may have fallen, but another will soon rise to replace him.
target: That was but one baronet amongst many. He may have fallen, but another will soon rise to replace him.

source: Good! The life spills from <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> with every blow!
target: Good! The life spills from <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8020202 /var> with every blow!

source: When the queen falls, her subjects will be overtaken with grief and end their lives. Take care not to join them!
target: When the queen falls, her subjects will be overtaken with grief and end their lives. Take care not to join them!

source: Do not grow overconfident. While one candle gutters, still a hundred bonfires rage.
target: Do not grow overconfident. While one candle gutters, still a hundred bonfires rage.

source: How little the queen's baronets value their own lives. In a sense, they are the perfect subjects.
target: How little the queen's baronets value their own lives. In a sense, they are the perfect subjects.

source: The queen will not step down from her throne so easily.
target: The queen will not step down from her throne so easily.

source: Sound the bells! The queen is dead!
target: Sound the bells! The queen is dead!

source: All five <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020302 /var> must be defeated simultaneously.
target: All five <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 04E8020302 /var> must be defeated simultaneously.

source: Listen carefully if you want to live. <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var> will not stay dead for long. Allow his dark brothers but a moment, and they'll drag the fallen back from the gates of the seventh hell.
target: Listen carefully if you want to live. <var 2B ((<var 31 ((BNpcName)) 02E8020202 /var>)) /var> will not stay dead for long. Allow his dark brothers but a moment, and they'll drag the fallen back from the gates of the seventh hell.

source: Another formation change!
target: Another formation change!

source: Make ready! The camios seek to regroup!
target: Make ready! The camios seek to regroup!

source: They're forming a defensive line!
target: They're forming a defensive line!

source: A circle! The Screaming Circle!
target: A circle! The Screaming Circle!

source: The Wall of Naught! The camios seek a new victim!
target: The Wall of Naught! The camios seek a new victim!

source: The Black Cross renders a single camio invincible. Ignore him and focus your attacks on the rest!
target: The Black Cross renders a single camio invincible. Ignore him and focus your attacks on the rest!

source: The Demon's Sword! The burden on your front line will be great. Healers, do not fail your allies!
target: The Demon's Sword! The burden on your front line will be great. Healers, do not fail your allies!

source: Something rises from the Pit! Do not falter!
target: Something rises from the Pit! Do not falter!

source: Their foul magicks protect him! Your attacks amount to naught!
target: Their foul magicks protect him! Your attacks amount to naught!

source: As long as one cannot be harmed, you will never be able to destroy the lot!
target: As long as one cannot be harmed, you will never be able to destroy the lot!

source: One is down. Quickly! Finish the others!
target: One is down. Quickly! Finish the others!

source: You see? Slaying one is of no use! You must defeat all five at once if the day is to be yours!
target: You see? Slaying one is of no use! You must defeat all five at once if the day is to be yours!

source: The camio draws strength from the Demon's Sword. He will tear your front line apart!
target: The camio draws strength from the Demon's Sword. He will tear your front line apart!

source: Follow the camio's eyes! Draw them away from your spell casters!
target: Follow the camio's eyes! Draw them away from your spell casters!

source: Do not waste your efforts on the one who cannot be harmed!
target: Do not waste your efforts on the one who cannot be harmed!

source: Shields up, front line!
target: Shields up, front line!

source: Rid the playing field of our new guest!
target: Rid the playing field of our new guest!

source: Back to the task at hand, lads!
target: Back to the task at hand, lads!

source: Show them only as much mercy as they would show you! None!
target: Show them only as much mercy as they would show you! None!

source: You've done it! They can no longer escape their dark demesne!
target: You've done it! They can no longer escape their dark demesne!

source: Protect the Allagan artifacts from the quarreling gigants.
target: Protect the Allagan artifacts from the quarreling gigants.

source: Defeat the leaders to prevent the summoning of reinforcements.
target: Defeat the leaders to prevent the summoning of reinforcements.

source: Hurry to the foot of the hill! The artifacts will not protect themselves!
target: Hurry to the foot of the hill! The artifacts will not protect themselves!

source: They're fighting amongst themselves! Let them bloody each other's noses before coming in to wipe up the mess!
target: They're fighting amongst themselves! Let them bloody each other's noses before coming in to wipe up the mess!

source: Small units approach! Keep them off the artifacts!
target: Small units approach! Keep them off the artifacts!

source: Gigants from multiple sides! You'll need to divide your strength if the artifacts are to be saved!
target: Gigants from multiple sides! You'll need to divide your strength if the artifacts are to be saved!

source: The gigas leader, Crius! He will summon his minions if not put to the sword!
target: The gigas leader, Crius! He will summon his minions if not put to the sword!

source: Giants to the east! Stop them before they can make the approach!
target: Giants to the east! Stop them before they can make the approach!

source: Hecatoncheires to the south! Slaying them might just anger their leader onto the battlefield!
target: Hecatoncheires to the south! Slaying them might just anger their leader onto the battlefield!

source: Thal's balls! Both giant <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> hecatoncheir leaders make for the artifacts!
target: Thal's balls! Both giant <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> hecatoncheir leaders make for the artifacts!

source: Damnation! Keep the leaders away from one another! It will only serve to worsen matters!
target: Damnation! Keep the leaders away from one another! It will only serve to worsen matters!

source: The gigants swing their weapons with reckless abandon! Draw them from the artifacts so as to prevent any collateral damage!
target: The gigants swing their weapons with reckless abandon! Draw them from the artifacts so as to prevent any collateral damage!

source: The gigas leader flees! Now is your chance! Run the bastard through!
target: The gigas leader flees! Now is your chance! Run the bastard through!

source: The giant leader falls back... Something is amiss!
target: The giant leader falls back... Something is amiss!

source: That is not the back of a fleeing man! The hecatoncheir leads you into a trap!
target: That is not the back of a fleeing man! The hecatoncheir leads you into a trap!

source: More gigants take the field, and will continue to do so until you have seen their leaders slain!
target: More gigants take the field, and will continue to do so until you have seen their leaders slain!

source: Not a single scratch on any of the artifacts. I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't seen it with mine own eyes!
target: Not a single scratch on any of the artifacts. I wouldn't believe it if I hadn't seen it with mine own eyes!

source: All the artifacts remain! The Sons of Saint Coinach will be pleased!
target: All the artifacts remain! The Sons of Saint Coinach will be pleased!

source: Two artifacts remain standing. See that they are not destroyed!
target: Two artifacts remain standing. See that they are not destroyed!

source: A single artifact remains! You cannot allow it to be lost!
target: A single artifact remains! You cannot allow it to be lost!

source: The leaders have yet to take the field, but could arrive at any moment. Stay alert!
target: The leaders have yet to take the field, but could arrive at any moment. Stay alert!

source: Without an enemy to strike, the gigants have turned their fury on the artifacts!
target: Without an enemy to strike, the gigants have turned their fury on the artifacts!

source: I will suffer none to oppose Lord van Baelsar!
target: Никто не смеет противиться воле лорда ван Бельсара!

source: My shields are impregnable! Join the countless challengers who have dashed themselves against them!
target: Мои щиты неприступны! Множество соперников не смогли их пробить!

source: Your defeat will bring Lord van Baelsar's noble conquest one step closer to fruition!
target: Твое поражение продвинет план лорда ван Бельсара на шаг вперед!

source: Ungh... Though it cost me my life...I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> strike you down!
target: Ух... Пусть это и будет мне стоить жизни... Но я <var 1A 02 /var>сражу<var 1A 01 /var> тебя!

source: Heehee HAHA hahaha HEEHEE haha HEEEEEE!!!
target: Хе-хе-хе ХА-ХА-ХА ха-ха-ха ХЕ-ХЕ-ХЕ-Е-Е-Е!!!

source: Soon you will see the depths of your folly, mortals!
target: Вы обречены, жалкие смертные!

source: THE RECKONING COMES!!!
target: ЧАС РАСПЛАТЫ НАСТАЛ!!!

source: There is no escape! No hope! NONE!!!
target: Не надейтесь спастись! СПАСЕНИЯ НЕТ!!!

source: Die! DIE!!! DIIIIIIEEE!!!
target: Умрите! УМРИТЕ!! УМРИ-И-И-ИТЕ!!!

source: My power... No...
target: Моя сила... Нет...

source: Sons of man! Murderers of my children!
target: Сыны людей! Убийцы моих детей!

source: For thee my hatred is unending, unyielding!
target: Моя ненависть к вам вечна и неизменна!

source: Tremble before the might of the earth!
target: Содрогнитесь пред могуществом земли!

source: To the last, I grapple with thee!
target: Я буду бороться с вами до конца!

source: I shall grind thee beneath my heel, mortal!
target: Сокрушу тебя своей пятой, смертный!

source: Hie, my children, into the dark! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> will not be denied...
target: Бегите, дети, бегите во тьму!.. Вам с <var 08 E905 ((ней)) ((ним)) /var> не совладать...

source: I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...
target: I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...

source: Mother... Father... I can't... I can't find you...
target: Mother... Father... I can't... I can't find you...

source: WAAAKE UUUUUUP!!!
target: WAAAKE UUUUUUP!!!

source: Why... Why... Why... WHYYYYYY!!!
target: Why... Why... Why... WHYYYYYY!!!

source:
I said I'd come! I said I'd come!
I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...
target:
I said I'd come! I said I'd come!
I'm here... I'm here... I'm here...

source: Where are you... Where are you...
target: Where are you... Where are you...

source: Stand back! I'm going to blast open the bulkhead!
target: Stand back! I'm going to blast open the bulkhead!

source: This might take a while! Watch my back!
target: This might take a while! Watch my back!

source: I'm almost there! Keep that thing occupied!
target: I'm almost there! Keep that thing occupied!

source: Come, <var 1A 02 /var>hero<var 1A 01 /var>, show me what you can do. Show me...<var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Иди сюда, <var 1A 02 /var>герой<var 1A 01 /var>, и покажи, на что ты способен. Покажи мне... <var 1A 02 /var>всё<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: I see...
target: Вот как...

source: You will <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> take any more from me!
target: Ты больше <var 1A 02 /var>ничего<var 1A 01 /var> не заберешь у меня!

source: The pain I have suffered, I shall visit upon you a hundredfold!
target: Твои страдания будут в тысячу раз сильнее моих!

source: You lot! Make yourselves useful!
target: Эй, вы! Помогите вы уже наконец!

source: You have made me <var 1A 02 /var>wroth<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Ты меня <var 1A 02 /var>разозлил<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Noooooo! I will not lose...to the likes of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Не-е-ет! Я не проиграю... <var 08 E905 ((такому)) ((такой)) /var>, как <var 1A 02 /var>ты<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Damn it, that colossus is enhanced! Hold on─I'll try to think of something!
target: Damn it, that colossus is enhanced! Hold on─I'll try to think of something!

source: Imperial Identification Key
target: Imperial Identification Key

target: Secure the command chamber

target: Make for the Laboratorium Primum

target: Defeat Nero tol Scaeva

source: Defeat the Ultima Weapon
target: Победите Ультиму

source: Defeat Lahabrea
target: Defeat Lahabrea

source: You'll need proper firepower to blast through that. Try and find another path to the armor bay.
target: You'll need proper firepower to blast through that. Try and find another path to the armor bay.

source: There ought to be an identification key reader nearby. You need to complete pilot registration before you can activate an armor.
target: There ought to be an identification key reader nearby. You need to complete pilot registration before you can activate an armor.

source: Well, well, would you look at this! I've found just the unit for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: Well, well, would you look at this! I've found just the unit for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: I'll send the identification data to the terminal. You can use that to activate her.
target: I'll send the identification data to the terminal. You can use that to activate her.

source: I have taken the liberty of preparing an <var 1A 02 /var>electrifying<var 1A 01 /var> stage for you.
target: Я взял на себя смелость подготовить для тебя <var 1A 02 /var>шокирующую<var 1A 01 /var> сцену.

source: Meet one of my creations. You might find it a <var 1A 02 /var>handful<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: Позволь представить тебе одно из моих изобретений. Для тебя он будет довольно <var 1A 02 /var>подручным<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: I will lay Garlond low, but first I must break you!
target: Гарлонд падёт передо мной, но сначала я сокрушу тебя!

source: <pant> I will not suffer...to be in another's shadow!
target: Я больше не буду... чьей-то тенью!

source: Let us dance, champion of Eorzea.
target: Давай потанцуем, чемпион Эорзии.

source: Impressive! Now it is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> turn!
target: Впечатляет! Теперь <var 1A 02 /var>моя<var 1A 01 /var> очередь!

source: Yaaaaaarrrgh!
target: Yaaaaaarrrgh!

source: The Ultima Weapon has partaken of the power of eikons! None can stand against it!
target: Ультима собрала в себе силу айконов! Никто не сможет ему противостоять!

source: Hearken unto me, crystal bearer. Thy foe is Darkness clad in steel.
target: Услышь меня, носитель кристалла. Твой враг — Тьма, облаченная в сталь.

source: If thou wouldst triumph, thou must look to the Light.
target: Если ты хочешь победить, тебе нужно обратиться к Свету.

source: Yield to the storm!
target: Подчинись шторму!

source: Garuda's essence...torn from the Ultima Weapon!?
target: Эссенция Гаруды... вырывается из Ультимы?!

source: Kneel to the might below!
target: Kneel to the might below!

source: Titan's as well!? Impossible!
target: Titan's as well!? Impossible!

source: Succumb to the flames!
target: Succumb to the flames!

source: Nooo! How...how are you doing this!?
target: Nooo! How...how are you doing this!?

source: We settle this once and for all!
target: We settle this once and for all!

source: I need not the power of eikons to defeat you!
target: I need not the power of eikons to defeat you!

source: This is most...unexpected. You are possessed of great might, this I will allow.
target: This is most...unexpected. You are possessed of great might, this I will allow.

source: Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!
target: Yet yours is not the might of a ruler! Such is the difference between us─a difference that will assure my victory!

source: U-Ultima!? Curse you, Ascian!
target: U-Ultima!? Curse you, Ascian!

source: How much destruction must be wreaked before you are sated!?
target: How much destruction must be wreaked before you are sated!?

source: I have not the strength...to shield thee again...
target: I have not the strength...to shield thee again...

source: Permit not the manifestation of that vile magick...lest Darkness prevail!
target: Permit not the manifestation of that vile magick...lest Darkness prevail!

source: Your time is at an end, Hydaelyn!
target: Your time is at an end, Hydaelyn!

source: From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble! Unleash Ultima!
target: From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the very pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble! Unleash Ultima!

source: Ahahahaha! You are strong, Warrior of Light!

Round and round the hand does go.
Who will it slaughter? Nobody knows!

Кому конец? Узнай наверняка.

target: Н-нет, я больше не вижу своей судьбы...

source: The void shall consume all that is!
target: Бездна поглотит всё сущее!

source: Darkness take you all!
target: Да пожрёт вас Тьма!

You cannot overcome what does not exist!
Of darkness I am born...and to darkness I shall return!
target:
То, что не существует, невозможно одолеть!
Я рождена от Тьмы... и во Тьму возвращаюсь.

source: Grrraaaaaawr!

source:
I shall not toy with you as does Lahabrea!
Witness the terrible might of a true servant of Zodiark!
target:
Я с вами как Лахабреа цацкаться не стану!
Узрите ужасающую мощь истинного слуги Зодиарка!

source:
Writhing powers of ruination!
From the deepest pits of the abyss I summon thee!
target:
Силы разрушения!
Из глубин темнейшей бездны я призываю вас!

source:
Insatiable hunger of the void!
Devour all light and return this world to perfect darkness!
target:
Неутолимый голод Бездны!
Поглоти весь свет и возврати этот мир к истинной тьме!

source:
By Zodiark's name I command thee!
River of time, mire mine enemy in thy sluggish flow!
target:
Именем Зодиарка, повелеваю!
Река времени, похорони моих врагов в своём течении!

source: You shall wither in the merciless embrace of eternity!
target: Вы иссохнете в беспощадных объятиях вечности!

source:
But...you are shorn of Her blessing!
How do you yet resist me!?
target:
Но... ты ведь <var 08 E905 ((лишена)) ((лишён)) /var> Её Благословения?!..
Как ты сопротивляешься?..

source:
Impossible!
Has he power over...time itself!?
target:
Невозможно!
У него есть власть... над самим временем?!

Owww! It hurts! It hurts!

Have at thee!

source: We claim victory this day, or Ishgard falls! Accept the Fury into your heart, and defend this bridge with your life's blood!
target: We claim victory this day, or Ishgard falls! Accept the Fury into your heart, and defend this bridge with your life's blood!

source:
Slings and arrows shall avail us little against this foe.
Ready the cannons!
target:
Slings and arrows shall avail us little against this foe.
Ready the cannons!

source:
They seek to swarm the healers!
Focus your attacks on the dragonflies!

They seek to swarm the healers!
Focus your attacks on the dragonflies!

Climb the tower, and man the dragonkiller!
Steady now! Time your shot!

Climb the tower, and man the dragonkiller!
Steady now! Time your shot!

source:
A hit!
The monster felt that one, by the Fury!

A hit!
The monster felt that one, by the Fury!

source:
Bah, a wasted bolt.
We'd best make the other dragonkillers count!
target:
Bah, a wasted bolt.
We'd best make the other dragonkillers count!

source:
Biasts!
Don't let them rush the cannons!
target:
Biasts!
Don't let them rush the cannons!

source: Another ward down! Bleed them! Bleed them for every step! Our defenses grow thin...
target: Another ward down! Bleed them! Bleed them for every step! Our defenses grow thin...

source:
They mean to overwhelm us...
Prepare the snares! Slow their advance!
target:
They mean to overwhelm us...
Prepare the snares! Slow their advance!

source: Well done!
target: Well done!

source:
Damn these Dravanian devils!
Keep faith, now! This battle is far from lost!
target:
Damn these Dravanian devils!
Keep faith, now! This battle is far from lost!

source:
It dodged the bloody missile!
A creature of that size...
target:
It dodged the bloody missile!
A creature of that size...

source:
Horde reinforcements have arrived!
Put down those aevis!
target:
Horde reinforcements have arrived!
Put down those aevis!

source:
The wards are destroyed! Pull back!
We make our final stand before the Arc of the Worthy!
target:
The wards are destroyed! Pull back!
We make our final stand before the Arc of the Worthy!

source:
If it breathes, we are lost!
Use both the snares! Choke its throat closed!
target:
If it breathes, we are lost!
Use both the snares! Choke its throat closed!

source:
Now! To the dragonkiller!
Skewer the foul beast while it thrashes!

Now! To the dragonkiller!
Skewer the foul beast while it thrashes!

source: By all that is holy...
target: By all that is holy...

source:
A fine shot!
Now we finish this scaled demon once and for all!

A fine shot!
Now we finish this scaled demon once and for all!

source:
More Dravanians have landed!
Slay those drakes before they reach the powder kegs!
target:
More Dravanians have landed!
Slay those drakes before they reach the powder kegs!

source:
Move away from the kegs!
You'll be caught in the blast!
target:
Move away from the kegs!
You'll be caught in the blast!

source: Now! Ignite the powder kegs!
target: Now! Ignite the powder kegs!

source:
Hah! That inflicted some hurt!
Back into the fray!
target:
Hah! That inflicted some hurt!
Back into the fray!

source: Bah! The timing was off...
target: Bah! The timing was off...

source:
The Arc of the Worthy is at our backs!
May Halone grant us the strength to die well in its shadow!
target:
The Arc of the Worthy is at our backs!
May Halone grant us the strength to die well in its shadow!

source: Daniffen's Collar is naught but dust on the Sea of Clouds. What hope now for Ishgard...?

This day belongs to Ishgard─and her blessed defenders!
