source: Defeat the alliance forces!
target: Одолейте силы Альянса!

source: By the Fury, it's just the two of them in there!
target: Клянусь Яростной, они там вдвоём, внутри!

source: On your guard, Lord Emmanellain! Our fight is not yet finished!
target: Лорд Эмманельен, не отвлекайтесь! Бой ещё не закончен!

source: That all you bastards've got!? Come on, then! Give us another!
target: Это всё, на что вы способны?! Ну давайте, напрягитесь!

source:
Gods, they just keep coming!
But we cannot...we will not yield!
target:
Боги, они всё наступают!
Но мы не сдадимся... держитесь!

source: You hear me, old <var 08 E905 ((girl)) ((boy)) /var>!? Don't you dare lose!
target: Ты слышишь, старичок?! Не вздумай там проиграть!

source: Bwahahaha! Brilliant, brilliant! You are indeed the Warrior of Light...
target: Пха-ха-ха-ха! Отлично, отлично! Ты и в самом деле Воин Света...

source: ...But I am the Bull of Ala Mhigo!
target: ...Но я Бык из Ала Миго!

source: Strength, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, strength! Now is your chance!
target: Давай, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, давай! Это твой шанс!

source: Strike him down! For the glory of Ishgard!
target: Бей его! Во славу Ишгарда!

source: Aye, all right... Take your victory. You've earned it.
target: Ох, чёрт... Ладно, победа твоя. Ты <var 08 E905 ((заслужила)) ((заслужил)) /var>.

source: Ye'll be facin' me first. I won't hold back, so be quick on yer feet!
target: Сперва сойдёшься со мной. Я не стану сдерживаться, поэтому работай ногами!

source: For this exercise, ye'll be learnin' avoidance!
target: В этом упражнении поучимся уклоняться.

source: An enemy often tips his hand before a big strike, so save yerself some hurt an' step clear o' the impact!
target: Враг частенько сперва долго замахивается, прежде чем врезать, а потому у тебя будет время уйти из-под удара!

source: Show ye've learned to get out o' the way, an' ye pass.
target: Покажи, что ты умеешь уворачиваться, и я буду считать тренировку успешной.

source: Time I switched to a new technique! Better change yer dance steps!
target: Применю-ка я другой удар! Гляди в оба!

source:
Now it's my turn!
I'll teach you not to ignore a ranged opponent!
target:
Теперь моя очередь!
Никогда не игнорируй противника на расстоянии!

source: Breathe! Keep yer eyes open! Move them feet!
target: Дыши! Гляди под ноги! Шевели копытами!

source: Think ye can dodge us both!?
target: А если мы будем атаковать одновременно?!

source: Yer last test'll be to evade both foes at the same time!
target: Последний тест! Пытайся увернуться одновременно от обоих!

source: Keep calm, an' watch for the signs!
target: Спокойно, спокойно! Гляди на цепь!

source: 最後までへばるなよ？
target: 最後までへばるなよ？

source:
Keep it up, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!
Yer almost at the end of it!
target:
Давай, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>!
Почти закончили!

source: Now show me you can avoid both at once!
target: Посмотрим, сможешь ли ты увернуться от нескольких атак!

source: Stay calm, and watch for the signs!
target: Спокойно, спокойно! Смотри на цепь!

source: For this exercise, you'll be learning avoidance!
target: В этом упражнении мы поучимся уворачиваться!

source: An enemy often tips his hand before a big attack, and your best defense is to skip out of the way!
target: Враг частенько сперва долго замахивается, прежде чем врезать, а потому у тебя будет время уйти из-под удара!

source: You pass the exercise once I decide you've learned this lesson.
target: Закончим тренировку, когда я пойму, что урок тобой усвоен.

source: Now you must evade both attackers at once!
target: Теперь уворачивайся от двух атакующих одновременно!

source: Remain calm, and watch for the signs!
target: Спокойствие! Следи за цепью!

source: This training exercise focuses on evasion!
target: Это упражнение научит тебя уклоняться!

source: An enemy often tips his hand before a big attack, so you must learn when to adjust your position!
target: Враг частенько сперва долго замахивается, прежде чем врезать, а потому у тебя будет время уйти из-под удара!

source: Success hinges upon your ability to avoid being struck!
target: Добейся успеха, уклоняясь от атак!

source:
Do not surrender to panic!
Move swiftly and decisively!
target:
Не поддавайся панике!
Двигайся уверенно и быстро!

source: Judge where an attack will land, and do not be there when it does!
target: Смотри, куда обрушится атака, и постарайся НЕ быть в зоне поражения!

source: もっと激しくいってみよう！
target: もっと激しくいってみよう！

source: 油断は大敵ですよ……！
target: 油断は大敵ですよ……！

source:
Stay alert!
There is but a short time remaining!
target:
Поторопись!
Осталось совсем немного времени!

source:
Stay focused!
The exercise nears its end!
target:
Внимание!
Упражнение почти закончено!

source: Avoid the enemy's attacks!
target: Избегайте атак врага!

source: Watch yer opponent carefully. When ye see an attack comin', move out o' the strike zone!
target: Внимательно следи за оппонентом. Когда он будет атаковать, выходи из зоны поражения!

source: Watch your opponent carefully. When you see an attack coming, move out of the strike zone!
target: Внимательно следи за оппонентом. Когда он будет атаковать, выходи из зоны поражения!

source: Watch your opponent carefully. When you see an attack coming, move out of the strike zone!
target: Внимательно следи за оппонентом. Когда он будет атаковать, выходи из зоны поражения!

source: Combat protocols restarting... All weapons free... Lethal force permitted!
target: Combat protocols restarting... All weapons free... Lethal force permitted!

source: Initiating new combat protocol... Preparing link... Begin synchronization!
target: Initiating new combat protocol... Preparing link... Begin synchronization!

source: Initiating new combat protocol... Achieve final form!
target: Initiating new combat protocol... Achieve final form!

source: Initiating new combat protocol... Commence final judgment!
target: Initiating new combat protocol... Commence final judgment!

source: Final judgment passed... Bask in the light and be cleansed!
target: Final judgment passed... Bask in the light and be cleansed!

source: Final judgment passed... Atone with your lifeblood!
target: Final judgment passed... Atone with your lifeblood!

source: 10 seconds to auto-clean...
target: 10 seconds to auto-clean...

source: 5 seconds to auto-clean...
target: 5 seconds to auto-clean...

source: 4 seconds to auto-clean...
target: 4 seconds to auto-clean...

source: 3 seconds to auto-clean...
target: 3 seconds to auto-clean...

source: 2 seconds to auto-clean...
target: 2 seconds to auto-clean...

source: 1 second to auto-clean...
target: 1 second to auto-clean...

source: Commencing auto-clean!
target: Commencing auto-clean!

source: Initiating combat protocol... Eliminate intruders!
target: Initiating combat protocol... Eliminate intruders!

source: Initiating new combat protocol... Limiter released! Terminate with extreme prejudice!
target: Initiating new combat protocol... Limiter released! Terminate with extreme prejudice!

source:
Illegal operation detected...
Contaminant must be purged...
Commence auto-clean!
target:
Illegal operation detected...
Contaminant must be purged...
Commence auto-clean!

source: So for this exercise, ye'll be learnin' about “enmity” an' how to build it.
target: В этом упражнении мы поговорим о враждебности и о том, как её набирать.

source: Enmity is a measure o' how badly a foe wants to kill ye, an' it's yer job to be at the top of every enemy's list.
target: Враждебность — это показатель того, насколько сильно враг хочет тебя убить. Тебе всегда нужно быть <var 08 E905 ((первой)) ((первым)) /var> в его списке!

source:
The best way to establish yerself as a threat?
String together some nasty combinations!
target:
Лучший способ показать, что ты угроза?
Вдарь по врагу с помощью мощных комбинаций!

source: In yer case, I'd start out with a <var 28 ((Action)) 0A01 /var>, an' follow it up with a <var 28 ((Action)) 1001 /var>!
target: В твоём случае сперва выполни <var 28 ((Action)) 0A01 /var>, а затем <var 28 ((Action)) 1001 /var>!

source: In yer case, I'd start out with a <var 28 ((Action)) 2001 /var>, an' follow it up with a <var 28 ((Action)) 2601 /var>!
target: В твоём случае сперва выполни <var 28 ((Action)) 2001 /var>, а затем <var 28 ((Action)) 2601 /var>!

source: In yer case, I'd start out with a <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2101 /var>, an' follow it up with a <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2701 /var>!
target: В твоём случае сперва выполни <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2101 /var>, а затем <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2701 /var>!

source: Show me a solid series of blows, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
target: Покажи мне достойную серию ударов, и будем считать урок завершённым.

source:
Remember the order I told ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!
<var 28 ((Action)) 0A01 /var> first! <var 28 ((Action)) 1001 /var> second!
target:
Вспомни, что я говорил тебе, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>!
<var 28 ((Action)) 0A01 /var> первым! <var 28 ((Action)) 1001 /var> вторым!

source:
Remember the order I told ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!
<var 28 ((Action)) 2001 /var> first! <var 28 ((Action)) 2601 /var> second!
target:
Вспомни, что я говорил тебе, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>!
<var 28 ((Action)) 2001 /var> первым! <var 28 ((Action)) 2601 /var> вторым!

source:
Remember the order I told ye, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!
<var 28 ((Action)) F20E2101 /var> first! <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2701 /var> second!
target:
Вспомни, что я говорил тебе, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>!
<var 28 ((Action)) F20E2101 /var> первым! <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2701 /var> вторым!

source: Use the combo advised by the master to attack the striking dummy!
target: Используйте комбо, которые вам подсказывает учитель, на манекене!

source:
Hit that wooden warrior with yer combination!
<var 28 ((Action)) 0A01 /var> first! <var 28 ((Action)) 1001 /var> second!
target:
Бей этого деревянного воина своей комбинацией!
<var 28 ((Action)) 0A01 /var> первым! <var 28 ((Action)) 1001 /var> вторым!

source:
Hit that wooden warrior with yer combination!
<var 28 ((Action)) 2001 /var> first! <var 28 ((Action)) 2601 /var> second!
target:
Бей этого деревянного воина своей комбинацией!
<var 28 ((Action)) 2001 /var> первым! <var 28 ((Action)) 2601 /var> вторым!

source:
Hit that wooden warrior with yer combination!
<var 28 ((Action)) F20E2101 /var> first! <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2701 /var> second!
target:
Бей этого деревянного воина своей комбинацией!
<var 28 ((Action)) F20E2101 /var> первым! <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2701 /var> вторым!

source: Don't try nothin' fancy! Get the order wrong more'n four times an' we start over!
target: И не вздумай выделываться! Перепутаешь порядок ударов четыре раза — заставлю начинать сначала!

source: When it comes to yer place in a party, yer the wall o' steel what takes the enemy hits.
target: Вспомни про свою роль в группе! Ты — стальная стена, что берёт на себя удары противника.

source: Soakin' up the pain, an' keepin' yer mates safe─that's what ye need to focus on most durin' battle.
target: Придётся потерпеть, но зато твои товарищи будут в безопасности — вот об этом в бою и думай.

source:
The best way to establish yerself as a threat?
String together some nasty combinations!
target:
Лучший способ показать, что ты угроза?
Вдарь по врагу с помощью мощных комбинаций!

source:
The best way to establish yerself as a threat?
String together some nasty combinations!
target:
Лучший способ показать, что ты угроза?
Вдарь по врагу с помощью мощных комбинаций!

source: Remember to bolster yourself with <var 28 ((Action)) 1D01 /var> before every battle! That'll get yer foes to notice you nice an' early.
target: И не забудь перед боем усилить себя с помощью техники «<var 28 ((Action)) 1D01 /var>»! Так враги точно не спустят с тебя глаз.

source: Remember to bolster yourself with <var 28 ((Action)) 3101 /var> before every battle! That'll get yer foes to notice you nice an' early.
target: И не забудь перед боем усилить себя с помощью техники «<var 28 ((Action)) 3101 /var>»! Так враги точно не спустят с тебя глаз.

source: Remember to bolster yourself with <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2D01 /var> before every battle! That'll get yer foes to notice you nice an' early.
target: И не забудь перед боем усилить себя с помощью техники «<var 28 ((Action)) F20E2D01 /var>»! Так враги точно не спустят с тебя глаз.

source: Do ye recall how ye built enmity in the last exercise? This time ye'll be testin' that combination on a proper opponent.
target: Ну? Помнишь, как поддерживать враждебность, из прошлого упражнения? На этот раз против тебя выйдет настоящий оппонент.

source: I've said this before, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, but it bears repeatin': yer job is to soak up the pain, an' keep yer mates safe.
target: Как я и говорил, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>: твоя задача — брать на себя удары врагов. Так твои товарищи будут в безопасности.

source: An' ye do that by directin' the foe's enmity onto yerself.
target: Тебе нужно направить враждебность противника на себя.

source: If yer ally's still standin' at the end o' the fight, I'll count that as a win!
target: Если твой союзник к концу боя останется стоять, засчитаю тебе победу!

source: Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
target: Одолейте спарринг-партнёра с топором!

source:
Pound yer opponent with yer combination!
Don't let yer ally get hit!
target:
Лупи его своей комбинацией!
Не позволяй ему навредить твоему союзнику!

source:
Yer ally's gettin' slaughtered!
Drag the foe's attention onto yerself!
target:
Твой союзник сейчас откинет копыта!
Перехвати внимание врага на себя!

source: For this exercise, ye'll learn to establish enmity with a ranged attack.
target: В этом упражнении ты научишься набирать враждебность с помощью атак на расстоянии.

source: ...An' yer <var 28 ((Action)) 1901 /var> technique'll be the tool for the job.
target: ...Твой главный инструмент для этого — <var 28 ((Action)) 1901 /var>.

source: ...An' yer <var 28 ((Action)) 2F01 /var> technique'll be the tool for the job.
target: ...Твой главный инструмент для этого — <var 28 ((Action)) 2F01 /var>.

source: ...An' yer <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2801 /var> technique'll be the tool for the job.
target: ...Твой главный инструмент для этого — <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2801 /var>.

source: Rather than blunder into a mob o' nasties, yer better off pullin' a few at a time from a safe distance!
target: Вместо того, чтобы забуриться в толпу врагов, лучше выманивать их по одному с безопасного расстояния.

source: Use <var 28 ((Action)) 1901 /var> to break a chunk away from the group, then grab their full attention with <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> once they reach ye!
target: Используй <var 28 ((Action)) 1901 /var>, чтобы сперва выманить часть группы, а затем завладей их вниманием с помощью техники <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>!

source: Don't get too close! Ye don't want to fight 'em all at once!
target: Нет, слишком близко! Всей толпой они тебя мигом разорвут!

source: Establish enmity with ranged attacks, and defeat all enemies!
target: Наберите враждебность с помощью дистанционных атак и одолейте врагов!

source: Use <var 28 ((Action)) 2F01 /var> to break a chunk away from the group, then grab their full attention with Overpower once they reach ye!
target: Используй <var 28 ((Action)) 2F01 /var>, чтобы сперва выманить часть группы, а затем завладей их вниманием с помощью Сокрушения!

source: Use <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2801 /var> to break a chunk away from the group, then grab their full attention with Unleash once they reach ye!
target: Используй <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2801 /var>, чтобы сперва выманить часть группы, а затем завладей их вниманием с помощью Пролома!

source: That's it! Divide and conquer, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!
target: Вот так! Разделяй и побеждай, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>!

source:
The rest o' the mob has seen ye!
Yer work's cut out for ye now!
target:
Остальные тебя заметили!
Пора делать ноги!

source: In battle, yer enemies won't care naught for “fair.” Stroll into a pack o' foes, an' yer askin' to get swarmed!
target: Бой редко бывает честным. Если без оглядки забуришься в гущу врагов, тебя просто задавят числом!

source: Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
target: Одолей всех противников, и будем считать твой урок завершённым.

source: For this exercise, ye'll learn how to build enmity with multiple foes.
target: В этом упражнении ты научишься набирать враждебность против нескольких врагов.

source: Have ye ever tried usin' the <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> technique? It'll let ye aggravate an entire group of enemies!
target: Приходилось когда-нибудь использовать <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>? Это позволит завладеть вниманием сразу нескольких врагов!

source: <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!
target: <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> ударит по всем вокруг тебя. Убедись, что <var 08 E905 ((выбрала)) ((выбрал)) /var> хорошую позицию, дабы не упустить ни одного!

source: Have ye ever tried usin' the <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> technique? It'll let ye aggravate an entire group of enemies!
target: Приходилось когда-нибудь использовать <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>? Это позволит завладеть вниманием сразу нескольких врагов!

source: <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!
target: <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!

source: Have ye ever tried usin' the <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> technique? It'll let ye aggravate an entire group of enemies!
target: Приходилось когда-нибудь использовать <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>? Это позволит завладеть вниманием сразу нескольких врагов!

source: <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!
target: <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> ударит по всем вокруг тебя. Убедись, что <var 08 E905 ((выбрала)) ((выбрал)) /var> хорошую позицию, дабы не упустить ни одного!

source:
Did ye not hear me, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!?
Use <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> to hit all three dummies AT THE SAME TIME!
target:
Что непонятного, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>?!
Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>, чтобы ударить одновременно ПО ВСЕМ манекенам!

source:
Did ye not hear me, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!?
Use <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> to hit all three dummies AT THE SAME TIME!
target:
Что непонятного, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>?!
Примени <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>, чтобы ударить одновременно ПО ВСЕМ манекенам!

source:
Did ye not hear me, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>!?
Use <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> to hit all three dummies AT THE SAME TIME!
target:
Что непонятного, <var 08 E905 ((девочка)) ((парень)) /var>?!
Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>, чтобы ударить одновременно ПО ВСЕМ манекенам!

source: Build enmity with all three striking dummies simultaneously!
target: Наберите враждебность, ударив по всем трём манекенам одновременно!

source: Use yer <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> technique to hit all three dummies at once!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>, чтобы ударить одновременно по трём манекенам!

source: Use yer <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> technique to hit all three dummies at once!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>, чтобы ударить одновременно по трём манекенам!

source: Use yer <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> technique to hit all three dummies at once!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>, чтобы ударить одновременно по трём манекенам!

source: If ye fail to carry out me instructions five times, ye'll be startin' the exercise over!
target: Если умудришься облажаться пять раз, заставлю тебя начинать всё сначала!

source: For this exercise, ye'll be trainin' against multiple opponents.
target: В этом упражнении ты научишься сражаться против нескольких противников.

source: Use <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> to gain enmity with a group, just like ye practiced. Be sure that the enemy's only interested in hittin' <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>, чтобы набрать враждебность целой группы противников. Убедись, что они заинтересованы только <var 1A 02 /var>в тебе<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Use <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> to gain enmity with a group, just like ye practiced. Be sure that the enemy's only interested in hittin' <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>, чтобы набрать враждебность целой группы противников. Убедись, что они заинтересованы только <var 1A 02 /var>в тебе<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Use <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> to gain enmity with a group, just like ye practiced. Be sure that the enemy's only interested in hittin' <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>, чтобы набрать враждебность целой группы противников. Убедись, что они заинтересованы только <var 1A 02 /var>в тебе<var 1A 01 /var>!

source:
Yer ally's gettin' murdered!
Drag the enemy's attention onto yerself!
target:
Твой союзник сейчас откинет копыта!
Отвлеки внимание противника на себя!

source: Fight while building enmity with multiple opponents!
target: Сражайтесь, набирая враждебность нескольких оппонентов!

source: Adjust yer position so that ye hit all yer foes with <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>, перед этим выбрав хорошую позицию!

source: Adjust yer position so that ye hit all yer foes with <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>, перед этим выбрав хорошую позицию!

source: Adjust yer position so that ye hit all yer foes with <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>!
target: Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>, перед этим выбрав хорошую позицию!

source: Once ye've got the situation under control, ye can start usin' combinations!
target: Как только почувствуешь, что ситуация под контролем, начинай использовать обычные комбо!

source: Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
target: Одолей всех врагов, и будем считать твою тренировку завершённой.

source: For this exercise, ye'll learn to deal with reinforcements.
target: В этом упражнении ты научишься, как обходиться с подкреплениями.

source: Sometimes there're latecomers to a battle, so ye've got to stay alert.
target: К бою иногда будут присоединяться опоздавшие, так что держи ухо востро.

source: If ye notice a new foe arrive, don't give in to panic! Keep calm, an' pick the enemy up with yer usual tools!
target: Если заметишь, что в месте схватки появился новый противник, не поддавайся панике! Используй свои обычные приёмы.

source:
Yer ally is takin' a beatin'!
Do what it takes to make the enemy notice ye!
target:
Твой союзник сейчас отбросит ласты!
Делай всё, как всегда, чтобы враг тебя заметил!

source: Defeat the enemy while staying alert for reinforcements!
target: Одолейте врага, но берегитесь подкреплений противника!

source: The axeman will call for aid at certain points in the battle! Prioritize takin' down the reinforcements!
target: В определённые моменты топорник будет звать на помощь! Не забывай — подкрепления на тебе!

source: Move yerself─and the fight─some distance away! Ye don't want yer ally gettin' hit by them big swings!
target: Немного отодвинься от союзников и отверни врагов в другую сторону! Мы же не хотим, чтобы кто-нибудь пострадал?

source:
There's a new enemy on the field!
Use <var 28 ((Action)) 1901 /var> if ye have to!
target:
В схватку вступает новый враг!
Примени <var 28 ((Action)) 1901 /var>, если нужно!

source: Nice work! Now take down that newcomer!
target: Отлично! А теперь расправься с вновь прибывшим!

source:
Are they too far away for a combination?
Then reel 'em in with a Shield Lob!
target:
Враги слишком далеко для проведения атак?
Используй на них Бросок щита!

source:
Are they too far away for a combination?
Then reel 'em in with a Tomahawk!
target:
Враги слишком далеко для проведения атак?
Швырни в них свой Томагавк!

source:
Are they too far away for a combination?
Then reel 'em in with an Unmend!
target:
Враги слишком далеко для проведения атак?
Используй на них свой Раздор!

source: Once ye've got everyone nice an' close, ye can switch to <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var> to keep that enmity flowin'!
target: Как только они подбегут поближе, примени <var 28 ((Action)) F21CD501 /var>, чтоб всё шло как по маслу!

source: Once ye've got everyone nice an' close, ye can switch to <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var> to keep that enmity flowin'!
target: Как только они подбегут поближе, примени <var 28 ((Action)) 2A01 /var>, чтоб всё шло как по маслу!

source: Once ye've got everyone nice an' close, ye can switch to <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var> to keep that enmity flowin'!
target: Как только они подбегут поближе, примени <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2501 /var>, чтоб всё шло как по маслу!

source:
There's a new enemy on the field!
Use <var 28 ((Action)) 2F01 /var> if ye have to!
target:
В схватку вступает новый враг!
Примени <var 28 ((Action)) 2F01 /var>, если нужно!

source:
There's a new enemy on the field!
Use <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2801 /var> if ye have to!
target:
В схватку вступает новый враг!
Примени <var 28 ((Action)) F20E2801 /var>, если нужно!

source: Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
target: Одолей тут всех вражин, и будем считать твой урок завершённым.

source: As you might have guessed, the purpose of this exercise is to teach cooperation.
target: As you might have guessed, the purpose of this exercise is to teach cooperation.

source: Your ally will hold the enemy's attention─it is your job to take the foe down!
target: Your ally will hold the enemy's attention─it is your job to take the foe down!

source: 味方と協力して、敵を討伐できれば訓練合格だよ！
target: 味方と協力して、敵を討伐できれば訓練合格だよ！

source: Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
target: Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!

source: Attack the same foe as your ally to win the battle!
target: Attack the same foe as your ally to win the battle!

source: That's the way, novice! I'll keep him occupied─you concentrate on bringing him down!
target: That's the way, novice! I'll keep him occupied─you concentrate on bringing him down!

source:
Very good!
Now here's a hint about enemy facing!
target:
Very good!
Now here's a hint about enemy facing!

source: Your opponent will have a harder time avoiding blows from the flanks or from behind.
target: Your opponent will have a harder time avoiding blows from the flanks or from behind.

source: There are also certain techniques that perform better when executed from such positions.
target: There are also certain techniques that perform better when executed from such positions.

source: When it comes to your place in a party you are the sharp end of the spear.
target: When it comes to your place in a party you are the sharp end of the spear.

source: Simply put, your role is to inflict as much damage as possible, while keeping your own skin intact.
target: Simply put, your role is to inflict as much damage as possible, while keeping your own skin intact.

source: As such, you cannot just attack whichever enemy you please!
target: As such, you cannot just attack whichever enemy you please!

source: If you strike a foe other than one controlled by your ally, then you risk becoming the target of deadly aggression.
target: If you strike a foe other than one controlled by your ally, then you risk becoming the target of deadly aggression.

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

source: For this exercise, you will be fighting multiple opponents!
target: For this exercise, you will be fighting multiple opponents!

source: The key to victory is coordination with your comrades─each foe will fall all the swifter under a focused assault!
target: The key to victory is coordination with your comrades─each foe will fall all the swifter under a focused assault!

source:
Pay attention, novice!
Target the enemy engaged by your ally!
target:
Pay attention, novice!
Target the enemy engaged by your ally!

source: Coordinate with your allies and defeat the enemy!
target: Coordinate with your allies and defeat the enemy!

source: Mark well the opponent your ally has engaged, and attack the same enemy!
target: Mark well the opponent your ally has engaged, and attack the same enemy!

source: Start the fight with the staff waver─such foes are often the most dangerous, but the least robust.
target: Start the fight with the staff waver─such foes are often the most dangerous, but the least robust.

source: Be sure to attack the same enemy as your ally! Strike the wrong foe five times and you fail this exercise!
target: Be sure to attack the same enemy as your ally! Strike the wrong foe five times and you fail this exercise!

source: That's the way, novice! Once this one's down, we'll move on to the fistfighter!
target: That's the way, novice! Once this one's down, we'll move on to the fistfighter!

source:
There's another yet standing!
Don't lose your focus!
target:
There's another yet standing!
Don't lose your focus!

source:
He's almost done for!
Grind him into the dust!
target:
He's almost done for!
Grind him into the dust!

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

source: Do you remember the lesson where I had you evading enemy attacks?
target: Do you remember the lesson where I had you evading enemy attacks?

source: This exercise will put that training to the test. You must needs plan your strikes around some fancy footwork!
target: This exercise will put that training to the test. You must needs plan your strikes around some fancy footwork!

source: You must pay attention! Watch for the signs whilst you press the attack!
target: You must pay attention! Watch for the signs whilst you press the attack!

source: Engage the axe wielder, but keep an eye out for counterattacks!
target: Engage the axe wielder, but keep an eye out for counterattacks!

source: Defeat the enemy while avoiding attacks!
target: Defeat the enemy while avoiding attacks!

source: If you allow yourself to be hit five times, we will start this exercise again from the beginning!
target: If you allow yourself to be hit five times, we will start this exercise again from the beginning!

source: Well done! Slippery as an eel, novice!
target: Well done! Slippery as an eel, novice!

source:
Not bad, aye...
Care to dodge this!?
target:
Not bad, aye...
Care to dodge this!?

source:
Victory is within reach!
Be on your guard until the very last!
target:
Victory is within reach!
Be on your guard until the very last!

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

source: This exercise will teach you how to deal with enemy reinforcements.
target: This exercise will teach you how to deal with enemy reinforcements.

source: As the battle progresses, new foes will appear on the field.
target: As the battle progresses, new foes will appear on the field.

source: These sudden arrivals will target your weakest comrade, so you must be quick to eliminate them!
target: These sudden arrivals will target your weakest comrade, so you must be quick to eliminate them!

source:
Your healer is under attack!
Swiftly now! Eliminate the aggressor!
target:
Your healer is under attack!
Swiftly now! Eliminate the aggressor!

source:
Another enemy has arrived on the field!
Engage this new foe!
target:
Another enemy has arrived on the field!
Engage this new foe!

source: Keep an eye peeled for reinforcements, novice!
target: Keep an eye peeled for reinforcements, novice!

source: Defeat the enemy while staying alert for reinforcements!
target: Defeat the enemy while staying alert for reinforcements!

source:
Excellent!
You handled the situation perfectly!
target:
Excellent!
You handled the situation perfectly!

source:
Here comes another!
Make short work of this skirmisher!
target:
Here comes another!
Make short work of this skirmisher!

source: Very good! Now see the battle to its end!
target: Very good! Now see the battle to its end!

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

source: In this exercise, you will learn to manipulate the battlefield.
target: In this exercise, you will learn to manipulate the battlefield.

source: During the battle, enemies will pour forth from the rear gate. New foes will continue to flood in whilst this portal remains open.
target: During the battle, enemies will pour forth from the rear gate. New foes will continue to flood in whilst this portal remains open.

source: You must operate the lever that closes the gate, or your party will be overwhelmed!
target: You must operate the lever that closes the gate, or your party will be overwhelmed!

source:
The reinforcements are without end!
Quickly─use the lever to close the gate!
target:
The reinforcements are without end!
Quickly─use the lever to close the gate!

source: Manipulate the battlefield and defeat the enemy!
target: Manipulate the battlefield and defeat the enemy!

source: Engage the enemy, but be wary of the gate!
target: Engage the enemy, but be wary of the gate!

source: The gate has opened! Ignore the reinforcements for now, and operate the lever!
target: The gate has opened! Ignore the reinforcements for now, and operate the lever!

source: Well done! The flood of enemies has ceased! Now mop up the foes remaining!
target: Well done! The flood of enemies has ceased! Now mop up the foes remaining!

source: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
target: Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

source: Now that you understand what is expected of you, we can continue with the lesson.
target: Now that you understand what is expected of you, we can continue with the lesson.

source: The upcoming exercise requires that you keep your ally healed.
target: The upcoming exercise requires that you keep your ally healed.

source: When it comes to your place in a party you are the soothing wind of restoration.
target: When it comes to your place in a party you are the soothing wind of restoration.

source: When you've healed all there is to heal, there may be time to weave in some offensive magicks.
target: When you've healed all there is to heal, there may be time to weave in some offensive magicks.

source: Heal your ally and defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
target: Heal your ally and defeat the axe-wielding training partner!

source: Your primary concern should be healing your ally!
target: Your primary concern should be healing your ally!

source:
But keep an eye on your companion!
You should not be blasting if someone is bleeding!
target:
But keep an eye on your companion!
You should not be blasting if someone is bleeding!

source: As such, rather than engaging the enemy directly, your primary role is to focus upon the mending of wounds.
target: As such, rather than engaging the enemy directly, your primary role is to focus upon the mending of wounds.

target: With the support of your diligent healing, your party will prevail against even the most savage of foes!

source: Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
target: Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!

target: In this next exercise, you will be healing multiple allies.

source: You will need to stay alert, and switch your attention between allies as the situation demands.
target: You will need to stay alert, and switch your attention between allies as the situation demands.

target: 体力の少ない味方がいます！　急いで回復を！

source: Maintain the health of your allies and defeat the enemy!
target: Maintain the health of your allies and defeat the enemy!

source: Focus your attention on the well-being of your companions!
target: Focus your attention on the well-being of your companions!

source: Another enemy threatens your party! You might try attacking this foe if your allies are uninjured.
target: Another enemy threatens your party! You might try attacking this foe if your allies are uninjured.

source: Battle is chaotic, and you must needs learn flexibility.
target: Battle is chaotic, and you must needs learn flexibility.

source: Thus, you will find yourself in a scenario in which sudden reinforcements threaten your party.
target: Thus, you will find yourself in a scenario in which sudden reinforcements threaten your party.

source: Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
target: Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!

source: For this exercise, you will learn to heal whilst avoiding harm.
target: For this exercise, you will learn to heal whilst avoiding harm.

source: As before, you must watch for signs you are being attacked. Move swiftly, and time your casts to avoid interruption.
target: As before, you must watch for signs you are being attacked. Move swiftly, and time your casts to avoid interruption.

Pay attention, now!

target: Let's begin with the basics, shall we? Pay attention to the enemy's facing, and stay out of harm's way!

As always, healing is your primary concern!

source: They never knew what hit 'em... Not that I'm surprised. If a handful o' raptors had given <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> any trouble, the gods only know what they'd have done to the rest of us!

source: Pick up the pace, soldier! These ain't even the small fry!
target: Pick up the pace, soldier! These ain't even the small fry!

target: Tap into those primeval instincts! Eye o' the coeurl! ...Speakin' o' which—let loose the coeurl!

source: That's one o' the benefits o' trainin' on this island. No shortage o' creatures ready to rip ye to shreds.

target: Now yer all nice an' limbered up, we'll let ye loose on some more civilized targets!

target: Well, I weren't expectin' that. Still...made for interestin' viewin', I must say. From now on, though, you'll be up against the Maelstrom's best.

source: Seven hells... To think I spoke of <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> skill at arms...
target: Seven hells... To think I spoke of <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> skill at arms...

source: I trust you will show me no favors! Meet me as you would an equal!
target: I trust you will show me no favors! Meet me as you would an equal!

source:
<pant> <pant> I yield! I yield!
By the Navigator... <pant> <pant>
That was...<var 1A 02 /var>inspirational<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
<pant> <pant> I yield! I yield!
By the Navigator... <pant> <pant>
That was...<var 1A 02 /var>inspirational<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Expectin' wet-nosed Maelstrom pups, were ye? Then yer in fer a treat! The Sirens are 'ere to give ye a <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> drillin'!
target: Expectin' wet-nosed Maelstrom pups, were ye? Then yer in fer a treat! The Sirens are 'ere to give ye a <var 1A 02 /var>proper<var 1A 01 /var> drillin'!

source: We'll do our best not to gut ye, darlin', but once we taste blood, well...<var 1A 02 /var>old 'abits die 'ard<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: We'll do our best not to gut ye, darlin', but once we taste blood, well...<var 1A 02 /var>old 'abits die 'ard<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Tsk-tsk. Didn't nobody ever tell ye the 'ells 'ave no fury like a Siren scorned? Yer gizzard won't be fit fer the chum bucket when we're through with ye!
target: Tsk-tsk. Didn't nobody ever tell ye the 'ells 'ave no fury like a Siren scorned? Yer gizzard won't be fit fer the chum bucket when we're through with ye!

source: Sound the bell o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Lady Infernal<var 1A 01 /var>! Make ready the cannons!
target: Sound the bell o' the <var 1A 02 /var>Lady Infernal<var 1A 01 /var>! Make ready the cannons!

source: Forward battery! Fire!
target: Forward battery! Fire!

source: Abeam, fire!
target: Abeam, fire!

source: Cross spread! Fire!
target: Cross spread! Fire!

source: Blast 'em front an' center!
target: Blast 'em front an' center!

source: Like that, is it? PAH! All guns! Bombard the bilge-swillin' scrags!
target: Like that, is it? PAH! All guns! Bombard the bilge-swillin' scrags!

source:
Now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> a 'venturer after me own 'eart!
That lust for blood... Oooh, it sets me skin atingle.
target:
Now <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> a 'venturer after me own 'eart!
That lust for blood... Oooh, it sets me skin atingle.

source: Bested the Sirens already? Why, Rhoswen would scarce have had time to swear herself hoarse.
target: Bested the Sirens already? Why, Rhoswen would scarce have had time to swear herself hoarse.

source: Dear me... Did the Sirens keep you so long? Mayhap you were loath to strike them for fear you might catch something...?
target: Dear me... Did the Sirens keep you so long? Mayhap you were loath to strike them for fear you might catch something...?

source: No matter. I am come to test the worth of the Krakens' newest acquisition. I trust you will oblige me...?
target: No matter. I am come to test the worth of the Krakens' newest acquisition. I trust you will oblige me...?

source: You will be <var 1A 02 /var>shocked<var 1A 01 /var> to hear that she prefers her prey roasted. Rather sophisticated for a savage beast, wouldn't you say?
target: You will be <var 1A 02 /var>shocked<var 1A 01 /var> to hear that she prefers her prey roasted. Rather sophisticated for a savage beast, wouldn't you say?

source: You seem to be keeping up with her quite well─thus far, at least. Did I mention that Ymir has hidden talents?
target: You seem to be keeping up with her quite well─thus far, at least. Did I mention that Ymir has hidden talents?

source: Hmph. 'Twould seem I wasted my coin. Very well. Victory is yours. Be on your way.
target: Hmph. 'Twould seem I wasted my coin. Very well. Victory is yours. Be on your way.

source: I, Eynzahr Slafyrsyn, shall be your final opponent.
target: I, Eynzahr Slafyrsyn, shall be your final opponent.

source: Couldn't help myself, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Those last few matches stirred something...
target: Couldn't help myself, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>. Those last few matches stirred something...

source: You seem to be treading water, Marshal. If I did not know better, I should think you cared naught for our company's good name.
target: You seem to be treading water, Marshal. If I did not know better, I should think you cared naught for our company's good name.

source: Spare me, Admiral. I hold my duty to the Maelstrom above all else─as you well know. Nevertheless, I will not deny that this uniform now prevents me from doing my worst.
target: Spare me, Admiral. I hold my duty to the Maelstrom above all else─as you well know. Nevertheless, I will not deny that this uniform now prevents me from doing my worst.

source: But since all here present are privy to the truth, might we not loosen the collar and hearken back to the glory days, just this once? ...By your leave, o' course.
target: But since all here present are privy to the truth, might we not loosen the collar and hearken back to the glory days, just this once? ...By your leave, o' course.

source: As you like. 'Twill make for a better spectacle.
target: As you like. 'Twill make for a better spectacle.

source: Heh. I said I'd never don you again, old friend. But many a man would trade the wisdom of years for a minute of youthful hubris...
target: Heh. I said I'd never don you again, old friend. But many a man would trade the wisdom of years for a minute of youthful hubris...

source: Abandon hope, ye fools of fortune, for you face Mistbeard, king of the five seas!
target: Abandon hope, ye fools of fortune, for you face Mistbeard, king of the five seas!

source:
I have drowned a hundred men on their own decks ere they took to sea!
Here, have yourselves a whiff of this!
target:
I have drowned a hundred men on their own decks ere they took to sea!
Here, have yourselves a whiff of this!

source: Aching for the theriac, are you? Let's have a little treasure hunt for it.
target: Aching for the theriac, are you? Let's have a little treasure hunt for it.

source: Nothin' gets the blood pumpin' like scrappin' with a pack o' ravenous beasties!
target: Nothin' gets the blood pumpin' like scrappin' with a pack o' ravenous beasties!

source: Overcome Unsevered Despair
target: Overcome Unsevered Despair

source: Overcome Unstifled Prayer
target: Overcome Unstifled Prayer

source: Defeat Hraesvelgr
target: Defeat Hraesvelgr

source: Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!
target: Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!

source:
The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?
target:
The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?

source:
A wyrm doth fight with both might and magicks.
Canst thou withstand the onslaught of spell and claw?
target:
A wyrm doth fight with both might and magicks.
Canst thou withstand the onslaught of spell and claw?

source:
This is as far as you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
You and your ridiculous name won't make it past me, kupo!
target:
This is as far as you go, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
You and your ridiculous name won't make it past me, kupo!

source:
This is no time for naps, kupo!
Everyone fights! No one quits!
target:
This is no time for naps, kupo!
Everyone fights! No one quits!

source:
I'm not chieftain because I'm the biggest...
I'm chieftain because I'm the baddest, kupo!
target:
I'm not chieftain because I'm the biggest...
I'm chieftain because I'm the baddest, kupo!

source:
Kupopo... That's enough... You've made your point.
This isn't a fight to the death, kupo...
target:
Kupopo... That's enough... You've made your point.
This isn't a fight to the death, kupo...

source:
Thou hast weathered my trial thus far...but I am not convinced.
I will try thy limits.
target:
Thou hast weathered my trial thus far...but I am not convinced.
I will try thy limits.

source:
Nidhogg will spare thee no clemency.
And thus neither must I.
target:
Nidhogg will spare thee no clemency.
And thus neither must I.

source:
...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...
target:
...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...

source: Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!
target: Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!

source:
Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?
target:
Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?

source: Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!
target: Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!

source:
The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?
target:
The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?

source:
Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?
target:
Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?

source: Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!
target: Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!

source:
...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...
target:
...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...

source: Pursue the legatus
target: Pursue the legatus

source: Defeat Regula van Hydrus
target: Defeat Regula van Hydrus

source:
The legatus himself is here!
After him!
target:
The legatus himself is here!
After him!

source:
I shall contend with this foe.
Press onwards, my comrades!
target:
I shall contend with this foe.
Press onwards, my comrades!

source: There! It's van Hydrus!
target: There! It's van Hydrus!

source: Wha─ Ah!
target: Wha─ Ah!

source: I can't─ It's crushing me...
target: I can't─ It's crushing me...

source: Can't...breathe...
target: Can't...breathe...

source: Mistress Krile!
target: Mistress Krile!

source: Quickly! Inside the barrier!
target: Quickly! Inside the barrier!

source:
My weapon's inhibitors exist for a reason...
But I will not lose to you again!
target:
My weapon's inhibitors exist for a reason...
But I will not lose to you again!

source:
Magitek enhances my bladework tenfold!
You cannot hope to win!
target:
Magitek enhances my bladework tenfold!
You cannot hope to win!

source: Forgive me... I thought myself stronger...
target: Forgive me... I thought myself stronger...

source:
Mine eyes grow dim...
Whither now the Light...?
target:
Mine eyes grow dim...
Whither now the Light...?

source: Ugh... I am no warrior, it seems...
target: Ugh... I am no warrior, it seems...

source: No... Not again...
target: No... Not again...

source:
The Garleans strike for the heart of the facility.
And the legatus spearheads their charge.
target:
The Garleans strike for the heart of the facility.
And the legatus spearheads their charge.

source: We must be swift in our pursuit.
target: We must be swift in our pursuit.

source:
Go! I will stand guard over Mistress Krile.
You must keep the legatus from his prize!
target:
Go! I will stand guard over Mistress Krile.
You must keep the legatus from his prize!

source:
We leave her in your care, then.
You'd best keep her safe, Unukalhai!
target:
We leave her in your care, then.
You'd best keep her safe, Unukalhai!

source:
The central laboratory should be up ahead.
Let's hurry along, shall we?
target:
The central laboratory should be up ahead.
Let's hurry along, shall we?

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Krile needs you!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Krile needs you!
30EA_

source: Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!
target: Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!

source:
Come, my children!
Claim the vengeance that is rightfully yours!
target:
Come, my children!
Claim the vengeance that is rightfully yours!

source:
Look upon the fool who dared embrace my power!
Witness the darkened wings that beat about his shriveled soul!
target:
Look upon the fool who dared embrace my power!
Witness the darkened wings that beat about his shriveled soul!

source: Champions of man! Hearken to my fury!
target: Champions of man! Hearken to my fury!

source: Thy final verse is sung!
target: Thy final verse is sung!

source:
Brood-brother, thou hast doomed me...
But if I must meet mine end, then all shall burn upon my pyre!
target:
Brood-brother, thou hast doomed me...
But if I must meet mine end, then all shall burn upon my pyre!

source: Slain twice by mortal hands...
target: Slain twice by mortal hands...

source:
All will perish!
All will be consumed by fiery ruin!
target:
All will perish!
All will be consumed by fiery ruin!

source:
Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!
target:
Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!

source:
Will you flee, little mortals?
My talons shall rend your courage; my jaws, taste agony!
target:
Will you flee, little mortals?
My talons shall rend your courage; my jaws, taste agony!

source: Clear the peat bogs
target: Clear the peat bogs

source: Defeat Arachne Eve
target: Defeat Arachne Eve

source: Clear the Shatotto Memorial
target: Clear the Shatotto Memorial

source: Defeat Forgall
target: Defeat Forgall

source: Clear the security corridor
target: Clear the security corridor

source: Defeat Ozma
target: Defeat Ozma

source: Defeat Calofisteri
target: Defeat Calofisteri

source:
My dear Yafaem...
What a wretched morass it has become.
target:
Мой милый Яфаэм...
Ты превратился в жуткое болото.

source:
Do you spy that wreckage up ahead?
Could it be one of the Talons' downed vessels?
target:
Видите те обломки?
Должно быть, одно из сбитых суден Когтей.

source:
Is this not a tributary of the White Maiden?
We should come upon Mhach if we follow it downstream!
target:
Кажется, это часовня Белой Девы.
Мы попадём в Мхак, если спустимся вниз по течению!

source: <cough> <splutter> I am not terribly fond of water...
target: Кхе-кхе... Тьфу... Я не слишком большой фанат воды...

source:
We aim for that pyramidal structure, but ware the voidsent.
The air is thick with their otherworldly stench...
target:
Направляйтесь к той пирамиде, но берегитесь демонов.
Воздух кажется густым от присутствия порождений...

source:
Ah, the wonders of Mhachi architecture.
Fifteen centuries and a flood later, and still it stands.
target:
О, чудеса архитектуры Мхака.
Полторы тысячи лет, потоп, а здание стоит как стояло.

source:
Barring our way is a terrible sphere that has devoured entire cities.
We must prove the stronger if we are to reach the Nullstone.
target:
На нашем пути чудовищная сфера, в своё время поглотившая целые города.
Мы должны доказать свою силу, чтобы пройти к Нулевому камню.

source:
This is it: the Tomb of the Nullstone.
There will be a guardian. There is always a guardian...
target:
Вот оно — хранилище Нулевого камня.
Наверное, здесь страж. В таких местах всегда есть страж...

source:
Gaha! There were <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> of you blood-filled morsels!?
How well I will sup this day!
target:
Ха-ха! Ещё эти кровяные колбаски?!
Ох, как я сегодня попирую!

source:
Nasty little insects!
You will not scurry so within my web!
target:
Назойливые насекомые!
Как вы смеете тут шнырять?

source:
Bah! Not strong enough! Not strong enough!
I must feed on more than flesh!
target:
Ба! Слабее всех! Слабее всех!
Я отведаю вашей плоти, и вот тогда...

source:
Are you frightened, my precious prey?
Gaze into my eyes and know true terror!
target:
Испуганы, моя драгоценная добыча?
Взгляните в глаза истинному ужасу!

source:
What manner of prey...bites back?
I must warn...Lord Forgall...
target:
Что это за добыча... которая так сопротивляется?..
Надо предупредить... остальных...

source:
Ah, some of you survived. How convenient.
I am in need of fresh souls to shatter the ward.
target:
О, некоторые из вас выжили. Как раз кстати.
Мне нужна пара-тройка душ, дабы разбить защиту.

source:
<cough> After so long...I am arisen...
I will not...be buried here...
target:
После всего... я восстал...
Чтобы быть здесь похороненным?..

source:
Even empty husks have their uses.
See how they jerk and dance at my command!
target:
Даже у пустых оболочек есть применение.
Глядите, как они танцуют по моему велению!

source: I will teach those who oppose me the extent of their folly...
target: Я покажу тем, кто мне противостоит, насколько бесполезна их борьба...

source:
Your pitiful lives will be mine in due time.
But first, you must be punished for your insolence!
target:
Со временем ваши жалкие душонки будут моими.
Но сперва следует наказать вас за наглость!

source:
Solitude weakens the spirit and warps the flesh...
Stray from the pack at your peril!
target:
Одиночество ослабляет дух и искажает плоть...
Разбегайтесь... и страдайте!

source:
Will you glimpse the realm that awaits you after death?
Drink deep from the chalice of oblivion!
target:
Готовы ли вы взглянуть на мир, который ждёт вас после смерти?
Испейте из чаши забвения!

source:
Ah, how sweet the rancid breeze of the underhells...
Its winds will strip you to the bone!
target:
О, как сладок жуткий ветер преисподней...
Это дуновение сорвёт плоть с ваших костей!

source:
Arise, my rotting playthings!
The board needs more pieces in play!
target:
Восстаньте, мои игрушки!
На доске ещё много места.

source:
My undead toys are so easily broken.
Mayhap my minions will prove the sturdier...
target:
Моя нежить так легко ломается.
Возможно, прислужники окажутся понадёжнее...

source:
How tiresome. I had thought to spare my energies for the ward.
But you insist on gripping to life so very tightly...
target:
Как утомительно. Я думал, вы отдадите свою энергию мне.
Но если вы и дальше намерены цепляться за жизни...

source: Embrace your fate! By my stygian light be your doom revealed!
target: Узрите свою судьбу! Узрите свою погибель в моём адском свете!

source:
My lord warned that mortals of power might interfere...
But you are no threat to me! I reign in the court of the void!
target:
Мой повелитель предупреждал, что могут вмешаться смертные...
Но вы мне не ровня! Я управляю целым кланом демонов!

source: Know your slayer, intruders. I am Calofisteri, and by the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...
target: Знайте своего убийцу, пришельцы! Кровь демонов дала мне силы вознестись!..

source:
Behold my magnificent mane!
These curls are blades that cut, and roots that drain!
target:
Узрите мои великолепные волосы!
От этих локонов вы можете потерять голову!

source: Shall I share my luscious locks with you?
target: Достойны ли вы вообще прикасаться к моим волосам?

source:
Unkempt thieves! Slovenly marauders!
You will not have the Nullstone!
target:
Бесстыдные воры! Наглые мародёры!
Вам не видать Нулевого камня!

source:
Have you ever witnessed such coifed perfection!?
The edges of my tresses are sharper than swords!
target:
Вы когда-нибудь видели такое совершенство?!
Кончики моих волос острее, чем клинки!

source:
...Why do you yet stand? I have supped on the void!
What ungodly power swims in <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> veins?
target:
...Как вы выжили? Я призвала всю силу бездны!
Что за нечестивая сила бурлит в <var 1A 02 /var>ваших<var 1A 01 /var> жилах?

source:
Yahahahaha!
My strands will soak in the lifeblood of every last one of you!
target:
Ха-ха-ха!
Мои кудри искупаются в вашей крови!

source:
Do you dare face the halo of my unleashed glory?
Or turn your back and risk the sting of my rejection?
target:
Посмеете ли вы взглянуть на сияние моей необузданной славы?
Или повернётесь спиной и познаете боль моего отказа?..

source:
My pride is clipped... My strength is shorn...
The Nullstone is yours...
target:
Моя гордость подрезана... Моя сила отнята...
Нулевой камень ваш...

source:
Weevils and maggots!
I shall spin another web! Yes! More threads to bind you!
target:
Вредители! Черви!
Я создам ещё паутину! Да! Нужно опутать вас.

source:
See what you have done!
My poor web is in tatters!
target:
Вы чего наделали?
Вся моя паутина испорчена!

source:
Why must you wriggle so!
You've ruined another web!
target:
Чего вы так вертитесь!
Вы испортили ещё одну паутину!

source:
Body of rock, from rough stone hewn...
Chipped with chisel and marked by rune...
target:
Грубое тело, из камня рождённое...
Рукою изваяно, рунами жжёное...

source:
Mind of spells, engraved instruction...
Given life to wreak destruction...
target:
Магический разум внушил повеленье...
Тому, кто живет, сеять чтоб разрушенье...

source:
Core of arcane will ignited...
Made to crush the uninvited...
target:
Вся мощь чародейства во мне разгорится...
В огне уничтожены будут мокрицы!..

source:
Departing now, the maker's spark...
A shattered face, stone eyes grown dark...
target:
Искра создателя навеки исчезает...
Расколото тело, глаза затухают...

source: Magic Charge
target: Заряд магии
