source: Defeat Eden's Promise
target: Defeat Eden's Promise

source: Defeat the Oracle of Darkness
target: Defeat the Oracle of Darkness

source: Joined as one, never to be parted...
target: Joined as one, never to be parted...

source: Unbound by past or future in this single perfect moment!
target: Unbound by past or future in this single perfect moment!

source: We shall draw your memories from you...
target: We shall draw your memories from you...

source: And they will be your undoing!
target: And they will be your undoing!

source: Now, your memories belong to us!
target: Now, your memories belong to us!

source: Memories of earth...
target: Memories of earth...

source: Memories of ice...
target: Memories of ice...

source: You would defy us?
target: You would defy us?

source: Begone!
target: Begone!

source: We tire of your insolence!
target: We tire of your insolence!

source: You are unworthy of our utopia!
target: You are unworthy of our utopia!

source: Pitiful!
target: Pitiful!

source: Why will you not disappear?
target: Why will you not disappear?

source: No... Our utopia cannot fall...
target: No... Our utopia cannot fall...

source: Must you interfere?
target: Must you interfere?

source: Our utopia will only be complete...
target: Our utopia will only be complete...

source: ...once you are erased from our memory!
target: ...once you are erased from our memory!

source: You've got to protect her memories! Hurry!
target: You've got to protect her memories! Hurry!

source: Mmm! Delicious, aren't they?
target: Mmm! Delicious, aren't they?

source: These are actually quite good.
target: These are actually quite good.

source: See? Let's have another one. Half each?
target: See? Let's have another one. Half each?

source: Hmm? What happened to the other half?
target: Hmm? What happened to the other half?

source: Am I being erased from her memory!?
target: Am I being erased from her memory!?

source: I told you it would make a great necklace.
target: I told you it would make a great necklace.

source: Ohhh...it's beautiful! I think it'll really suit you!
target: Ohhh...it's beautiful! I think it'll really suit you!

source: Me? But I thought you should have it...
target: Me? But I thought you should have it...

source: Is this ice? Where did this come from?
target: Is this ice? Where did this come from?

source: If this goes on much longer, she'll forget everything!
target: If this goes on much longer, she'll forget everything!

source: How about... Hmm... This one?
target: How about... Hmm... This one?

source: That's <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> color.
target: That's <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> color.

source: Now <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> one on the other hand...
target: Now <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> one on the other hand...

source: What am I doing with this? I'd never wear this color...
target: What am I doing with this? I'd never wear this color...

source: No...! We can't let this happen!
target: No...! We can't let this happen!

source: We shall bring eternal harmony.
target: We shall bring eternal harmony.

source: Tranquility and vitality in perfect balance...
target: Tranquility and vitality in perfect balance...

source: They shatter... They fade...
target: They shatter... They fade...

source: Such fragile things, memories...
target: Such fragile things, memories...

source: Your time draws near...
target: Your time draws near...

source: Farewell, servant of Light.
target: Farewell, servant of Light.

source: The fusion is undone... But is she all right?
target: The fusion is undone... But is she all right?

source:
Mitron!?
...Aaaaaah!
target:
Mitron!?
...Aaaaaah!

source: Yes... I remember. I am Gaia.
target: Yes... I remember. I am Gaia.

source: Mine was the seat of Loghrif...
target: Mine was the seat of Loghrif...

source: I shall restore the power of Darkness to this star.
target: I shall restore the power of Darkness to this star.

source: I shall fulfill my duty as the Oracle of Darkness!
target: I shall fulfill my duty as the Oracle of Darkness!

source: By the will of the ancients!
target: By the will of the ancients!

source: The abyss awaits!
target: The abyss awaits!

source: Chaos reigns eternal!
target: Chaos reigns eternal!

source: Whispers of ruination...
target: Whispers of ruination...

source: Smite my foe!
target: Smite my foe!

source: Whispers of awakening...
target: Whispers of awakening...

source: Whispers of resonance...
target: Whispers of resonance...

source: The void beckons!
target: The void beckons!

source: Succumb to the Darkness!
target: Succumb to the Darkness!

source: Return to oblivion!
target: Return to oblivion!

source: In Lord Zodiark's name!
target: In Lord Zodiark's name!

source: Shadows fall!
target: Shadows fall!

source: Memories...fading one by one...
target: Memories...fading one by one...

source: Past...present...future.
target: Past...present...future.

source: Infinite possibilities...condensed into a single moment!
target: Infinite possibilities...condensed into a single moment!

source: Pain shall be fleeting, joy everlasting...
target: Pain shall be fleeting, joy everlasting...

source: As I wish it, so shall the river of time flow!
target: As I wish it, so shall the river of time flow!

source: Your presence only deepens my solitude!
target: Your presence only deepens my solitude!

source: I will erase you and know unending bliss!
target: I will erase you and know unending bliss!

source: My memories will never be taken from me again...
target: My memories will never be taken from me again...

source: Disappear!
target: Disappear!

source: Even if my memory should fade...I will live on!
target: Even if my memory should fade...I will live on!

source: Follow Elidibus
target: Следуйте за Элидибусом

source: Defeat Ardbert
target: Одолейте Ардберта

source: Forward, hero. We shall see how strong you have become.
target: Смелее, герой. Посмотрим, <var 08 E905 ((какой сильной ты стала)) ((каким сильным ты стал)) /var>.

source: Rest assured there are no tricks. You need but defeat the enemies before you.
target: Не беспокойся, никаких неожиданностей. Тебе предстоит просто уничтожить врагов.

source: First, something easy. Those whom a budding hero might encounter at the beginning of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tale.
target: Сперва что-нибудь попроще... Как насчёт тех, с кем начинающий герой мог встретиться в самом начале своего путешествия?

source: And I believe I have the perfect subjects.
target: У меня найдутся идеальные кандидаты.

source: Let not their appearance stay your hand. Beneath the facade, they are merely monsters.
target: Надеюсь, тебя не смутит их внешний вид. Под этими масками всего лишь монстры.

source: But come, we shouldn't dwell on the beginning when so much of your story awaits.
target: Идём дальше. Интересное приключение только началось.

source: Every tale requires villains. Defeat them, and claim your place as a hero.
target: В каждой истории должны быть злодеи. Одолей их и заслужи звание героя.

source: Well done, champion of Eorzea. Well done. Onward, then, over the bloodied bodies of the fallen.
target: Отлично, защитни<var 08 E905 ((ца)) ((к)) /var> Эорзии. Отлично. Переступи через ничтожные трупы павших и пойдём дальше.

source: You tasted many sweet triumphs, yes. But so too did you taste bitter tragedy.
target: О, сколько сладких триумфов. Но тебе довелось познать и горечь.

source: Who could forget the Crystal Braves? That idealistic, pathetic dream born from a malformed creature.
target: Не <var 08 E905 ((забыла)) ((забыл)) /var> Храбрецов Хайделин? Эту идиотскую идею, придуманную тем неполноценным существом?

source: Faces you know and loathe, all. Let your hatred burn, and strike them down with all your might.
target: Знакомые тебе лица, о да. Дай волю своей ярости. Сокруши их со всей своей силой.

source: With such ease yet again. You did always grow stronger with every battle.
target: Для тебя проще простого. С каждым сражением ты всё сильнее.

source: But enough talk. It is not your assertions that I wish to know, but your strength.
target: Довольно болтовни. Мы тут измерения проводим — я хочу знать твои пределы.

source: Falsely accused of regicide, you fled for the snow-swept fields of Coerthas.
target: Обвинённ<var 08 E905 ((ая)) ((ый)) /var> в цареубийстве, ты <var 08 E905 ((сбежала)) ((сбежал)) /var> в снега Кёртаса.

source: Had you and the Scions met your demise that day in the sultanate, Lahabrea might have been spared his.
target: Если бы тебя и Хранителей в тот день уничтожили, быть может, Лахабреа остался бы жив.

source: But not only did you stubbornly live; you hurled yourself into the thick of the Dragonsong War.
target: Но ты не только крайне живучая тварь; ты <var 08 E905 ((влезла)) ((влез)) /var> в самую гущу Войны Драконьей Песни.

source: Swept along by the tide of events, you pursued and slew those who sought to stop the unending conflict. Just as you were bid.
target: Тебя подхватила волна событий, ты безжалостно <var 08 E905 ((выследила и убила)) ((выследил и убил)) /var> тех, кто мечтал закончить многовековой конфликт.

source: ...Or was it a thirst for vengeance that drove you?
target: ...А может, тебя вела жажда возмездия?

source: I trust you are beginning to limber up. Do keep up the fine form.
target: Ну что, <var 08 E905 ((размялась)) ((размялся)) /var>? Всё только начинается.

source: Around heroes, people are wont to flock. People who harbor all manner of motives, each baser than the last.
target: Вокруг героев всегда собирались люди. Люди, мотивы которых были один другого низменнее..

source: Come, let the curtains rise on the grand melee.
target: Вперёд! Да начнётся состязание Великих Компаний!

source: No more than they deserve. In the end, their hand of friendship was tainted with personal desire.
target: Они этого заслуживали. Их «дружба» продиктована чистым эгоизмом.

source: You know what comes next: you put an end to the Dragonsong War.
target: Все знают, что было дальше. Ты <var 08 E905 ((положила)) ((положил)) /var> конец Войне Драконьей Песни.

source: There is no saving your comrade this time. All you can do is cut off the serpent's head.
target: На этот раз спасти друга не получится. Тебе придётся отсечь голову змеи...

source: And as simple as that, a thousand-year war is brought to its conclusion.
target: И вот так, одним точным ударом, тысячелетняя война была завершена.

source: But every end marks a new beginning. And for heroes such as you, there is only ever conflict.
target: Что-то кончается, что-то начинается. Такие герои, как ты, живут войной.

source: Emperor Solus had kindled an insatiable flame. Garlemald was its name, and it raged across the land, consuming all in its path.
target: Император Сол разжёг неугасимое пламя. Имя ему было Гарлемалд, и оно поглотило все земли на своём пути.

source: Following the trail of ash, you set forth for Ala Mhigo and Doma, into a storm of blood.
target: Проследовав по дороге из пепла, ты <var 08 E905 ((отправилась)) ((отправился)) /var> в Ала Миго и Дому, навстречу кровавому шторму.

source: Again you fought, and again you grew stronger. So strong that we could no longer control you.
target: И снова битвы, и снова ты <var 08 E905 ((стала)) ((стал)) /var> сильнее. Насколько <var 08 E905 ((сильной)) ((сильным)) /var>, что мы больше не могли тебя контролировать.

source: Yours is an unnatural, beastly strength. And we shall lay it bare.
target: Воистину, сверхъестественная, звериная сила. Что ж, поглядим...

source: In order to gain a foothold in the liberation effort, you journeyed to Far Eastern plains.
target: Чтобы начать освобождение, ты <var 08 E905 ((отправилась)) ((отправился)) /var> в дальневосточные Степи.

source: There you encountered the land's greatest warriors, and sought to win them over to your cause.
target: Именно там жили величайшие воины своих земель, и тебе пришлось заработать их уважение.

source: The strong are drawn to the strong. Thus did you gather new allies to your banner.
target: Сильные тянутся к сильным. Тебе оказалось несложно заполучить новых союзников.

source: Yet where ardent souls gather, so too do fires burn. In this way did you consign those around you to the flames.
target: Но там, где собираются яростные души, непременно вспыхнет пламя. Ты <var 08 E905 ((повела)) ((повёл)) /var> их за собой в преисподнюю.

source: Burn them all, hero. Reduce them to nothingness, like the ephemeral morning dew they are.
target: Жги их, герой. И пусть не останется ничего — враги исчезнут перед тобой, как утренний туман.

source: You did not hesitate...or perhaps could not? No matter. Let us turn our attention to the finale.
target: Какая уверенность... а может, беспощадность? Без разницы. Нас ждёт финал...

source: Here we shall have a test between fellow beasts. It is only fitting, would you not agree?
target: Настоящее испытание, схватка двух истинных зверей. Собачьи бои в кровавой яме.

source: When I fought you in this flesh, 'twas I who triumphed. Will you turn the tables this time?
target: Когда я сражался с тобой, надев эту плоть, то смог одолеть тебя. Интересно, сможешь справиться на этот раз?

source: Come. We continue this within.
target: Идём. Продолжим внутри.

source: I may not be the real Ardbert, but you'd do well not to underestimate me.
target: Пускай я и не настоящий Ардберд, но недооценивать меня стало бы ошибкой.

source: All that made him the warrior he was─every battle waged, every blow swung─is part of my very being.
target: Всё, что делало его могучим воином — каждая победа, каждый взмах оружием — теперь часть меня.

source: So come! Fight me like you mean to take my head!
target: Ну, давай! Сразись со мной так, будто хочешь убить!

source: Good, good... I sense your murderous intent.
target: Хорошо, хорошо... чувствую, кровожадность в тебе пробудилась.

source: Aye, you'd kill me given the chance. Mayhap you think to recover this body?
target: Да, ты бы с лёгкостью <var 08 E905 ((убила)) ((убил)) /var> меня, если бы представился шанс. Чего тебя так беспокоит это тело?

source: If so, prove that it's no use to me! Prove that I can't best you with it!
target: Тогда докажи, что оно мне бесполезно! Докажи, что и с ним я не могу тебя одолеть!

source: Come! Come at me with everything you've got!
target: Давай! Давай! Бей как следует!

source: <pant> I see... You're a different beast from when you faced my creations...
target: Теперь... ясно... Те мои создания были для тебя ерундой...

source: Very well, I will transcend my very limits. And we'll see what you're truly capable of!
target: Хорошо, тогда я задействую все свои резервы. Поглядим, как ты справишься!

source: Hold nothing back! For neither will I!
target: Не сдерживайся! Ведь я не собираюсь!

source: <pant> <pant> I have my answer...
target: А!.. Ох... Мне всё понятно...

source:
Rex! There is no need for us to fight!
Let us help you!
target:
Rex! There is no need for us to fight!
Let us help you!

source: Is he planning to bring down the whole castrum!?
target: Is he planning to bring down the whole castrum!?

source:
I know that formation...
It was used in Werlyt all those years ago.
target:
I know that formation...
It was used in Werlyt all those years ago.

source:
So it's come to this...
But no matter what, I can't afford to lose!
target:
So it's come to this...
But no matter what, I can't afford to lose!

source:
Not even you can beat the Empire's finest!
Activating Oversoul!
target:
Not even you can beat the Empire's finest!
Activating Oversoul!

source:
Baelsar combat data ready.
Initiating organic core overwrite.
target:
Baelsar combat data ready.
Initiating organic core overwrite.

source: Allie, Alfonse... This is good-bye!
target: Allie, Alfonse... This is good-bye!

source: BEAR WITNESS TO THE GLORY OF THE EMPIRE!
target: BEAR WITNESS TO THE GLORY OF THE EMPIRE!

source:
This is Werlyt, at the time of the invasion...
Could the synthetic auracite be causing this!?
target:
This is Werlyt, at the time of the invasion...
Could the synthetic auracite be causing this!?

source: The end has come.
target: The end has come.

source: Prepare to advance!
target: Prepare to advance!

source: Forward!
target: Forward!

source: Form ranks!
target: Form ranks!

source: Fire!
target: Fire!

source: Deploy warmachina!
target: Deploy warmachina!

source: Commence airstrike!
target: Commence airstrike!

source: All troops, take your positions!
target: All troops, take your positions!

source: Your skills are impressive, but they will not be enough.
target: Your skills are impressive, but they will not be enough.

source:
Rex!
What have you done!?
target:
Rex!
What have you done!?

source:
What is the meaning of this?
Wait...that glow...
target:
What is the meaning of this?
Wait...that glow...

source: I'm sorry, Father. We've come too far to back down now!
target: I'm sorry, Father. We've come too far to back down now!

source: Your resistance ends here!
target: Your resistance ends here!

source:
With the power of the Emerald Weapon, we'll build a brighter tomorrow.
Farewell!
target:
With the power of the Emerald Weapon, we'll build a brighter tomorrow.
Farewell!

source: Arrive at the Clayclot Cauldron
target: Arrive at the Clayclot Cauldron

source: Clear the Clayclot Cauldron
target: Clear the Clayclot Cauldron

source: Arrive at the Clearnote Cauldron
target: Arrive at the Clearnote Cauldron

source: Clear the Clearnote Cauldron
target: Clear the Clearnote Cauldron

source: Arrive at the Kilnfire Cauldron
target: Arrive at the Kilnfire Cauldron

source: Defeat the mother porxie
target: Одолейте матерь-поро

source: First things first: we need to harvest some clay.
target: Итак, прежде всего нам понадобится глина.

source: Next, we need to get the water flowing again.
target: Далее — нужно восстановить водоснабжение.

source: Last but not least, we need to fire up the kiln.
target: Последнее, но не менее важное — разжечь огонь в печи.

source: All right, it's time to bake ourselves a porxie!
target: Отлично, теперь нужно обжечь этого поро как следует!

source: The clay can be had at the Clayclot Cauldron, ribbit. Through this portal, if you would.
target: Спустимся ниже. Там мы найдём глину. В этот портал, пожалуйста.

source: Please follow me, ribbit, and put down any pests that bar the way.
target: Прошу, следуйте за мной, и по пути квак-ничтожайте всех вредителей.

source: Allow me to assist you with the gap, ribbit.
target: Позвольте мне решить проблему с этой пропастью.

source: I did not imagine the place would be so infested, ribbit...
target: Я и не думал, что это место квак-шмя кишит всякими гадами...

source: The clay is just across the way...but you'll need to deal with the mudman first, ribbit.
target: Ступайте... там вы и найдёте глину. Но сперва нужно будет одолеть этого... грязнюка.

source: Now we have our clay, ribbit! Let us return to the interstice!
target: Глина у нас в квак-мане! Вернёмся ко входу!

source: It will be my pleasure to show you to the Clearnote Cauldron, ribbit. Please use this portal.
target: Позвольте проводить вас в крыло водоснабжения. Пожалуйста, войдите в этот портал.

source: For your own safety, I ask that you keep close to me, ribbit.
target: Держитесь ближе ко мне, ради квак-шей собственной безопасности.

source: Please wait while I move the lift, ribbit.
target: Сейчас... позвольте мне переместить эту платформу.

source: The little spring yonder ought to put a spring in your step, ribbit.
target: Этот живительный источник... <var 1A 02 /var>живо<var 1A 01 /var> доставит вас наверх.

source: Another lift, ribbit. Just a moment...
target: Ещё одна платформа. Квак-дождите немного...

source: I sense a mischievous presence, ribbit... Please take care.
target: Тут что-то не так... я прям чувствую. Осторожнее.

source: The water is flowing again, ribbit! Let us head back!
target: Отличные новости, народ! Вода снова потекла!

source: Step right through, ribbit, and I will guide you safely to the Kilnfire Cauldron.
target: В портал, пожалуйста — я проведу вас через огонь.

source: Off we go, ribbit. Please try not to fall behind.
target: Идём, идём! Пожалуйста, не квак-ставайте.

source: What the ribbit!?
target: Ква-кого дьявола?!

source: A little magma can't stop us, ribbit!
target: Лава? Тьфу. Видали кой-чего поинтереснее.

source: R-Ribbit! It's that big brute again!
target: К-квак! Это тот здоровяк, он вернулся!

source: Ugh, honestly! Smite this fiend once and for all, ribbit!
target: Ох-х, ну что такое! Хлопните уже эту тварь, да понадёжнее!

source: What a fiery battle that was, and I don't mean the magma! Your destination awaits!
target: Какая горячая лава! В смысле, битва! Идём, идём!

source: That takes care of the kiln, ribbit!
target: Ну вот, котёл запущен.

source: Tee hee hee! Let's play, let's play!
target: Хи-хи-хи! Поиграем?!

source:
Water, water, froth and churn.♪
Rage for me at every turn.♪
target:
Вода, вода, кружащий дом.♪
Обрушь всю ярость на врагов!♪

source:
Water, water, become spears.♪
Things of flesh and bone to pierce.♪
target:
Вода, вода, ты стань копьём.♪
Пронзи поганое ворьё!♪

source: Ahahaha, such fun! More water! We need more water!
target: А-ха-ха-ха, как весело! Водички! Ещё водички!

source:
Water, water, gather 'round.♪
Shroud the sky and soak the ground.♪
target:
Вода, вода, ты лей, кружи!♪
Весь мир и небо поглоти!♪

source: Noooooo, all my water is gone! But I can't lose! I won't!
target: Не-е-е-ет! Моя водичка-а-а-а! Но я не проиграю!..

source: Hmph! Why won't you get hit!?
target: Почему?.. Ну вы и хитрюги.

source:
Water, water, flow so swift.♪
Wash away and set adrift.♪
target:
Вода, вода, кружи, не стой!♪
Врагов моих скорее смой!♪

source: <whimper> All right, all right, I give up... You win...
target: Ай-яй... Ладно, ладно, я сдаюсь!.. Вы победили.

source: It's about to get turbulent in here! Take care you don't get sucked in!
target: Ну и ну, поднимается ветер? Глядите только, чтоб вас не засосало.

source: She's hidden herself! Find her quickly, or you'll be in for a world of pain!
target: Она спряталась. Скорее, отыщите её, иначе... кто знает? Ну явно ничего хорошего.

source: All right, let's see how well you handle the big girl.
target: Хорошо. Посмотрим, как вы с ней совладаете.

source: I'm the only one fit to protect her...
target: I'm the only one fit to protect her...

source: The Light will cleanse your sins!
target: The Light will cleanse your sins!

source: Come! Show me your strength!
target: Come! Show me your strength!

source: Let's try something else.
target: Let's try something else.

source: It's time we settled this.
target: It's time we settled this.

source: Only I can protect her!
target: Only I can protect her!

source: To think that this could be born from my memories...
target: To think that this could be born from my memories...

source: That creature is passing on its aether!
target: That creature is passing on its aether!

source: The Light's so strong, I can't sense anything else...
target: The Light's so strong, I can't sense anything else...

source: I sense a surge in aether...
target: I sense a surge in aether...

source: The blade is imbued with Light!
target: The blade is imbued with Light!

source: Wait... Didn't Gaia do something like this?
target: Wait... Didn't Gaia do something like this?

source: We can't fail here! We can't!
target: We can't fail here! We can't!

source: Defeat the Fatebreaker
target: Defeat the Fatebreaker

source: I've toyed with you long enough.
target: I've toyed with you long enough.

source: No... She still needs me...
target: No... She still needs me...

source: Defeat the Cloud of Darkness
target: Defeat the Cloud of Darkness

source: No light could ever reach us...
target: No light could ever reach us...

source: We shall engulf everything in our shadow...
target: We shall engulf everything in our shadow...

source: By the power of Darkness, we call forth life, boundless and irrepressible.
target: By the power of Darkness, we call forth life, boundless and irrepressible.

source: The Darkness swallows all, even the ground beneath your feet.
target: The Darkness swallows all, even the ground beneath your feet.

source: Clinging to one another will only hasten your descent...
target: Clinging to one another will only hasten your descent...

source: With balance comes life, insatiable and all-consuming.
target: With balance comes life, insatiable and all-consuming.

source: We shall return all to nothingness.
target: We shall return all to nothingness.

source: Hope, despair...they are what feeds us...
target: Hope, despair...they are what feeds us...

source: Unleash the shadows!
target: Unleash the shadows!

source: I will imitate your every move. When you attack, I attack. When you cast a spell, I'll cast a spell.
target: I will imitate your every move. When you attack, I attack. When you cast a spell, I'll cast a spell.

source: ...So you seek to do perfectly nothing, perfectly? A clever tactic, but I have the entire Masked Carnivale to mimic.
target: ...So you seek to do perfectly nothing, perfectly? A clever tactic, but I have the entire Masked Carnivale to mimic.

source: What's taking so long!? Drop the performance art and go for the throat, just like you've seen me doing business!
target: What's taking so long!? Drop the performance art and go for the throat, just like you've seen me doing business!

source: Very well. I shall emulate your way of “doing business.”
target: Very well. I shall emulate your way of “doing business.”

source:
Behold the essence of mimicry...
I answer your arcane assault in kind!
target:
Behold the essence of mimicry...
I answer your arcane assault in kind!

source:
Anything you can do, I can do better...
A strike for a strike!
target:
Anything you can do, I can do better...
A strike for a strike!

source: Protect Alisaie!
target: Защищайте Ализе!

source: Channel aether to Alisaie!
target: Передайте часть своего эфира Ализе!

source: Defeat the 2nd Order rocksplitter!
target: Одолейте прогрызателя 2-го Ордена!

source: Channel more aether to Alisaie!
target: Передайте ещё часть своего эфира Ализе!

source: The girl seeks to harm the patriarch with vile magicks! Kill her! Slaughter, slay, kill!
target: Девчонка что-то задумала! Патриарх в опасности! Убить её! Уничтожить, раздавить, убить!

source: Not if we have anything to say about it!
target: Ну что тут скажешь?..

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─draw the golems to me! I'll deal with them all at once!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> — подтащи големов поближе ко мне! Я с ними в два счёта разделаюсь!

source: ...Yes, it's ready! Go, Angelo!
target: ...Да, готово! Вперёд, Анжело!

source: Ugh, his tempering is too severe... <huff> I can't finish the job...
target: Ай... его перековка слишком сильна... уф... Я не могу...

source: So one person's aether alone is not enough...
target: Похоже, эфира одного человека не хватает...

source: They're targeting Alisaie! Everyone, gather close!
target: Они собираются ударить по Ализе! Эй все, соберитесь вместе!

source: Alphinaud! Let us lend Alisaie our aether!
target: Альфино! Мы с тобой должны передать часть эфира Ализе!

source: Thanks, you two... I'll give it another try!
target: Спасибо вам... Я снова попробую!

source: Ungh... I am nearing my limit...
target: А-а-ай... Я почти выдохся...

source: Seven hells, there's too many...
target: Седьмое пекло, их слишком много...

source: Leave this to me! Stand clear, all of you!
target: Оставьте это мне! Эй, все, разойдись!

source: Of all the reckless things... Alisaie─now's your chance!
target: Безумие... Ализе, давай — это твой шанс!

source: All right! Please... Please let this work!
target: Отлично! Прошу... Прошу, пусть сработает!

source: <huff> Almost there... <puff> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, please lend me your aether too!
target: Уф... почти... уф... <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, пожалуйста, поделись и своим эфиром!

source: Hehehe, you're dead now, girl! Finished, done for, dead!
target: Хе-хе-хе, конец тебе, девка! Смерть, финиш, конец!

source: No, Admiral! It's too dangerous!
target: Нет, Адмира! Это слишком опасно.

source: I made my decision before I came here. No matter what it costs me, Limsa will have peace.
target: Нет, я твёрдо решила перед тем, как прийти сюда. Чего бы мне это ни стоило, Лимса заключит мир.

source: Slay the last one! Exterminate, destroy, slay!
target: Убить <var 08 E905 ((последнюю)) ((последнего)) /var>! Уничтожить, размазать, убить!

source: Thank you! It will work this time, I promise!
target: Спасибо! На этот раз сработает, обещаю!

source: Ugh, just what we need...
target: Уф... вот этого не хватало...

source: Bombs! We can't let them get near Alisaie!
target: Бомбы! Нельзя позволить им добраться до Ализе!

source: Curses, more of them... Spread out and hold them off!
target: Чтоб его!.. Рассредоточьтесь и сдерживайте их!

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, a little more aether! Just a little more, and I can finish this!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ещё немного эфира! Самую малость, и я <var 1A 02 /var>смогу<var 1A 01 /var> это закончить!

source: Defeat the Shadowkeeper
target: Defeat the Shadowkeeper

source:
By your sacrifice, a warrior born...
I will show you no mercy, and expect none in return!
target:
By your sacrifice, a warrior born...
I will show you no mercy, and expect none in return!

source:
I am the Shadowkeeper!
There is no escape from me!
target:
I am the Shadowkeeper!
There is no escape from me!

source: Cloaked in shadow, I lie in wait!
target: Cloaked in shadow, I lie in wait!

source: Death stalks at every turn!
target: Death stalks at every turn!

source: Your shadow is mine to command!
target: Your shadow is mine to command!

source: Stabbed in the back, in more ways than one!
target: Stabbed in the back, in more ways than one!

source: My world, consumed by Darkness. The source of my power...
target: My world, consumed by Darkness. The source of my power...

source: All shadow is my dominion, and yours is no exception!
target: All shadow is my dominion, and yours is no exception!

source: For all your strength, you are helpless to resist!
target: For all your strength, you are helpless to resist!

source:
This is the end of our adventure.
You meant the world to me...
target:
This is the end of our adventure.
You meant the world to me...

source: Defeat Misija and her imperial troops!
target: Defeat Misija and her imperial troops!

source: Defeat Delta Gabriel!
target: Defeat Delta Gabriel!

source: Take no prisoners. I want them all dead!
target: Take no prisoners. I want them all dead!

source: あの金色の機体は、私が引き付けましょう！
target: あの金色の機体は、私が引き付けましょう！

source:
解放者殿は、ミーシィヤと、
その他の魔導兵器を頼みます……！
target:
解放者殿は、ミーシィヤと、
その他の魔導兵器を頼みます……！

source: Admirable... But futile nonetheless. Ready the delta armor!
target: Admirable... But futile nonetheless. Ready the delta armor!

source: 皆さん、私のところへ集まってください！
target: 皆さん、私のところへ集まってください！

source: くっ……皆さん、ご無事ですか……！？
target: くっ……皆さん、ご無事ですか……！？

source:
あの攻撃を耐え抜いただと……！？
だが、これで終いと思うなよ！
target:
あの攻撃を耐え抜いただと……！？
だが、これで終いと思うなよ！

source:
New magitek armor!? When did they find the time to─
No matter. We've come too far to retreat now.
target:
New magitek armor!? When did they find the time to─
No matter. We've come too far to retreat now.

source: We must divide and conquer, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I will draw this one's attention!
target: We must divide and conquer, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. I will draw this one's attention!

source: I will see to Misija. The remaining magitek armor is yours.
target: I will see to Misija. The remaining magitek armor is yours.

source: Round
target: Round

source: Clear staging node A
target: Clear staging node A

source: Clear staging node B
target: Clear staging node B

source: Clear staging node C
target: Clear staging node C

source: Clear staging node D
target: Clear staging node D

source: Clear the ascension platform
target: Clear the ascension platform

source: Clear Beyond
target: Clear Beyond

source: This is the tower's network. Its digital consciousnesses are here.
target: This is the tower's network. Its digital consciousnesses are here.

source: Don't waste time trying to understand. We're here to kill the enemy. That's all.
target: Don't waste time trying to understand. We're here to kill the enemy. That's all.

source: What, aren't you enjoying yourselves?
target: What, aren't you enjoying yourselves?

source: You know what will happen to the sphere's creations when it's destroyed.
target: You know what will happen to the sphere's creations when it's destroyed.

source: Don't worry about it. There's no actual meaning behind anything machines do.
target: Don't worry about it. There's no actual meaning behind anything machines do.

source: It's locked.
target: It's locked.

source: Right─I'll hack the door, you infiltrate the network and take down any guards.
target: Right─I'll hack the door, you infiltrate the network and take down any guards.

source: We're in! Let's go.
target: We're in! Let's go.

source:
Here we go again.
Hacking in three...two...!
target:
Here we go again.
Hacking in three...two...!

source: Whatever they're planning, we need to stop them before it's too late!
target: Whatever they're planning, we need to stop them before it's too late!

source:
To live...is to know loneliness...
To live...is to know love...
target:
To live...is to know loneliness...
To live...is to know love...

source:
I'll live as many times as it takes...
I'll die as many times as it takes...
To know... To know... To know...
target:
I'll live as many times as it takes...
I'll die as many times as it takes...
To know... To know... To know...

source:
They're all─
<var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>!
I don't want to be alone...
target:
They're all─
<var 1A 02 /var>No<var 1A 01 /var>!
I don't want to be alone...

source: Let your voices...be heard...
target: Let your voices...be heard...

source: Sing with me...
target: Sing with me...

source: Such...delights... Did you...have fun?
target: Such...delights... Did you...have fun?

source: You will be among the first to see the new world...
target: You will be among the first to see the new world...

source: Destroy the target.
target: Destroy the target.

source: ...But we still have some time. Why not enjoy it?
target: ...But we still have some time. Why not enjoy it?

source:
Multiple heat signatures coming from around the target.
Be ready!
target:
Multiple heat signatures coming from around the target.
Be ready!

source: Can you hear it? The final song...
target: Can you hear it? The final song...

source: We've waited so long to throw these gates wide...
target: We've waited so long to throw these gates wide...

source: Let the light in!
target: Let the light in!

source: Where...?
target: Where...?

source: All memory lives within me.
target: All memory lives within me.

source: It's manipulating the space around us.
target: It's manipulating the space around us.

source: So many dreams slumber here...
target: So many dreams slumber here...

source: Right below us!
target: Right below us!

source: Each memory's form is unique.
target: Each memory's form is unique.

source: Watch the periphery!
target: Watch the periphery!

source:
We will sooなく...danger...the traんろ.
To ensure your safety...pleassssさイ...
target:
We will sooなく...danger...the traんろ.
To ensure your safety...pleassssさイ...

source: Again!?
target: Again!?

source: The final song...just for you.
target: The final song...just for you.

source: You'll need to match wavelengths to create interference.
target: You'll need to match wavelengths to create interference.

source: You would render all this meaningless?
target: You would render all this meaningless?

source: You will soon find out how lowly you are.
target: You will soon find out how lowly you are.

source: They're going to fall. Move!
target: They're going to fall. Move!

source:
AH♪
               ah♪
ah♪ ah♪
target:
AH♪
               ah♪
ah♪ ah♪

source: Even if you defeat us... Do you really think you'll win?
target: Even if you defeat us... Do you really think you'll win?

source: We're prepared to fight until the end. Yours, or ours.
target: We're prepared to fight until the end. Yours, or ours.

source:
You fight and fight and fight...
You're made that way, after all.
target:
You fight and fight and fight...
You're made that way, after all.

source: You have so little control over your nature...
target: You have so little control over your nature...

source: All you can do is watch as the world falls to ruin.
target: All you can do is watch as the world falls to ruin.

source: A logic virus! It's interfering with my hacking!
target: A logic virus! It's interfering with my hacking!

source: Destroy its core!
target: Destroy its core!

source: We made it.
target: We made it.

source: Not half bad.
target: Not half bad.

source: Your little alliance is pointless.
target: Your little alliance is pointless.

source: You'll never compare to us.
target: You'll never compare to us.

source:
Ahahaha! You probably think you're clever.
But we've had just about enough...
target:
Ahahaha! You probably think you're clever.
But we've had just about enough...

source: Massive energy readings! Don't take your eyes off it.
target: Massive energy readings! Don't take your eyes off it.

source: Self-replication! There's another on the side!
target: Self-replication! There's another on the side!

source: Get as far away as you can!
target: Get as far away as you can!

source: It'll knock us off if we're not careful.
target: It'll knock us off if we're not careful.

source: Ahahaha! You'll never eliminate us...
target: Ahahaha! You'll never eliminate us...

source: A defense program. Choose your target carefully.
target: A defense program. Choose your target carefully.

source: You need to destroy the obstructing consciousnesses from inside the network.
target: You need to destroy the obstructing consciousnesses from inside the network.

source: Something's coming... Don't forget about that copy.
target: Something's coming... Don't forget about that copy.

source: An energy signal! Watch which way it turns.
target: An energy signal! Watch which way it turns.
68AA_
68AB_
68AC_
68AD_
68AE_
68AF_

source: Defeat the Telophoroi troops
target: Одолейте Уничтожителей

source: Locate the lunar primal
target: Отыщите лунных праймалов

source: Defeat the enemy forces
target: Одолейте врагов

source: Defeat Lunar Odin and defend the aetherial confluence
target: Одолейте Лунного Одина и защитите эфирное средоточие

source: Defeat Lunar Ravana and defend the aetherial confluence
target: Одолейте Лунного Равану и защитите эфирное средоточие

source: Defeat Lunar Ifrit and defend the aetherial confluence
target: Одолейте Лунного Ифрита и защитите эфирное средоточие

source:
Listen well, friends.
The Telophoroi are sweeping across Carteneau.
target:
Слушайте, друзья.
Уничтожители рассредоточились по Картено.

source:
As for the Ascian, he was briefly sighted above the battlefield, but has since vanished.
He likely intends to watch events unfold from afar.
target:
Асцианец был пару раз замечен над полем боя, но с тех пор пропал.
Наверняка он будет следить из теней...

source:
Thus far, the movements of the lunar primals have proven difficult to predict.
Even when poised to ambush our troops, they instead withdraw for some unknown reason...
target:
Передвижения лунных праймалов трудно понять.
Мы пытались устроить засаду, но вражеские войска по неизвестной причине отступают...

source: Whatever the Telophoroi's plan may be, the primals are our primary targets.
target: Какой бы ни была цель Уничтожителей, наша основная цель — праймалы.

source: Understood! They will not elude the Scions for long!
target: Ясно! Им не сбежать от Хранителей!

source: Let us divide our forces that we may locate the primals more swiftly. Thancred, Y'shtola, and I shall head east...
target: Разделимся, дабы побыстрее отыскать праймалов. Я с Танкредом и Я'штолой отправлюсь на восток...

source: Then I'll go west. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Alphinaud─ Come with me.
target: Тогда я на запад. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Альфино, со мной.

source: I'll concentrate my efforts on the tempered. With luck, I should have the chance to cure some of them.
target: Я займусь перекованными. Если повезёт, будет шанс их исцелить.

source: I will keep them occupied! The rest of you, seek out the primals!
target: Я отвлеку их! Остальные, на поиски праймалов!

source: Th-There are so many of them...
target: Их т-так много...

source: I won't be curing anyone at this rate... We'll have to incapacitate them first!
target: Ни о каком лечении не может идти речи... сперва нужно обездвижить их!

source: Their tempering has gone too far to treat them here on the battlefield...
target: Боюсь, их перековка слишком сильна... излечить их прямо сейчас не выйдет.

source: With this degree of physical alteration, I fear they are beyond help. Imperials or no, I hate to see them in such pain...
target: Если успели измениться их тела, исцеление невозможно. Пускай они и имперцы, такой боли не заслужил никто...

source: We must see that their suffering is not prolonged!
target: Я должен избавить их от страданий!

source: No more reinforcements, at least for the time being... Is everyone all right?
target: Пока никаких подкреплений... все в порядке?

source: Is that...Odin? So the time has come to pit my blade against his. Follow my lead!
target: Это... Один? Поглядим, чей клинок окажется сильнее. За мной!

source: Leave the chains to me! Urianger, it's your turn to act as shield!
target: Я разберусь с цепями! Урианже, твоя очередь быть щитом!

source: This does not bode well... We'd best brace ourselves!
target: Не к добру... Готовьтесь!

source: Ugh... Such strength! It will take all three of us to protect the confluence!
target: Уф... Такая сила! Нам втроём следует защищать средоточие!

source: But first, Thancred doth require our aid!
target: Но сперва окажем помощь Танкреду!

source: Odin is preparing to strike again! Stay out of his reach, but guarding the confluence must come first!
target: Один готовится ударить! Берегитесь его клинка — но не забудьте про средоточие!

source: He yet stands... A glutton for punishment, it would seem.
target: До сих пор жив... Груша для битья.

source: In which case, I'd be glad to oblige him!
target: Что ж, уважим его!

source: So it falls to us to protect the confluence from this fiend...
target: Значит, мы должны защитить средоточие от зверя...

source: That must be Ravana! A formidable opponent, by all accounts, but so are we!
target: Это Равана?.. Могучий оппонент, как ни крути, — но и мы не промах!

source: Like moths to the flame... We have to keep them from the confluence, but there are so many!
target: Словно мотыльки к огню... Нужно защитить средоточие, но их так много!..

source: Then allow me! A quick casting of Break should buy us time!
target: Позволь мне! Я применю <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>«Замри!»<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> — это выиграет нам время!

source:
That was a little close for comfort...
But now's our chance!
target:
Ладно, попробуем...
Шанс есть всегда!

source: He's gathering aether... G'raha, try stopping him with Break!
target: Он притягивает эфир... Г'раха, останови сферы заклинанием <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>«Замри!»<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

source: I have a way of breaking his defenses, but I'll need time. Keep him occupied!
target: Я сейчас разрушу его защиту, но нужно время!

source: Understood! Let us hope that Break works as intended...
target: Понял... Надеюсь, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>«Замри»<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> не подведёт...

source: All right, I'm ready... It's now or never!
target: Отлично, готово... Сейчас или никогда!

source: Lunar Ifrit... The one Arenvald and Fordola encountered!
target: Лунный Ифрит... Напавший на Аренвальда и Фордолу.

source: This one is not to be taken lightly. Be on your guard.
target: Серьёзный противник. Глядите в оба.

source: Whatever those are, they bode ill for us. Smash them to pieces, before it's too late!
target: Что за дьявольщина? Явно ничего хорошего. Разбейте их, пока не случилась беда!

source: More of them!? Our foe seeks to destroy the confluence, and us along with it!
target: Ещё?! Наш враг намерен уничтожить средоточие, и нас вместе с ним!

source: So, it's come to this...
target: Значит, настало время...

source: As long as I draw breath, I won't give in!
target: Пока я дышу, не сдамся!

source: It's time we ended this...
target: Пора кончать...

source: We cannot allow ourselves to be stalled here!
target: Нельзя тут долго задерживаться!

source: So they would overwhelm us with sheer numbers...
target: Значит, нас решили задавить числом?..

source: It seems we've earned a moment's respite...
target: Минутная передышка...

source: Then let us take this opportunity to cure the tempered!
target: Воспользуемся моментом, чтобы исцелить перекованных!
68EA_
68EB_
68EC_

source: I won't let you harm my sister!
target: I won't let you harm my sister!

source:
Time for my next trick!
G-Savior Mark II, opening containment field!
target:
Time for my next trick!
G-Savior Mark II, opening containment field!

source: Use the teleporter to move between decks!
target: Use the teleporter to move between decks!

source:
Accessing Ruby Weapon data, deploying claws!
Milisandia, grant me your strength!
target:
Accessing Ruby Weapon data, deploying claws!
Milisandia, grant me your strength!

source:
Accessing Emerald Weapon data, deploying beam units!
This is for you, Rex!
target:
Accessing Emerald Weapon data, deploying beam units!
This is for you, Rex!

source:
Accessing Sapphire Weapon data, opening chest armor!
I won't let you down, Ricon!
target:
Accessing Sapphire Weapon data, opening chest armor!
I won't let you down, Ricon!

source:
Accessing all Weapon data!
Now we fight together!
target:
Accessing all Weapon data!
Now we fight together!

source:
This was never going to be easy...
Let's see what you make of <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
This was never going to be easy...
Let's see what you make of <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: I have to keep fighting until my dream─<var 1A 02 /var>our dream<var 1A 01 /var>─has been realized!
target: I have to keep fighting until my dream─<var 1A 02 /var>our dream<var 1A 01 /var>─has been realized!

source: The true face of the Diamond Weapon...
target: The true face of the Diamond Weapon...

source: Stay sharp! It's far more agile than before!
target: Stay sharp! It's far more agile than before!

source:
The G-Savior cannot take much more of this!
Withdrawing for emergency repairs!
target:
The G-Savior cannot take much more of this!
Withdrawing for emergency repairs!

source:
The Mark II is in need of repair!
Fall back!
target:
The Mark II is in need of repair!
Fall back!

source:
Raising magitek field!
There's no escape!
target:
Raising magitek field!
There's no escape!

source:
At this rate, it'll overheat...
Restoring armor!
target:
At this rate, it'll overheat...
Restoring armor!

source: Don't worry, Allie. I'll keep you safe!
target: Don't worry, Allie. I'll keep you safe!

source:
G-Savior, returning to battle!
Opening containment field!
target:
G-Savior, returning to battle!
Opening containment field!

source: Removing the armor increases its speed, but it can't maintain that level of output. Now is our chance!
target: Removing the armor increases its speed, but it can't maintain that level of output. Now is our chance!

source:
Sorry to keep you waiting!
The repairs to the Mark II should keep it airborne for now!
target:
Sorry to keep you waiting!
The repairs to the Mark II should keep it airborne for now!

source:
So, it can enhance its agility, but only for a short while...
We'd best pin it down while we still can!
target:
So, it can enhance its agility, but only for a short while...
We'd best pin it down while we still can!

source: Purging armor! Diamond Weapon, show them what you're made of!
target: Purging armor! Diamond Weapon, show them what you're made of!

source: Today, we fight as one!
target: Today, we fight as one!

source:
<var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the strength we gave our lives to obtain...
The flame of hope will burn forever!
target:
<var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the strength we gave our lives to obtain...
The flame of hope will burn forever!

source:
Wait, that's not Allie!
No, it cannot be...
target:
Wait, that's not Allie!
No, it cannot be...

source: Our dream will not─cannot─end here...
target: Our dream will not─cannot─end here...

source: Arrive at A-4 Command
target: Arrive at A-4 Command

source: Clear A-4 Command
target: Clear A-4 Command

source: Arrive at A-4 Conquest
target: Arrive at A-4 Conquest

source: Clear A-4 Conquest
target: Clear A-4 Conquest

source: Arrive at A-4 Headquarters
target: Arrive at A-4 Headquarters

source: Defeat Stigma-4
target: Defeat Stigma-4

source: Intruder detected. Analyzing potential for knowledge acquisition... Affirmative.
target: Intruder detected. Analyzing potential for knowledge acquisition... Affirmative.

source: Additional data desired. Transferring Omega unit to present coordinates.
target: Additional data desired. Transferring Omega unit to present coordinates.

source: Recalibrating threat levels... Deploying draconic specimen.
target: Recalibrating threat levels... Deploying draconic specimen.

source: Analyzing combat data... Fascinating. Deploying new rocket-propelled armaments.
target: Analyzing combat data... Fascinating. Deploying new rocket-propelled armaments.

source: Capabilities exceed expected values. Initializing transformation sequence.
target: Capabilities exceed expected values. Initializing transformation sequence.

source: Neural structure of hostile life-forms analyzed. Stand by for interruption to combat functions.
target: Neural structure of hostile life-forms analyzed. Stand by for interruption to combat functions.

source:
まさか……敗北……
敗北したと……戦略に致命的な誤りがあったと……！？
target:
まさか……敗北……
敗北したと……戦略に致命的な誤りがあったと……！？

source: Projection into simulated memory confirmed. You now witness the final war between our kind.
target: Projection into simulated memory confirmed. You now witness the final war between our kind.

source: With the Alphatron Star's resources depleted beyond hope of sustainability, we were on the brink of destruction.
target: With the Alphatron Star's resources depleted beyond hope of sustainability, we were on the brink of destruction.

source: As part of the faction favoring subjugation of other stars, it created units for the upcoming invasion.
target: As part of the faction favoring subjugation of other stars, it created units for the upcoming invasion.

source: <whirr> Stigma-4 detected! Eliminate the unit guarding it and destroy its core!
target: <whirr> Stigma-4 detected! Eliminate the unit guarding it and destroy its core!

source: Stigma-4 has initiated evasive action. Establishing connection with next memory region...
target: Stigma-4 has initiated evasive action. Establishing connection with next memory region...

source: This memory region reflects our people's first encounter with another star─the subjugation of Gordhona.
target: This memory region reflects our people's first encounter with another star─the subjugation of Gordhona.

source: Configuring data stream... Neural pathway connected.
target: Configuring data stream... Neural pathway connected.

source: The Lambda unit before you was produced in Gordhona with local materials, as became our standard operating protocol.
target: The Lambda unit before you was produced in Gordhona with local materials, as became our standard operating protocol.

source: Stigma-4 has retreated into the next memory region. This unit requests you pursue with all haste.
target: Stigma-4 has retreated into the next memory region. This unit requests you pursue with all haste.

source: As this unit projected, this memory is of our conflict on the Dragonstar.
target: As this unit projected, this memory is of our conflict on the Dragonstar.

source: <whirr> The dragons' assault has created a breach in the barrier. Infiltrate the facility!
target: <whirr> The dragons' assault has created a breach in the barrier. Infiltrate the facility!

source: <whirr> Access to Stigma-4's perceived “self” confirmed! Destroy this core to overwrite its expectation of victory.
target: <whirr> Access to Stigma-4's perceived “self” confirmed! Destroy this core to overwrite its expectation of victory.

source: Alert: Your presence has been detected. Sentinel units approaching current coordinates!
target: Alert: Your presence has been detected. Sentinel units approaching current coordinates!

source: Those who would claim the resources of other stars clashed with those who believed that Alphatron might yet be saved.
target: Those who would claim the resources of other stars clashed with those who believed that Alphatron might yet be saved.

source: At this time, Stigma-4─then known as “Alpha-4”─was positioned in the weapons manufacturing facility ahead.
target: At this time, Stigma-4─then known as “Alpha-4”─was positioned in the weapons manufacturing facility ahead.

source: Now approaching command sector. Accessing administrative memory to disable security system...
target: Now approaching command sector. Accessing administrative memory to disable security system...

source: Our objective was to obtain the rich mineral resources of the Gordhonite asteroid belt─by any means necessary.
target: Our objective was to obtain the rich mineral resources of the Gordhonite asteroid belt─by any means necessary.

source: The Gordhonites boasted considerably advanced technology, but their machines proved inferior to the invading force.
target: The Gordhonites boasted considerably advanced technology, but their machines proved inferior to the invading force.

source: The dragons were our strongest enemy, and it was through their capture and study that Stigma-4 learned the principles of adaptive evolution.
target: The dragons were our strongest enemy, and it was through their capture and study that Stigma-4 learned the principles of adaptive evolution.

source: These principles were used to design the systems of the Omega model─first deployed in an unfinished state.
target: These principles were used to design the systems of the Omega model─first deployed in an unfinished state.

source: Arrive at Ingenuity's Ingress
target: Arrive at Ingenuity's Ingress

source: Clear Ingenuity's Ingress
target: Clear Ingenuity's Ingress

source: Arrive at Prosperity's Promise
target: Arrive at Prosperity's Promise

source: Clear Prosperity's Promise
target: Clear Prosperity's Promise

source: Arrive at Wisdom's Ward
target: Arrive at Wisdom's Ward

source: Defeat the Magus Sisters
target: Defeat the Magus Sisters

source: A foul place, this. Let us proceed with caution.
target: Нечестивое место. Ступайте с осторожностью.

source: They seek to bar our path. The only way is through!
target: Они пытаются нам помешать. Придётся проложить себе путь!

source:
Oh gods, poor Nidhana!
We'll free you from this place, I promise!
target:
О боги, бедная Нидхана!
Мы тебя вытащим, обещаю!

source:
I sense a great surge of aether, as if...
A summoning hath begun!
target:
Я чувствую резкий выброс эфира, словно...
начался призыв!

source:
Look! Those beastly masks!
It's the Manusya, come to life!
target:
Глядите, звериные головы!
Это призванные сёстры Мануса!

source: We will focus on sustaining the Arkasodara!
target: Мы останемся позаботиться об Аркасодра.

source: The rest of you must keep going! Onwards and upwards!
target: Остальные — продолжайте путь. Вперёд и вверх!

source: Begone from our tower...
target: Прочь из нашей башни...

source: Begone...or become prey for the Magus!
target: Уходите... или станьте добычей Чародеек!

source: Behold our ingenious magicks!
target: Узрите великолепие наших чар!

source: Dance! Dance until death claims you!
target: Станцуйте! Станцуйте со смертью!

source: So, you have chosen defiance...
target: Итак, вы решили сопротивляться...

source: The tower must be protected...
target: Нужно защитить башню...

source: We will not let it fall!
target: Башня не должна пасть!

source: You will not steal away our prosperity!
target: Вы не разрушите нашу благословенную страну!

source: We hear it! We heed it! The call to defend the tower!
target: Мы слышим! Повинуемся! Мы призваны для защиты башни!

source: If I alone cannot expel you...
target: Если в одиночку не выходит...

source: You persist in your desecration?
target: Осквернители, вы никак не остановитесь?

source: Then face the full wrath of the Magus!
target: Узрите мощь Чародеек!

source: Join with me, Sisters!
target: Со мной, сёстры!

source: Insatiable flame, consume our foe!
target: Ненасытное пламя, пожри наших врагов!

source: Glacial ice, entomb our foe!
target: Пусть лёд станет их могилой!

source: Thunderous tempest, smite our foe!
target: Яростная буря, порази наших врагов!

source: While my blessings endure, then so shall we...
target: Моё благословение держится, и мы держимся...

source: The end has come...and it will be beautiful!
target: Конец грядёт... и он будет великолепен!

source: Soon, my hold over Zodiark shall be complete...
target: Вскоре я полностью подчиню Зодиарка...

source: Mine...all mine!
target: Моим... он будет моим!

source: Ahahahahahaha!
target: А-ха-ха-ха-ха-ха!

source: The instrument of salvation...
target: Инструмент их спасения...

source: ...tolling the death knell of all creation!
target: ...Станет вестником всеобщей погибели!

source: Still...still you refuse to yield!?
target: Но вы... отказываетесь сдаваться?!

source: The natural order overturned...
target: Естественный порядок нарушен...

source: ...all in existence bent to my will!
target: ...Мироздание покорится моей воле!

source: Malice... Become flesh!
target: Злоба... воплотится!!

source: The great cataclysm...faithfully recreated.
target: Великий Катаклизм... наконец-то воссоздан.

source: From broken skies fall tears of flame...
target: С горящих небес обрушатся кометы отчаяния...

source: All shall burn!
target: Всё сгорит!

source: The marvels of Syrcus were but playthings...
target: Чудеса Башни были просто детскими игрушками...

source: I have no need for restraint!
target: Мне не нужны никакие оковы!

source: This cannot be... I am a god... A god!
target: Это невозможно... я бог... Я бог!

source: Now comes the end for you and all you hold dear.
target: А теперь конец вам и всему, чем вы дорожите.

source: Darkness rises!
target: Да восстанет Тьма!

source: Will you live to see the end?
target: Увидите ли вы апокалипсис?

source: How I've waited for this day!
target: Как долго я этого ждал!

source: My life's work...my masterpiece!
target: Работа всей моей жизни... шедевр!

source: At last, I am become Zodiark!
target: Наконец, я воплощение Зодиарка!

source: Have you the strength of will to alter man's fate?
target: Достанет ли вам сил выковать свою судьбу?

source: Crystals of Light, to me!
target: Кристаллы Света, ко мне!

source: Hear...
target: Услышь...

source: The song of creation's end...
target: Песнь конца всего сущего.

source: Feel...
target: Почувствуй...

source: The sorrow at hope's demise...
target: Отчаяние гибнущей надежды.

source: Think...
target: Вспомни...

source: And find your way in the Darkness.
target: И отыщи путь во Тьме.

source: Follow your Light...
target: Следуйте за вашим Светом...

source: Or fly, my children, and never look back!
target: Или бегите, дети мои, без оглядки!

source: Then you are resolved...
target: Значит, вы полны решимости...

source: ...but this test is far from over!
target: ...Но тест далёк от завершения!

source: The Light doth obey my command!
target: Свет подчиняется мне!

source: Succumb not to fear!
target: Не поддавайтесь страху!

source: Flee. You have been found wanting.
target: Отступите. Вы недостаточно сильны.

source: A change of arms... May the test continue!
target: Новое оружие... Да продолжится тест!

source: A change of arms... Mark well my movements!
target: Новое оружие... Следите за моими движениями!

source: By Crystal's Light...
target: Светом Кристалла...

source: And now this!
target: А теперь!..

source: Our hunt ends this day. There is nowhere you can flee that we cannot follow.
target: Охота в разгаре. Тебе от нас не скрыться, как бы ты ни пыталась скрыться.

source: Even stars must die.
target: Даже звёзды умирают.

source: We have seen the end.
target: Мы видели финал.

source: The same end, again and again.
target: Тот же конец, снова и снова.

source: All of us have known despair.
target: Мы все познали отчаяние.

source: A sorrow so deep only emptiness remains.
target: Отчаяние такое, что остаётся только пустота.

source: This is a kindness.
target: Это милосердие.

source: 'Tis so lonely between the stars.
target: Среди звёзд так одиноко.

source: Battered by the husks of the dead and dying.
target: Изломаны призраками мёртвых и умирающих.

source: If there is no happiness in life...
target: В житие нет счастья...

source: There is only one place it may be found.
target: Его можно отыскать только в одном.

source: Oblivion!
target: Забвении!

source: Dynamis?
target: Динамис?

source: No matter. You only delay the inevitable.
target: Неважно. Вы лишь откладываете неизбежное.

source: This is fate!
target: Это судьба!

source: Your time has come. It always does...
target: Ваше время пришло. Всегда приходит...

source: Light the way!
target: Вперёд!

source: What is this defiance?
target: Как вы сопротивляетесь?

source: No! The hatred, the pain, the loss...
target: Нет! Ненависть, боль, утраты...

source: We cannot suffer it again...
target: Только не снова...

source: What we saw... What I saw...
target: То, что мы видели... То, что я видела...

source: This can only end in misery and desolation!
target: Всё должно кончиться горем и опустошением!

source: No life, no star, nor the universe itself...
target: Никто живой, ни планета, ни сама вселенная...

source: None should hope for better!
target: Не смеют надеяться на лучшее!

source: Embrace the quiet!
target: Погрузитесь в тишину!

source: Utterly futile.
target: Бессмысленно.

source: Your suffering is at an end.
target: Ваше страдание скоро закончится.

source: We will stand against fate.
target: Мы бросаем вызов судьбе.

source: No matter the cost!
target: Чего бы это ни стоило!

source: We've been here before...
target: Это лишь очередная битва...

source: Many a time.
target: Одна из многих.

source: Thus do we know...
target: Мы твёрдо знаем...

source: To never give up.
target: Что сдаваться нельзя.

source: For hope will shine again!
target: Надежда снова разгорится!

source: 10 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
target: 10 секунд до Забвения...

source: 5 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
target: 5 секунд до Забвения...

source: 4 seconds until oblivion is sealed...
target: 4 секунды до Забвения...

source: 3 seconds...
target: 3 секунды...

source: 2 seconds...
target: 2 секунды...

source: 1 second...
target: 1 секунда...

source: Arrive at the central observatory
target: Arrive at the central observatory

source: Clear the central observatory
target: Clear the central observatory

source: Arrive at the saltcrystal strings
target: Arrive at the saltcrystal strings

source: Clear the saltcrystal strings
target: Clear the saltcrystal strings

source: Arrive at the Midnight Downwell
target: Arrive at the Midnight Downwell

source: Defeat Amon the Undying
target: Defeat Amon the Undying

source: All seems in order with the lens... And I trust you can hear me?
target: С линзами всё в порядке... Полагаю, вы меня слышите?

source: Those things are pure malcontent! The residue of lives unfulfilled.
target: Эти штуки — чистая злонамеренность! Те души, кто не достиг цели в жизни.

source: This brilliance, this warmth... It couldn't be...
target: Это великолепие, это тепло... Это ведь не может быть...

source: You cannot take this from me! Never will I surrender my devotion...my love!
target: Вы не отнимите у меня!.. Я не откажусь от своей преданности... своей любви!

source: Bear my pain unto my enemy's breast, Aglaea!
target: Пусть они ощутят часть моей боли, Аглая!

source: Not again... Never again will I yield to you!
target: Только не снова... Я вам не дамся!

source: My...lord... Gaius!!!
target: Мой... лорд... Гай!!!

source: As my life belonged to the Empire...in death, I shall serve!
target: Моя жизнь принадлежала Империи... я буду служить и в смерти!

source: I will fulfill my duty ere I rest. I must!
target: До самого конца я буду исполнять долг.

source: You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> fall to Tartarus!
target: Умрите под Тартаром!

source: Crumble before me!
target: Склонитесь передо мной!

source: Lord van Baelsar... Again...I fail you...
target: Лорд ван Бельсар... И снова... я вас подвёл...

source: Many faces have I worn, but this is my favorite by far...
target: Я примерял разные личины, но эта — моя любимая.

source: You will persist in this folly no longer!
target: Довольно с вас вашей глупости!

source: The stage is set...
target: Сцена готова...

source: Let the curtains rise for the main attraction!
target: Поднимем же занавес перед кульминацией!

source: My, what a boorish audience you are!
target: Какие вы всё-таки скучные.

source: Follow the flow of aether. It will guide you!
target: Воспользуйтесь потоком эфира. Он вас направит!

source: The aether is too dense... I'm losing you!
target: Эфир слишком плотный... Я вас теряю!..

source: In a rush of familiar wisdom, the memory of a principled Scion takes form.
target: Воскресает воспоминание о принципиальном Хранителе...

source: In a rush of familiar affection, the memory of a valiant Archon takes form.
target: Воспоминание о храбром архоне принимает форму...

source: In a rush of familiar delight, the memory of a kind-hearted knight takes form.
target: Воспоминание о добросердечном рыцаре принимает форму...

source: Arrive in Trnakiya
target: Arrive in Trnakiya

source: Clear Trnakiya
target: Clear Trnakiya

source: Arrive in Insight
target: Arrive in Insight

source: Clear Insight
target: Clear Insight

source: Arrive in Devatagara
target: Arrive in Devatagara

source: Clear Devatagara
target: Clear Devatagara

source: My friends, heed me─ These are children of Thavnair!
target:
Друзья, услышьте...
Они — дети Тавнира!

source: Forgive me... I could do them no harm.
target: Простите... Я не могу навредить им.

source: If this is the only way...
target: Если это единственный выход...

source: Screams...from the village! We must hurry!
target: Крики... из деревни! Скорее!

source: What is this vile presence I sense?
target: Что за нечестивую энергию я ощущаю?

source: The horde draweth near! Be on your guard!
target: Орда уже близко! Будьте настроже!

source: ...I shall silence the beasts of the air. Pray continue onward!
target: ...Я займусь тварями в воздухе. Ступайте дальше!

source: Arrive at the Frozen Sphere
target: Arrive at the Frozen Sphere

source: Clear the Frozen Sphere
target: Clear the Frozen Sphere

source: Arrive at Concept Review
target: Arrive at Concept Review

source: Clear Concept Review
target: Clear Concept Review

source: Arrive at the Celestial Sphere
target: Arrive at the Celestial Sphere

source: Defeat Hermes
target: Defeat Hermes

source: Please, turn back! Else I might be forced to...
target: Пожалуйста, уходите! Иначе я буду вынужден...

source: I'm warning you. Stay away.
target: Я предупреждаю. Ни шагу дальше.

source: I cannot let you take Meteion. Not yet.
target: Я не отдам вам Метион. Только не сейчас.

source: I must hear their answers before they are expunged from existence.
target: Я должен услышать ответы перед тем, как они исчезнут из мироздания.

source: I will have the time and tranquility I require.
target: У меня будет время и необходимая сосредоточенность...

source: Gust and gale, gather to me!
target: Воздух и ветер, ко мне!

source: Ancient brand, unleash your power!
target: Древние печати, покажите свою силу!

source: Stars on high, fall as rain!
target: Звёзды небесные, обрушьтесь на них!

source: Streams of aether, surge as one!
target: Потоки эфира, разите их!

source: Dancing winds, pierce my foes!
target: Танцующий ветер, пронзи моих врагов!

source: Even when transformed... But I am not finished yet!
target: Даже в этом облике... Но я ещё не закончил!

source: Reach Camp Broken Glass within the time limit
target: Достигните лагеря Битое Стекло за отведённое время

source: Board the magitek reaper and clear a path
target: Забирайтесь на магитехового жнеца и расчистите путь

source: Disembark the magitek reaper and proceed to Camp Broken Glass
target: Покиньте магитеховогого жнеца и продолжайте путь к лагерю Битое Стекло

source: ●瓦礫に伏せて隠れろ！
target: ●瓦礫に伏せて隠れろ！

source: ●仲間の待つ拠点へ急いで迎え！
target: ●仲間の待つ拠点へ急いで迎え！

source: Proceed while avoiding tempered imperials
target: Продолжайте путь, но берегитесь перекованных имперцев

source: Fight your way past the tempered imperials
target: Пробейтесь через перекованных имперцев

source: Assist the civilians in defeating the creatures
target: Помогите гражданским одолеть существ

source: Assist the civilians in defeating the transformed imperials
target: Помогите гражданским одолеть превращённых имперцев

source: With the last of your strength, crawl to Camp Broken Glass
target: Из последних сил ползите к лагерю Битое Стекло

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: Not bad at all, given your diminished capacity!<var 17 /var>Nevertheless, 'twould perhaps be prudent to keep to the shadows...<var 17 /var>...Scurrying about like a rodent!
target:
Неплохо, учитывая твою нынешнюю слабость.
И тем не менее, лучше тебе держаться теней.
...Бежать и прятаться, как крыса!

source: You there! Please, help us!
target: Эй, там! Помоги нам!

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source:
What was that voice...?
They've found us─get ready!
target:
Что это за голоса?..
Они нашли нас — готовьтесь!

source: That's it─ceruleum! Quick, let's get it back to the camp!
target: Это оно, это церулеум! Скорее, возвращаемся в лагерь!

source:
It's going to explode!
Get behind the armor!
target:
Сейчас взорвётся!
Прячься за бронёй!

source: Unable to escape the blast, you begin to lose consciousness...
target: Вам не удалось избежать взрыва, вы теряете сознание...

source: ...But your determination to save your friends drives you onward!
target: ...Но ваша решимость спасти друзей придаёт вам сил!

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source:
Time to familiarize yourself with that new body...
Might I suggest a little fight to the death?
target:
Время привыкнуть немного к новому телу...
Могу я предложить небольшое сражение насмерть?

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source: Find the magitek reaper's identification key and fuel
target: Отыщите идентификационную карту от жнеца и горючее

source: Speak with the wounded imperial
target: Поговорите с раненым имперцем

source: Activate the immobilized magitek reaper with the identification key
target: Активируйте выведенную из строя магитеховую броню при помощи карты

source: Search wrecked magitek reapers for fuel
target: Поищите горючее в обломках других жнецов

source: Carry the ceruleum tank to the immobilized magitek reaper and refuel it
target: Несите топливный элемент к выведенной из строя брони и заправьте её

source: ●不要になりました
target: ●不要になりました

source:
Pssst! Over here!
I'm inside this building. Come quickly!
target:
Пс-с-ст! Эй, там.
Я внутри, в этом здании. Тихо ты!

source: What a shame! You were too slow to keep my lord from your friends. Let the slaughter begin!
target:
Какой позор! Слишком медленно. Милорд уже добрался до твоих друзей.
Да начнётся резня!

source: Search around the immobilized magitek reaper for the person calling to you
target: Поищите обладателя голоса, который вас звал

source: Arrive at Magitek Servicing
target: Arrive at Magitek Servicing

source: Clear Magitek Servicing
target: Clear Magitek Servicing

source: Arrive at Martial Conditioning
target: Arrive at Martial Conditioning

source: Clear Martial Conditioning
target: Clear Martial Conditioning

source: Arrive at the Iron Womb
target: Arrive at the Iron Womb

source: Defeat Anima
target: Defeat Anima

source: My beautiful little boy will keep this tower free of vermin!
target: Мой славный маленький мальчик защитит эту башню от вредителей!

source: Uhhhngh!
target: Уф-ф-ф!

source:
Ouch! What are you doing, you foolish boy!?
The vermin are over <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
Ай! Что ты делаешь, глупый мальчик?!
Вредители <var 1A 02 /var>вон там<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Uhhhngh!
target: Уф-ф-ф!

source: Gah! I'll teach you to underestimate my genius!
target: Ха! Будете знать, как недооценивать мою гениальность!

source:
Wee hee hee!
Look upon the face of fear!
target:
Э-хе-хе!
Взгляните в лицо страху!

source:
Lord Zenos put me in charge for a reason!
I'll have your heads for playthings!
target:
Лорд Зенос поставил меня во главе не просто так!
Ваши головы пойдут на эксперименты!

source:
Wee hee hee!
I'll slice you in two!
target:
Э-хе-хе!
Я разрублю вас!

source:
Wee hee hee!
Even the mightiest of warriors can't fight without air!
target:
Э-хе-хе!
Даже самые могучие воины не могут сражаться без воздуха!

source: Nothing quite like good, old-fashioned explosions!
target: Старая-добрая взрывчатка, поехали!

source: Curses! You may have bested me, but you're no match for Lord Zenos!
target: Чтоб вас! Пускай вы меня и одолели, но лорд Зенос до вас доберётся!

source: We'd better clear the train of threats before we arrive, or things could get nasty!
target: Лучше нам очистить поезд от всех врагов, а то по прибытии нас зажмут в тиски!

source: Pathetic! Do the ironmen seek to slow us with these obstructions!?
target: Ничтожества! Железные люди правда надеются остановить нас такой жалкой силой?!

source: We're slowing down! Our destination must be close.
target: Мы замедляемся! Похоже, пункт назначения уже близок.

source: Look, captives! Help me free them!
target: Смотрите, пленники! Помогите мне освободить их!

source: You may leave them in our care!
target: Идите вперёд, мы тут разберёмся.

source:
A moment's reprieve...
From here onwards, we should split into three groups to divide their attention.
target:
Передышка...
С этого момента мы должны разделиться на три группы и отвлекать их внимание.

source: This is Lyse─we've unlocked the lift!
target: Это Лиз. Мы разблокировали лифт!

source: The alarum should be disabled now. With that, I believe we can use the lift!
target: Тревога тоже должна отключиться. Теперь мы можем воспользоваться лифтом!

source: I have smashed those noisy machines to pieces!
target: Мы разнесли эти шумные машины на кусочки!

source: The ironmen's contraptions were no match for the Sun!
target: Жалкие приблуды железных людей — ничто супротив Солнца!

source: What could they possibly need such an enormous lift for?
target: Для чего им такой громадный лифт?

source: Enemies!? In here!?
target: Враги? Здесь?!

source: So our paths diverge... Then let us see who gets there first!
target: Итак, мы разделяемся... Посмотрим, кто доберётся туда первым!

source: 増援は食い止めてみせるッ！
target: 増援は食い止めてみせるッ！

source: フン……お前たちも到着したか。
target: フン……お前たちも到着したか。

source: Go! I shall deal with these whelps!
target: Вперёд! Я разделаюсь с этими ничтожествами!

source: Anima begins feeding on souls!
target: Анима начинает поглощать души...

source: A horrific roar tears at the fabric of reality!
target: Жуткий рёв разрывает ткань реальности!

source: Wails of lamentation call forth chaotic energies!
target: Отчаянный плач порождает хаотичную энергию!

source: The altered reality plunges into chaos!
target: Изменённая реальность погружается в хаос!

source: Arrive at Smileport
target: Arrive at Smileport

source: Clear Smileport
target: Clear Smileport

source: Arrive at the Welcome Wheel
target: Arrive at the Welcome Wheel

source: Clear the Welcome Wheel
target: Clear the Welcome Wheel

source: Arrive at the Frame
target: Arrive at the Frame

source: Defeat the Big Cheese
target: Defeat the Big Cheese

source: Intruder alert! Intruder alert! Initiating extermination protocol.
target: Intruder alert! Intruder alert! Initiating extermination protocol.

source: Initiating frameworker scan...
target: Initiating frameworker scan...

source: Warning: you have entered the killing zone. Please stand by for bomb detonation, and remember─safety first!
target: Warning: you have entered the killing zone. Please stand by for bomb detonation, and remember─safety first!

source: I have been authorized to eliminate all visitors with <var 1A 02 /var>extreme<var 1A 01 /var> prejudice. Apologies for the inconvenience.
target: I have been authorized to eliminate all visitors with <var 1A 02 /var>extreme<var 1A 01 /var> prejudice. Apologies for the inconvenience.

source: Welcome to Smileton, intruders! Please enjoy your stay─it will be <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> brief.
target: Welcome to Smileton, intruders! Please enjoy your stay─it will be <var 1A 02 /var>very<var 1A 01 /var> brief.

source: Scan complete. Prepare for replicant synthesis.
target: Scan complete. Prepare for replicant synthesis.

source: Arrive in the playroom
target: Arrive in the playroom

source: Clear the playroom
target: Clear the playroom

source: Arrive at the banquet hall
target: Arrive at the banquet hall

source: Clear the banquet hall
target: Clear the banquet hall

source: Arrive in the ballroom
target: Arrive in the ballroom

source: Thwart Papa Gruff's ritual
target: Thwart Papa Gruff's ritual

source: You're inside, then? Excellent! I will do all in my power to assist you in thwarting the Gruff clan's vile scheme!
target: You're inside, then? Excellent! I will do all in my power to assist you in thwarting the Gruff clan's vile scheme!

source: Be sure to make use of the fiendish lantern I gave you should you encounter any voidsent!
target: Be sure to make use of the fiendish lantern I gave you should you encounter any voidsent!

source: Also, if you come across any lost souls, give them a good splash of holy water to guide them back to the mortal realm.
target: Also, if you come across any lost souls, give them a good splash of holy water to guide them back to the mortal realm.

source: These fiends hunger for more souls. Keep your nerves calm and your wits about you!
target: These fiends hunger for more souls. Keep your nerves calm and your wits about you!

source: Yay! A new friend to play with!
target: Yay! A new friend to play with!

source: Welcome to my banquet, friends. Pray join me in the dining room so I can─rather, so we <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> can feast.
target: Welcome to my banquet, friends. Pray join me in the dining room so I can─rather, so we <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> can feast.

source: How dare you ruin our banquet!? You shall pay for this with your life─no, with your very soul!
