source: You see that bubble around its puff? That must be how it channels its cleaning magicks!
target: You see that bubble around its puff? That must be how it channels its cleaning magicks!

source: グゴゴ、ゴゴゴゴ……！
target: グゴゴ、ゴゴゴゴ……！

source:
That grape-embossed helm...
'Tis the mark of a Sil'dihn-forged gladiator!
target:
Этот шлем с виноградным тиснением...
Это знак гладиатора, выкованного в Силь'ди!

source: Haaargh... Haaaaaargh!
target: Haaargh... Haaaaaargh!

source: He seems awfully...wrathful.
target: He seems awfully...wrathful.

source: Slay...the intruder...
target: Slay...the intruder...

source: Have a care! Those gusts will blow you clear into the air!
target: Have a care! Those gusts will blow you clear into the air!

source: Watch out! They had more boulders up there!
target: Watch out! They had more boulders up there!

source: Gather...the host...
target: Gather...the host...

source: Slaughter...the foe...
target: Slaughter...the foe...

source:
On your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
He builds his rage again!
target:
On your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
He builds his rage again!

source:
A hecatoncheir!?
Why would it make its lair in this muddy pit?
target:
A hecatoncheir!?
Why would it make its lair in this muddy pit?

source:
Why would a hecatoncheir be down here!?
It seems disinclined to let us pass peacefully...
target:
Why would a hecatoncheir be down here!?
It seems disinclined to let us pass peacefully...

source:
What <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that noise?
Something coming down the drainage pipes?
target:
What <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> that noise?
Something coming down the drainage pipes?

source:
Ugh, the reek of sewage is overpowering!
Does this hecatoncheir have no sense of smell!?
target:
Ugh, the reek of sewage is overpowering!
Does this hecatoncheir have no sense of smell!?

source:
That bluish film atop the water <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> ceruleum!
But that hardly explains the hecatoncheir in the room...
target:
That bluish film atop the water <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> ceruleum!
But that hardly explains the hecatoncheir in the room...

source:
Watch your footing!
'Tis coming up through the floor!
target:
Watch your footing!
'Tis coming up through the floor!

source:
Is that a hecatoncheir!?
And what are those in the walls? Windmills?
target:
Is that a hecatoncheir!?
And what are those in the walls? Windmills?

source:
Is that a hecatoncheir!?
And those rollers... Some form of conveyance?
target:
Is that a hecatoncheir!?
And those rollers... Some form of conveyance?

source:
Careful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
That machinery is still in working order!
target:
Careful, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
That machinery is still in working order!

source: Is he playing games...? Mind the barrel tops─there must be a reason for those markings.
target: Is he playing games...? Mind the barrel tops─there must be a reason for those markings.

source: Which lift will you raise?
target: Which lift will you raise?

source: The left lift.
target: The left lift.

source: The right lift.
target: The right lift.

source: Cancel.
target: Cancel.

source: What will you say?
target: What will you say?

source: The blessed spark.
target: The blessed spark.

source: The sacred fire.
target: The sacred fire.

source: Cancel.
target: Cancel.

source: Which way will you turn the handle?
target: Which way will you turn the handle?

source: Left.
target: Left.

source: Right.
target: Right.

source: Cancel.
target: Cancel.

source: Which statuette will you place?
target: Which statuette will you place?

source: The Helm.
target: The Helm.

source: The Gem.
target: The Gem.

source: The Flame.
target: The Flame.

source: The Fruit.
target: The Fruit.

source: Cancel.
target: Cancel.

source: Which lever will you pull?
target: Which lever will you pull?

source: The left one.
target: The left one.

source: The right one.
target: The right one.

source: Cancel.
target: Cancel.

source: And victory is yours! I am blessed to keep company with such a formidable ally.
target: And victory is yours! I am blessed to keep company with such a formidable ally.

source: Ah, that breeze feels wonderful after the stuffy closeness of the tunnels.
target: Ah, that breeze feels wonderful after the stuffy closeness of the tunnels.

source:
Bother. My key was not made to open this gate.
...Hm? It says here, “Two eyes are needed to see.”
target:
Bother. My key was not made to open this gate.
...Hm? It says here, “Two eyes are needed to see.”

source:
Two eyes...
Some manner of riddle, do you suppose?
target:
Two eyes...
Some manner of riddle, do you suppose?

source: Oh! This was no simple pattern on the floor! It was a teleportation portal!
target: Oh! This was no simple pattern on the floor! It was a teleportation portal!

source: Let's see where it leads, shall we?
target: Let's see where it leads, shall we?

source: Golems! And blocking the path we mean to take, no less.
target: Golems! And blocking the path we mean to take, no less.

source: Who would have abandoned their cleaning gear in here?
target: Who would have abandoned their cleaning gear in here?

source: ...And why do I feel I've seen these particular brushes before?
target: ...And why do I feel I've seen these particular brushes before?

source: 'Twould seem you discovered the custodian's closet...
target: 'Twould seem you discovered the custodian's closet...

source: Have you heard the Ul'dahn folktale of the magicked ewer?
target: Have you heard the Ul'dahn folktale of the magicked ewer?

source: 'Tis said that it could scoop up any amount of water at once, and was locked away after it drained an entire oasis.
target: 'Tis said that it could scoop up any amount of water at once, and was locked away after it drained an entire oasis.

source: I know this creature! This is the silkie─a familiar which cleaned the palace, once upon a time.
target: Я знаю это существо! Это знакомая силки, которая когда-то давно убирала дворец.

source: That final burst of aether confirmed my suspicions: 'twas definitely Mother who created the silkie.
target: Этот последний всплеск эфира подтвердил мои подозрения: это действительно силки что создала моя мать.

source: What have we here...?
target: What have we here...?

source: Such a beautiful garden! Not the sort of place one expects to find at the end of a grimy tunnel.
target: Such a beautiful garden! Not the sort of place one expects to find at the end of a grimy tunnel.

source: And this tableware...
target: And this tableware...

source: These things belonged to Mother and Father!
target: These things belonged to Mother and Father!

source: This must have been their quiet little retreat; the familiar put in place to protect it.
target: This must have been their quiet little retreat; the familiar put in place to protect it.

source: I should have liked to come here with them, but 'tis comforting to feel the echo of their presence, nonetheless.
target: I should have liked to come here with them, but 'tis comforting to feel the echo of their presence, nonetheless.

source: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.
target: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.

source: This rug, too, seems a relatively recent addition. See how the stone beneath it is cracked and worn?
target: This rug, too, seems a relatively recent addition. See how the stone beneath it is cracked and worn?

source: 'Tis doubtful some thief had a sudden fit of decorating...but we shall leave it for now. Other mysteries abound.
target: 'Tis doubtful some thief had a sudden fit of decorating...but we shall leave it for now. Other mysteries abound.

source: Talk of jugs behind barred doors reminded me of the legend, is all. Shall we continue on?
target: Talk of jugs behind barred doors reminded me of the legend, is all. Shall we continue on?

source: I know this creature! This is the silkie─a familiar which cleaned the palace, once upon a time.
target: Я знаю это существо! Это знакомая силки, которая когда-то давно убирала дворец.

source:
The silkie's aether...
It had the exact same feel as Mother's.
target:
Эфир Силки...
Точно такой же, как у того что был у матери.

source: What have we here...?
target: What have we here...?

source: Such a beautiful garden! Not the sort of place one expects to find at the end of a grimy tunnel.
target: Such a beautiful garden! Not the sort of place one expects to find at the end of a grimy tunnel.

source: And I see we have more out-of-place furniture. Wait...could this also be Mother's doing?
target: And I see we have more out-of-place furniture. Wait...could this also be Mother's doing?

source: My parents had a haven they escaped to when they wished to be alone. And I believe we've just found it.
target: My parents had a haven they escaped to when they wished to be alone. And I believe we've just found it.

source: Is this the reason they gifted me the key? Was this what I was supposed to see?
target: Is this the reason they gifted me the key? Was this what I was supposed to see?

source: Nay, as lovely as this secluded sanctuary is, I suspect the gesture held greater significance...
target: Nay, as lovely as this secluded sanctuary is, I suspect the gesture held greater significance...

source: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.
target: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.

source: And victory is yours! I am blessed to keep company with such a formidable ally.
target: And victory is yours! I am blessed to keep company with such a formidable ally.

source: The path leads on and...out? We should brace ourselves for what lies ahead.
target: The path leads on and...out? We should brace ourselves for what lies ahead.

source: All this greenery makes for a nice change. And look: have you ever seen fruits like these!?
target: All this greenery makes for a nice change. And look: have you ever seen fruits like these!?

source: Aha! That seemed to do the trick...though the riddle itself yet confounds me. A puzzle for another day.
target: Aha! That seemed to do the trick...though the riddle itself yet confounds me. A puzzle for another day.

source: Such fluffy, puffy flowers...
target: Such fluffy, puffy flowers...

source: Gracious! Is that...a gigantic mouse?
target: Gracious! Is that...a gigantic mouse?

source:
The silkie's aether...
It had the exact same feel as Mother's.
target:
Эфир Силки...
Точно такой же, как у того что был у матери.

source: My, what a picturesque scene! See how the sunlight falls upon the flowers just so.
target: My, what a picturesque scene! See how the sunlight falls upon the flowers just so.

source: I wonder, could this be the sanctuary of which my parents spoke?
target: I wonder, could this be the sanctuary of which my parents spoke?

source: They told me of a private place to which they would slip away; a haven from the bustle of palace life.
target: They told me of a private place to which they would slip away; a haven from the bustle of palace life.

source: Mother always called it their “secret garden.”
target: Mother always called it their “secret garden.”

source: And assuming that giant mouse─the silkie─was hers, then I imagine it was here to protect their special spot.
target: Если предположить, что эта гигантская мышь — силки матери, видимо она была всё это время здесь, для защиты их особого места.

source: Finding this place must have been the reason Father gave me the key. One reason, at least.
target: Finding this place must have been the reason Father gave me the key. One reason, at least.

source: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.
target: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.

source: I know this creature! This is the silkie─a familiar which cleaned the palace, once upon a time.
target: Я знаю это существо! Это знакомая силки, которая когда-то давно убирала дворец.

source:
The silkie's aether...
It had the exact same feel as Mother's.
target:
Эфир Силки...
Точно такой же, как у того что был у матери.

source: My, what a beautiful garden! See how the sunlight falls upon the flowers just so.
target: My, what a beautiful garden! See how the sunlight falls upon the flowers just so.

source: Mother must have wanted to protect this place. Why else set the silkie to guard it?
target: Мать, должно быть, хотела защитить это место. Иначе зачем было оставлять силки охранять его?

source: I imagine her coming here with Father, to simply sit and enjoy the tranquility.
target: I imagine her coming here with Father, to simply sit and enjoy the tranquility.

source: A shelf full of cutlery, and a table made for two... This is a haven of joyful memories.
target: A shelf full of cutlery, and a table made for two... This is a haven of joyful memories.

source: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.
target: <sigh> Whilst I should like to linger still, I fear Papashan will soon note my absence. Let us be away.

source: Mother. Father. I will do all in my power to see this sanctuary remains unspoiled.
target: Mother. Father. I will do all in my power to see this sanctuary remains unspoiled.

source: That jug... 'Tis not possible!
target: That jug... 'Tis not possible!

source: Ware the deluge of water! You will be washed away for sure!
target: Ware the deluge of water! You will be washed away for sure!

source:
All those puffs in a row...
You had best keep on your toes!
target:
All those puffs in a row...
You had best keep on your toes!

source: Is...is this a battle, or a spot of spring cleaning?
target: Is...is this a battle, or a spot of spring cleaning?

source:
The puffs are lathered with soap now...
I fear they mean business!
target:
The puffs are lathered with soap now...
I fear they mean business!

source: Clear the Sil'dihn Subterrane
target: Исследовать подземелье Силь'ди

source: Clear the refuge of the wise
target: Clear the refuge of the wise

source: Defeat the silkie
target: Одолейте Силки

source: Clear the refuge of the powerful
target: Clear the refuge of the powerful

source: Defeat the gladiator of Sil'dih
target: Одолейте Гладиатора Силь'ди

source: Defeat Shadowcaster Zeless Gah
target: Одолеть Теневого мастера Зелесс Гаха

source: Clear the Way of the Wise
target: Clear the Way of the Wise

source: Clear the River of Knowledge
target: Clear the River of Knowledge

source: Clear the briny deep
target: Clear the briny deep

source: Clear the windward pass
target: Clear the windward pass

source: Clear the stairway to the seventh
target: Clear the stairway to the seventh

source: Clear the highest heaven
target: Clear the highest heaven

source: I'll teach you the ways of navigation!
target: I'll teach you the ways of navigation!

source: Mine are the waves and the winds!
target: Mine are the waves and the winds!

source: Feel the might of the Navigator!
target: Feel the might of the Navigator!

source: Like the stormy seas, I'm a harsh mistress!
target: Like the stormy seas, I'm a harsh mistress!

source: Can you contend with she who rules the tides?
target: Can you contend with she who rules the tides?

source: You must make an ally of the wind!
target: You must make an ally of the wind!

source: You're bloody brilliant, you are!
target: You're bloody brilliant, you are!

source: Rise above the whitecaps!
target: Rise above the whitecaps!

source: Boundless as the ocean!
target: Boundless as the ocean!

source: Brace for the storm!
target: Brace for the storm!

source: My trident parts the very seas!
target: My trident parts the very seas!

source: Hahaha, well done!
target: Hahaha, well done!

source: You don't disappoint!
target: You don't disappoint!

source: You can surely do better than that.
target: You can surely do better than that.

source: To seek new horizons, you must come together as one.
target: To seek new horizons, you must come together as one.

source: It falls to you and yours to navigate the seas ahead.
target: It falls to you and yours to navigate the seas ahead.

source: Come, Perykos! Thalaos!
target: Come, Perykos! Thalaos!

source: Join us in the excitement!
target: Join us in the excitement!

source: Go on, my pets! Don't be shy!
target: Go on, my pets! Don't be shy!

source: I trust you don't mind if they play too.
target: I trust you don't mind if they play too.

source: That's the way, my clever serpents!
target: That's the way, my clever serpents!

source: Go, Perykos!
target: Go, Perykos!

source: A serpent after my own heart!
target: A serpent after my own heart!

source: Swim free, my pet!
target: Swim free, my pet!

source: Go, Thalaos!
target: Go, Thalaos!

source: Yes, frolic to your heart's content!
target: Yes, frolic to your heart's content!

source: Dance upon the waves!
target: Dance upon the waves!

source: Oi, cut it out, you!
target: Oi, cut it out, you!

source: Come, mortals. Make your way through our watery sanctum.
target: Come, mortals. Make your way through our watery sanctum.

source: Let us see how you fare against my servants.
target: Let us see how you fare against my servants.

source: Only to be expected for they who vanquished my pupil Byregot.
target: Only to be expected for they who vanquished my pupil Byregot.

source: It shall be my pleasure to welcome you personally.
target: It shall be my pleasure to welcome you personally.

source: Smooth sailing so far, I see. Come, then, mortals!
target: Smooth sailing so far, I see. Come, then, mortals!

source: All hands, prepare to set sail!
target: All hands, prepare to set sail!

source: Time to put to sea!
target: Time to put to sea!

source: Have you got the stones to face the Navigator?
target: Have you got the stones to face the Navigator?

source: Come on, don't keep me waiting!
target: Come on, don't keep me waiting!

source: Let me prepare a suitable stage for our union!
target: Let me prepare a suitable stage for our union!

source: After all this time, it feels strange calling to you thus.
target: After all this time, it feels strange calling to you thus.

source: Thank you. For making it this far.
target: Thank you. For making it this far.

source: Not long now till our journey together must end...
target: Not long now till our journey together must end...

source: I shall open the way forward.
target: I shall open the way forward.

source: Our clash has brought us closer to our true nature.
target: Our clash has brought us closer to our true nature.

source: The finishing touches, we leave to you.
target: The finishing touches, we leave to you.

source: You're back! The Omphalos─it suddenly transformed...
target: You're back! The Omphalos─it suddenly transformed...

source: Servants!? What's the meaning of this?
target: Servants!? What's the meaning of this?

source: Those ones, I leave to you!
target: Those ones, I leave to you!

source: It seems we're being summoned...
target: It seems we're being summoned...

source: Go, my friend! I will stay here with the others!
target: Go, my friend! I will stay here with the others!

source: So the time is come...
target: So the time is come...

source: I am the last of us to face you.
target: I am the last of us to face you.

source: Bask in the breath of the firmament!
target: Bask in the breath of the firmament!

source: Stand firm amidst the storm!
target: Stand firm amidst the storm!

source: Gathering gusts, rise to the heavens!
target: Gathering gusts, rise to the heavens!

source: Behold the Wanderer's arrow!
target: Behold the Wanderer's arrow!

source: My bowstring sings!
target: My bowstring sings!

source: Wind guide my arrow!
target: Wind guide my arrow!

source: Those who hesitate are lost!
target: Those who hesitate are lost!

source: Stay not your steps!
target: Stay not your steps!

source: Here our journey ends...
target: Here our journey ends...

source: There!
target: There!

source: You must persevere!
target: You must persevere!

source: Arise!
target: Arise!

source: Let all be equal!
target: Let all be equal!

source: Your prayers have given us strength.
target: Your prayers have given us strength.

source: Your prayers have given us strength. By fighting you, that strength shall be returned to the star.
target: Your prayers have given us strength. By fighting you, that strength shall be returned to the star.

source: Come, grant us our heart's desire!
target: Come, grant us our heart's desire!

source: Yes... Mankind has indeed grown strong.
target: Yes... Mankind has indeed grown strong.

source: You can overcome this─I know you can.
target: You can overcome this─I know you can.

source: No more than I expected.
target: No more than I expected.

source: Give me cause to believe in mankind.
target: Give me cause to believe in mankind.

source: When this battle is over, I...
target: When this battle is over, I...

source: I'm glad that it was you who came to us.
target: I'm glad that it was you who came to us.

source: Ahh, the sweet sorrow of parting...
target: Ahh, the sweet sorrow of parting...

source: I beg you, stay the course to the end!
target: I beg you, stay the course to the end!

source: Blessings be upon you on the road ahead.
target: Blessings be upon you on the road ahead.

source: May the wind ever be at your back.
target: May the wind ever be at your back.

source: Strong are they who roam!
target: Strong are they who roam!

source: Come, children. Fulfill our final wish.
target: Come, children. Fulfill our final wish.

source: See every last mote of us returned to the star!
target: See every last mote of us returned to the star!

source: By the power vested in us!
target: By the power vested in us!

source: More!
target: More!

source: Shine like the stars on high!
target: Shine like the stars on high!

source: Mercy be upon our beloved children!
target: Mercy be upon our beloved children!

source: In unity lies resilience!
target: In unity lies resilience!

source: The only way is forward!
target: The only way is forward!

source: Overcome our final test!
target: Overcome our final test!

source: In wisdom lies strength!
target: In wisdom lies strength!

source: Fight! Fight with all your being!
target: Fight! Fight with all your being!

source: Be strong, good children!
target: Be strong, good children!

source: Receive of our love─and transcend it!
target: Receive of our love─and transcend it!

source: Ever has mankind hoped and prayed.
target: Ever has mankind hoped and prayed.

source: And those hopes and prayers have given us form.
target: And those hopes and prayers have given us form.

source: Unto the star, we surrender our all!
target: Unto the star, we surrender our all!

source: Ahhh, you have truly come far...
target: Ahhh, you have truly come far...

source: Blessings be upon Etheirys.
target: Blessings be upon Etheirys.

source: Not a single mote of strength shall we hold back!
target: Not a single mote of strength shall we hold back!

source: 'Twas your faith that gave rise to this radiance!
target: 'Twas your faith that gave rise to this radiance!

source: The moon forms at Menphina's command!
target: The moon forms at Menphina's command!

source: The moon begins to wax...
target: The moon begins to wax...

source: Time accelerates at Althyk's command!
target: Time accelerates at Althyk's command!

source: I have looked forward to this moment, children of man.
target: I have looked forward to this moment, children of man.

source: The Scholar shall measure your depth of knowledge.
target: The Scholar shall measure your depth of knowledge.

source: O waters purifying, reveal their nature!
target: O waters purifying, reveal their nature!

source: The rivers rage at my behest!
target: The rivers rage at my behest!

source: 'Tis time for a test.
target: 'Tis time for a test.

source: At what answer will you arrive, I wonder.
target: At what answer will you arrive, I wonder.

source: Seek new perspectives, and you shall find new paths.
target: Seek new perspectives, and you shall find new paths.

source: Let flow the waters of your mind!
target: Let flow the waters of your mind!

source: Prove to me the wisdom of man!
target: Prove to me the wisdom of man!

source: Of ignorance be cleansed!
target: Of ignorance be cleansed!

source: Let us enlighten one another!
target: Let us enlighten one another!

source: Not all knowledge is wisdom!
target: Not all knowledge is wisdom!

source: Share with me your ruminations.
target: Share with me your ruminations.

source: Not all answers can be obtained through might.
target: Not all answers can be obtained through might.

source: Small wonder the others have exulted so.
target: Small wonder the others have exulted so.

source: Join me in deepest knowledge.
target: Join me in deepest knowledge.

source: Well done, wise children. Well done.
target: Well done, wise children. Well done.

source: Such rich, exquisite aether...
target: Какой богатый, исключительный эфир...

source: My hair shimmers with anticipation!
target: Мои локоны дрожат в предвкушении!

source: On your guard!
target: Защищайтесь!

source: Have at you!
target: Получите!

source: Fall!
target: Умрите!

source: Try this!
target: Выкусите!

source: My locks are as the wind...
target: Мои локоны словно ветер...

source: Supple, strong, and free!
target: Гибкие, сильные и свободные!

source: Ah, a fair wind blows!
target: О, попутный ветер!

source: You feel it too, do you not?
target: Вы ведь тоже его чувствуете?

source: You've done well to last this long...
target: Вы отлично продержались...

source: But the battle has only just begun!
target: Но битва только начинается!

source: Ahahahaha!
target: А-ха-ха-ха-ха!

source: I'll slaughter you all!
target: Вы все подохнете!

source: Dodge this if you can!
target: Попробуйте увернитесь!

source: I'll make it quick!
target: Будет быстро!

source: Feel my fury!
target: Почувствуйте мой гнев!

source: Know your place!
target: Знайте своё место!

source: You can't escape the storm!
target: От шторма не убежишь!

source: I'll break your every bone!
target: Я сломаю все кости в ваших телах!

source: Don't underestimate me!
target: Не стоит меня недооценивать!

source: Begone from my sight!
target: Прочь с глаз моих!

source: The insolence!
target: Наглость!

source: Let's try this again!
target: Попробуем снова!

source: There will be nothing left of you! Nothing!
target: От вас ничего не останется. Ничего!

source: The time for play is over.
target: Время игр кончено.

source: You won't leave my domain alive!
target: Вы не уйдёте с этого аллода живыми!

source: No! Do not look upon me! Leave now or...or...<var 1A 02 /var>DIE<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: No! Do not look upon me! Leave now or...or...<var 1A 02 /var>DIE<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Is this what became of the keyward? How dreadful...
target: Is this what became of the keyward? How dreadful...

source: She means to send you plummeting into the abyss. Allow me to soften your landing.
target: She means to send you plummeting into the abyss. Allow me to soften your landing.

source: Perhaps you require more room for heroics.
target: Perhaps you require more room for heroics.

source: Leave me to my research, or be...<var 1A 02 /var>become<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: Leave me to my research, or be...<var 1A 02 /var>become<var 1A 01 /var>...

source: I shall give you ground on which to fight, but you must move deftly!
target: I shall give you ground on which to fight, but you must move deftly!

source: She knows only destruction... I shall do my best to keep up with her rage!
target: She knows only destruction... I shall do my best to keep up with her rage!

source: Her anger is endless! It shall take time until you are under sure footing again...
target: Her anger is endless! It shall take time until you are under sure footing again...

source: Curses! We must hurry, lest they fall to their doom!
target: Curses! We must hurry, lest they fall to their doom!

source: We have not lost yet. I shall lay more ground!
target: We have not lost yet. I shall lay more ground!

source: We must make a stand! Find your footing once more!
target: We must make a stand! Find your footing once more!

source: This is becoming routine. What crumbles, we rebuild!
target: This is becoming routine. What crumbles, we rebuild!

source: Defeat Agdistis
target: Defeat Agdistis

source: Begone from my sight or suffer...<var 1A 02 /var>SUFFER<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Begone from my sight or suffer...<var 1A 02 /var>SUFFER<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: I sense convergences of aether... Beware what they may spawn!
target: I sense convergences of aether... Beware what they may spawn!

source: If you will not leave... Then <var 1A 02 /var>YOU<var 1A 01 /var> shall become <var 1A 02 /var>MINE<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: If you will not leave... Then <var 1A 02 /var>YOU<var 1A 01 /var> shall become <var 1A 02 /var>MINE<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: I am...Agdistis? Yes...and this is my vessel. Have I been gifted new test subjects?
target: I am...Agdistis? Yes...and this is my vessel. Have I been gifted new test subjects?

source: It begins again. Fear not─I shall make new ground!
target: It begins again. Fear not─I shall make new ground!

source: I tire of this insolence. Troublesome <var 1A 02 /var>SPECIMENS<var 1A 01 /var> must be put down!
target: I tire of this insolence. Troublesome <var 1A 02 /var>SPECIMENS<var 1A 01 /var> must be put down!

source: Defeat Hegemone
target: Defeat Hegemone

source: Abyssos is my charge, and I shall not shirk my duty!
target: Abyssos is my charge, and I shall not shirk my duty!

source: Rot from the inside out.
target: Rot from the inside out.

source: Be swept away in a flood of aether!
target: Be swept away in a flood of aether!

source: Waste away.
target: Waste away.

source: You cannot measure against a keyward!
target: You cannot measure against a keyward!

source: This is but the beginning!
target: This is but the beginning!

source: Your own body betrays you!
target: Your own body betrays you!

source: Your time draws near. Witness true mastery before your end!
target: Your time draws near. Witness true mastery before your end!

source: Abyssos is my domain! I shall suffer your intrusion no longer!
target: Abyssos is my domain! I shall suffer your intrusion no longer!

source: Protect the Holy See of Ishgard
target: Защитите мост к Ишгарду

source: Drive back the Dravanian Horde
target: Отбросьте Драванскую Орду

source: Stave off Vishap's advance
target: Остановите продвижение Вишапа

source: Drive back the Dravanian Horde
target: Отбросьте Драванскую Орду

source: Stave off Vishap's advance
target: Остановите продвижение Вишапа

source: Drive back the Dravanian Horde
target: Отбросьте Драванскую Орду

source: Stave off Vishap's advance
target: Остановите продвижение Вишапа

source: Fall back and avoid Vishap's assault
target: Отступите, чтобы избежать атаки Вишапа

source: Regroup with the rear guard
target: Перегруппируйтесь со стражей тыла

source: Defeat Vishap before the knights lose their resolve
target: Одолейте Вишапа до того, как рыцари утратят решимость

source: We claim victory this day, or Ishgard falls!
target: Либо мы сегодня победим, либо Ишгард падёт!

source: Accept the Fury into your heart, and defend this bridge with your life's blood!
target: Примите в своём сердце Яростную и защищайте этот мост ценой своей жизни!

source: They mean to destroy the wards of Daniffen's Collar. Let not a single dragon pass!
target: Они намереваются уничтожишь Щит Даниффена. Не пропускайте ни одного дракона!

source: Have the rear guard ready the cannons!
target: Стража тыла, готовьте пушки!

source: Everyone, fall back! Fall back <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Все назад! <var 1A 02 /var>Немедленно<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Do not let it reach the barrier! Hold your ground!
target: Не дайте твари достичь барьера! Стоять насмерть!

source: Remember what it is we fight for!
target: Вспомните, за что вы сражаетесь!

source: Fall back, and regroup! The battle is not yet lost!
target: Отступаем, нужно перегруппироваться! Битва ещё не окончена!

source: We... We've lost... Ishgard will burn...
target: Мы... Проиграли... Ишгард сгорит...

source: The final ward is weakened. Hurry, we must end this now!
target: Последний барьер еле держится! Скорее, нужно покончить с ним!

source: We are the shield that keeps the Holy See! Even if it should cost us everything, they cannot be suffered to pass!
target: Мы — щит, что ограждает Святой Престол! Даже ценой своей жизни мы не позволим этим тварям пройти!

source: They mean to defeat us with sheer numbers, then?
target: Они собираются задавить нас числом, да?

source: Well, it's a good thing I can't count!
target: Хорошо что я не умею считать!

source: We must defeat their champion at all costs!
target: Здоровую тварь нужно убить любой ценой!

source: Fall back! There's nothing left to be done here.
target: Отступаем! Тут мы уже ничего не сделаем.

source: The second ward has fallen!
target: Второй барьер отказал!

source: The first ward has been breached!
target: Первый барьер пробит!

source: Hold your ground! Should this barrier fall, Ishgard will be awash in flame!
target: Стоять здесь! Если этот барьер падёт, Ишгард затопит пламя!

source: Dragoons, to arms! Give the enemy no quarter!
target: Драгуны, к оружию! Задайте им жару!

source: They will know the wrath of the Azure Dragoon!
target: Они познают ярость Лазурного Драгуна!

source: Hold nothing back!
target: Ну держитесь!

source: Our enemy is not without weakness! Keep it up!
target: Наш враг не бессмертен! Давайте, давайте!

source: Focus your attacks on the armored dragon!
target: Сосредоточьте атаки на бронированном драконе!

source: They'll need more than thick hides to prevail over us.
target: Толстая чешуя их не спасёт.

source: Damn this infernal heat!
target: Проклятье, этот огонь!..

source: Ishgard will not fall. Not today!
target: Ишгард не падёт. Не сегодня!

source: I... I cannot hold on much longer...
target: Я... Я не могу...

source: We will see to things here, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Fall back and help the others guard the ward.
target: Мы тут разберёмся, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Отступай к остальным у следующего барьера.

source: Yda and I have matters here well in hand. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must go and see to the final ward.
target: Мы с Идой тут разберёмся. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, защищай последний барьер!

source: Defeat the proto-Carbuncle
target: Defeat the proto-Carbuncle

source: Rest eternal in the dark depths of this prison.
target: Rest eternal in the dark depths of this prison.

source: From fulgent flame my servants rise!
target: From fulgent flame my servants rise!

source: Leave naught but ash in your wake!
target: Leave naught but ash in your wake!

source: Go forth, and sate your boundless hunger!
target: Go forth, and sate your boundless hunger!

source: You have but glimpsed my power...
target: You have but glimpsed my power...

source: Behold the fruits of sacrifice!
target: Behold the fruits of sacrifice!

source: Sear flesh from bone!
target: Sear flesh from bone!

source: Perish in flame's embrace!
target: Perish in flame's embrace!

source: You will know my rage!
target: You will know my rage!

source: Be crushed underfoot!
target: Be crushed underfoot!

source: You are prey to be consumed!
target: You are prey to be consumed!

source: Out of my sight!
target: Out of my sight!

source: A fitting death!
target: A fitting death!

source: I tire of this farce!
target: I tire of this farce!

source: I shall see my wish fulfilled.
target: I shall see my wish fulfilled.

source: Let seep sorrow into your heart.
target: Let seep sorrow into your heart.

source: Fools, braying before a god!
target: Fools, braying before a god!

source: Godhood is within my grasp... I need only reach...
target: Godhood is within my grasp... I need only reach...

source: Even should my vessel crumble...
target: Even should my vessel crumble...

source: I shall take hold...of my reward!
target: I shall take hold...of my reward!

source: Yes... Hehehe... At last!
target: Yes... Hehehe... At last!

source: Receive of me death...and be honored!
target: Receive of me death...and be honored!

source: This is the end...
target: This is the end...

source: Rejoice, and partake of my gift!
target: Rejoice, and partake of my gift!

source: Your soul undone!
target: Your soul undone!

source: My will is absolute!

target: Defeat Hephaistos

target: The aetheric analyzer works as it should. Let us press on.

target: Of course... It would have to be Althyk who could so manipulate space!

source: Commencing basic training regimen. <crack> Your time to completion will be recorded.
target: Запуск базового тренировочного протокола. Время прохождения будет записано.

source: Leave no openings. Your strikes must be quick and decisive.
target: Защищайтесь любой ценой. Но ваши удары должны быть быстрыми и уверенными.

source: That concludes your basic training. Commencing <crick-crack> advanced training regimen.
target: Базовая тренировка завершена. Запуск продвинутого тренировочного протокола.

source: Remain calm and collected, no matter your circumstances.
target: Оставайтесь спокойными и собранными вне зависимости от обстоятельств.

source: Remember─you must hone your skills daily. It will be key to your survival.
target: Помните — ежедневно оттачивайте свои умения. Это ключ к выживанию.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 12.
Not even the lowest order of voidsent would be daunted by such meager strength.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 12.
Даже слабейшие из демонов не испугаются таких посредственных способностей.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 9.
Your mastery of fundamentals will carry you far. Continue your training and seek ever greater heights.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 9.
Вы неплохо освоили базовые вещи. Продолжайте тренировки и оттачивайте умения.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 7.
A respectable performance. Such strength would prove a match for even warrior-class voidsent.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 7.
Превосходный бой. С подобной силой можно бросить вызов демону класса воин и выше.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 5.
A commendable performance. Such strength would prove a match for even knight-class voidsent.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 5.
Исключительные способности. С подобной силой вы справитесь с демоном класса рыцарь и выше.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 3.
A spectacular performance. Such strength might even prove a match for Galatea herself were she still alive.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 3.
Безупречный бой. Подобная сила может быть сравнима только с самой Галатеей, если бы она до сих пор была жива.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 2.
Impossible... Only Rullus has achieved such a feat.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 2.
Невозможно... Такое под силу разве что Руллию.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete. Evaluation ranking: 1.
Even the great rulers of voidsent would struggle to contend with such strength.
target:
Оценка завершена. Присвоенный рейтинг: 1.
Даже величайшие правители демонов содрогнутся перед такой силой.

source:
<creak> Regimen complete.
An equal to Drusilla. Extraordinary...
target:
Оценка завершена. Рейтинг присвоить не удаётся.
Обнаружен равный Друзилле боец.

target: Слава богам, мы вовремя. Ты в состоянии сражаться?

target: Ха-ха-ха! Да, больше смертных на заклание!

target: Мои силы подводят...<var 17 /var>Я только путаюсь у вас под ногами.

I must...see...

Unknown augmentation confirmed.
