Unknown augmentation confirmed.
Further experimentation approved.

source: Amplification inconsistent with inhibitor disengagement values. Potential evidence of undefined mortal strength?
target: Amplification inconsistent with inhibitor disengagement values. Potential evidence of undefined mortal strength?

source: Begin hypothesis. Based on the premise that performing beyond physical parameters is not a biological function...
target: Begin hypothesis. Based on the premise that performing beyond physical parameters is not a biological function...

source: Evaluation failed. Unable to harness full potential of indefinable power...
target: Evaluation failed. Unable to harness full potential of indefinable power...

source:
I am the Omega, and I walk with the Alpha.
Where one ends, another begins.
target:
I am the Omega, and I walk with the Alpha.
Where one ends, another begins.

source: Alpha? Why are you here?
target: Alpha? Why are you here?

source:
Your thoughts, they are...comprehensible.
Yes. Together, we may prevail.
target:
Your thoughts, they are...comprehensible.
Yes. Together, we may prevail.

source:
Further testing is required.
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, assist me with this evaluation.
target:
Further testing is required.
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, assist me with this evaluation.

source: The path I recorded through the great expanse...
target: The path I recorded through the great expanse...

source: The piercing rays of ten million suns...
target: The piercing rays of ten million suns...

source: The flames which incinerated the Dragonstar...
target: The flames which incinerated the Dragonstar...

source: The velocity of a wyrm, surging across the cosmos...
target: The velocity of a wyrm, surging across the cosmos...

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the test nears its conclusion. Witness the extent to which I have evolved!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, the test nears its conclusion. Witness the extent to which I have evolved!

source: The colossal impact which invites extinction...
target: The colossal impact which invites extinction...

source: I ranked the mortals I encountered on this star among the most feeble of species.
target: I ranked the mortals I encountered on this star among the most feeble of species.

source: Yet you demonstrated incomprehensible strength in your triumphs. A mystery in defiance of all logic.
target: Yet you demonstrated incomprehensible strength in your triumphs. A mystery in defiance of all logic.

source: At last, with Alpha's insight and assistance, I have succeeded in harnessing this unmeasurable might.
target: At last, with Alpha's insight and assistance, I have succeeded in harnessing this unmeasurable might.

source: My experiment has accomplished its purpose...and I will prove it by claiming this victory!
target: My experiment has accomplished its purpose...and I will prove it by claiming this victory!

source: Commencing memory fabrication... Thou standest before Tiamat, guardian of Meracydia.
target: Commencing memory fabrication... Thou standest before Tiamat, guardian of Meracydia.

source: Go forth, my children! Drive these foul invaders from our home!
target: Go forth, my children! Drive these foul invaders from our home!

source: My boundless rage shall swallow thee whole!
target: My boundless rage shall swallow thee whole!

source: The flames of retribution consume thee!
target: The flames of retribution consume thee!

source: Bear witness to the power of the first brood!
target: Bear witness to the power of the first brood!

source: Intruders detected. Initializing defensive protocols.
target: Intruders detected. Initializing defensive protocols.

source: Consciousness injection successful. Commencing attack protocol.
target: Consciousness injection successful. Commencing attack protocol.

source: Sustained enemy presence detected. Threat level increased and attack pattern elevated in intensity.
target: Sustained enemy presence detected. Threat level increased and attack pattern elevated in intensity.

source: Welcome one, welcome all, to Kageyama's Clockwork Castletown! Gahahaha!
target: Welcome one, welcome all, to Kageyama's Clockwork Castletown! Gahahaha!

source: Fires and fights are the flowers of Kugane! Now, entertain me, peasants!
target: Fires and fights are the flowers of Kugane! Now, entertain me, peasants!

source: Hm, needs more sound and fury... Let the parade commence!
target: Hm, needs more sound and fury... Let the parade commence!

source: Dance, my puppets, dance! But have care where you wander...
target: Dance, my puppets, dance! But have care where you wander...

source: Now, you can't expect clockwork to do all the work for you.
target: Now, you can't expect clockwork to do all the work for you.

source: Oh, I seem to have dropped a coin. And another. And another!
target: Oh, I seem to have dropped a coin. And another. And another!

source: Eat, fight... Eat, fight...
target: Eat, fight... Eat, fight...

source: Death brings me no peace... Such is my fate...
target: Death brings me no peace... Such is my fate...

source: Few can wield such power as mine!
target: Few can wield such power as mine!

source: Entertain me, my darlings!
target: Entertain me, my darlings!

source: My every breath is laced with magicks!
target: My every breath is laced with magicks!

source: Another...fleeting diversion...
target: Another...fleeting diversion...

source: Always more killin' to be done... And I'm always happy to oblige!
target: Always more killin' to be done... And I'm always happy to oblige!

source: Make it fun for me, eh?
target: Make it fun for me, eh?

source: The first drops are always the sweetest!
target: The first drops are always the sweetest!

source: Ungh... Guess my time's up...
target: Ungh... Guess my time's up...

source: GRAAAHHH!
target: GRAAAHHH!

source: GRRRHH!
target: GRRRHH!

source: Disturbed once again...?
target: Disturbed once again...?

source: Crumble and die!
target: Crumble and die!

source: My strength is without equal!
target: My strength is without equal!

source: This <var 1A 02 /var>shouldn't<var 1A 01 /var> kill you...
target: This <var 1A 02 /var>shouldn't<var 1A 01 /var> kill you...

source: It ain't a fight till the dying begins!
target: It ain't a fight till the dying begins!

source: I've had enough of you!
target: I've had enough of you!

source: I'll leave you bloody and battered!
target: I'll leave you bloody and battered!

source: You will suffer!
target: You will suffer!

source: For Lady Athena!
target: For Lady Athena!

source: The end...comes!
target: The end...comes!

source: It isn't over!
target: It isn't over!

source: Defeat Kokytos
target: Defeat Kokytos

source: Flames take you!
target: Flames take you!

source: Ice bind you!
target: Ice bind you!

source: Clear Mount Rokkon
target: Clear Mount Rokkon

source: Clear the Single Step
target: Clear the Single Step

source: Defeat Shishio
target: Defeat Shishio

source: Clear the Clever Roost
target: Clear the Clever Roost

source: Defeat Gorai the Uncaged
target: Defeat Gorai the Uncaged

source: Defeat Moko the Restless
target: Defeat Moko the Restless

source: Three paths to be unsealed at our behest. Whither shall we wander?
target: Three paths to be unsealed at our behest. Whither shall we wander?

source: You thought to go down this path as well? How reassuring!
target: You thought to go down this path as well? How reassuring!

source: Interested in a different path? I shall place my trust in your intuition.
target: Interested in a different path? I shall place my trust in your intuition.

source: A grand gate. What lies beyond, I wonder?
target: A grand gate. What lies beyond, I wonder?

source: I espy a most promising pagoda! Let us make it our destination.
target: I espy a most promising pagoda! Let us make it our destination.

source: What curious creatures! They must have been emboldened by these terrible torrents.
target: What curious creatures! They must have been emboldened by these terrible torrents.

source: Mountain weather is wont to change on a whim, but 'tis not nature's whims at work here...
target: Mountain weather is wont to change on a whim, but 'tis not nature's whims at work here...

source: Thank the kami the rains have ceased... We should make for shelter ere another storm passes through.
target: Thank the kami the rains have ceased... We should make for shelter ere another storm passes through.

source: Such tumultuous spirits! Servants of the wind, no doubt.
target: Such tumultuous spirits! Servants of the wind, no doubt.

source: These winds could blow a man away...and will, if we do not tread carefully!
target: These winds could blow a man away...and will, if we do not tread carefully!

source: A thousand thousand paths...and yours ends here.
target: A thousand thousand paths...and yours ends here.

source: Fill your lungs!
target: Fill your lungs!

source: Dying embers are easily snuffed...
target: Dying embers are easily snuffed...

source: We are everything and nothing─your first and final breath!
target: We are everything and nothing─your first and final breath!

source: Choke in your graves!
target: Choke in your graves!

source: Slayer of spirits... Their fate will soon be yours!
target: Slayer of spirits... Their fate will soon be yours!

source: Your soul is mine to claim! Your marrow, mine to burn...
target: Your soul is mine to claim! Your marrow, mine to burn...

source: These treasures are mine! All <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var>! You shall not sully their brilliance!
target: These treasures are mine! All <var 1A 02 /var>mine<var 1A 01 /var>! You shall not sully their brilliance!

source: The head monk, I take it? And bearing a form befitting his proclivities...
target: The head monk, I take it? And bearing a form befitting his proclivities...

source:
火の神より賜りし力よ……
琵琶の響きで、燃え立ち猛れ！
target:
火の神より賜りし力よ……
琵琶の響きで、燃え立ち猛れ！

source:
火の神より賜りし力よ……
琵琶の音色で、分かれて増えよ！
target:
火の神より賜りし力よ……
琵琶の音色で、分かれて増えよ！

source: Beware the biwa's melody, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It resounds with power...
target: Beware the biwa's melody, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! It resounds with power...

source:
専門外なので私にはさっぱりデスが、
アナタなら、演奏の違いもわかるのでは……？
target:
専門外なので私にはさっぱりデスが、
アナタなら、演奏の違いもわかるのでは……？

source: A song to guide you to your grave!
target: A song to guide you to your grave!

source:
Beads to bind the spirit's form...
With these words, be reborn!
target:
Beads to bind the spirit's form...
With these words, be reborn!

source: My blessings are your curse!
target: My blessings are your curse!

source: No mercy, no mercy!
target: No mercy, no mercy!

source: Hee hee! You thought you were free of me!
target: Hee hee! You thought you were free of me!

source: Divine thunder, heed my call─bestow upon my biwa your tumultuous timbre!
target: Divine thunder, heed my call─bestow upon my biwa your tumultuous timbre!

source: My power will see you humbled!
target: My power will see you humbled!

source: A drink to fuel the fires of my fury!
target: A drink to fuel the fires of my fury!

source: Ahahaha! You are as nothing before my might!
target: Ahahaha! You are as nothing before my might!

source: Curses... The libations...!
target: Curses... The libations...!

source: You yet stand!?
target: You yet stand!?

source: No... My precious...treasures...
target: No... My precious...treasures...

source: Divine fire, I beseech thee─cleanse the branded with blessed flame!
target: Divine fire, I beseech thee─cleanse the branded with blessed flame!

source: Divine thunder, heed my call─sound to rend the very earth!
target: Divine thunder, heed my call─sound to rend the very earth!

source: There is no salvation for thieves... I offer you death, and nothing more!
target: There is no salvation for thieves... I offer you death, and nothing more!

source: It shall be mine...mine, I say! You cannot have it!
target: It shall be mine...mine, I say! You cannot have it!

source: The dance of a thousand petals begins with a single blossom!
target: The dance of a thousand petals begins with a single blossom!

source: Wayward flowers, bend to my will!
target: Wayward flowers, bend to my will!

source: Spring has come!
target: Spring has come!

source: Embrace ephemerality!
target: Embrace ephemerality!

source: My shadow is my strength!
target: My shadow is my strength!

source: In summer's blaze do my blades sing... In winter's chill do they bite!
target: In summer's blaze do my blades sing... In winter's chill do they bite!

source: The sky weeps, and the earth heeds her call!
target: The sky weeps, and the earth heeds her call!

source: Death blooms in a raging tempest!
target: Death blooms in a raging tempest!

source: Come forth, dear friends, and beguile mine enemies!
target: Come forth, dear friends, and beguile mine enemies!

source: Solitary leaves, I call upon you─fly at the mercy of the storm!
target: Solitary leaves, I call upon you─fly at the mercy of the storm!

source: Reeds of the earth, take to the skies!
target: Reeds of the earth, take to the skies!

source: From accursed boughs do wicked buds bloom!
target: From accursed boughs do wicked buds bloom!

source: Under normal circumstances, I would find this ninjutsu endearing... Would that her petals did not seek to do us harm!
target: Under normal circumstances, I would find this ninjutsu endearing... Would that her petals did not seek to do us harm!

source: The blossoms must be enchanted. Keep a watchful eye on how they fly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: The blossoms must be enchanted. Keep a watchful eye on how they fly, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: I should like to pat their fluffy little heads, but a well-trained pup will go to great lengths to protect its master...
target: I should like to pat their fluffy little heads, but a well-trained pup will go to great lengths to protect its master...

source: Face me, and I shall grant you an honorable death!
target: Face me, and I shall grant you an honorable death!

source: My blade thirsts for mortal blood!
target: My blade thirsts for mortal blood!

source: To me, my warriors! Your lord has need of you!
target: To me, my warriors! Your lord has need of you!

source: That my blade could miss its mark... You are a formidable foe.
target: That my blade could miss its mark... You are a formidable foe.

source: In tenebrous night shall you meet your end...
target: In tenebrous night shall you meet your end...

source: In gardens of flame do true warriors thrive!
target: In gardens of flame do true warriors thrive!

source: War is a sea of sorrow, and you shall drown!
target: War is a sea of sorrow, and you shall drown!

source: My blade is inescapable!
target: My blade is inescapable!

source: My ire is an infernal flame, never to be smothered!
target: My ire is an infernal flame, never to be smothered!

source: Our spirits are as the wind, never to be fettered!
target: Our spirits are as the wind, never to be fettered!

source: To arms, my warriors! We make for the front lines!
target: To arms, my warriors! We make for the front lines!

source: I once dreamed of shaking hands with a giant oni, but not like this!
target: I once dreamed of shaking hands with a giant oni, but not like this!

source: They may have strength in numbers, but worry not! If you cannot beat them, dodge them, I say!
target: They may have strength in numbers, but worry not! If you cannot beat them, dodge them, I say!

source: Thank the kami the winds have ceased... We should make for shelter ere we are blown back to the foot of the mountain!
target: Thank the kami the winds have ceased... We should make for shelter ere we are blown back to the foot of the mountain!

source: If I had to wager a guess, these must be the temple's stores. Rather spacious, aren't they?
target: If I had to wager a guess, these must be the temple's stores. Rather spacious, aren't they?

source: Were I a treasure─cursed or no─I imagine I would abide within these walls. But where...
target: Were I a treasure─cursed or no─I imagine I would abide within these walls. But where...

source: Under the auspices of two auspices, as it were. Curious.
target: Under the auspices of two auspices, as it were. Curious.

source: So the glass serves as a magicked doorknob of sorts? The monks were certainly inventive...
target: So the glass serves as a magicked doorknob of sorts? The monks were certainly inventive...

source: You too are a connoisseur of Far Eastern maps, I trust? Terribly charming, how the Four Lords are shown ruling the cardinal directions.
target: You too are a connoisseur of Far Eastern maps, I trust? Terribly charming, how the Four Lords are shown ruling the cardinal directions.

source: I might have known that Suzaku and Seiryu were the guardians of this gateway─though in fairness, one usually needs grapple with only one at a time.
target: I might have known that Suzaku and Seiryu were the guardians of this gateway─though in fairness, one usually needs grapple with only one at a time.

source: ...Would that we had arrived sooner. Judging by her supernatural size, the demons have already taken that poor shinobi.
target: ...Would that we had arrived sooner. Judging by her supernatural size, the demons have already taken that poor shinobi.

source: She must be in the thrall of a treasure. A promising lead...though at an unfortunate cost.
target: She must be in the thrall of a treasure. A promising lead...though at an unfortunate cost.

source: I see no clockwork mechanisms... We've an honest-to-kami mononoke on our hands.
target: I see no clockwork mechanisms... We've an honest-to-kami mononoke on our hands.

source: The bloodlust is palpable... Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I shall be right here─at a reasonably safe distance─cheering you on!
target: The bloodlust is palpable... Have care, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I shall be right here─at a reasonably safe distance─cheering you on!

source: Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I knew from the first you would emerge victori─
target: Excellent work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I knew from the first you would emerge victori─

source: ...What, pray tell, is that look for?
target: ...What, pray tell, is that look for?

source: Your faith in my faith in you aside, you may be interested to know that I recognize the detailing on this armor. It once belonged to a renowned warrior.
target: Your faith in my faith in you aside, you may be interested to know that I recognize the detailing on this armor. It once belonged to a renowned warrior.

source: Would that my falcon had the freight capacity of a barge...
target: Would that my falcon had the freight capacity of a barge...

source: Alas, I suppose I must choose which artifacts to leave behind─for now.
target: Alas, I suppose I must choose which artifacts to leave behind─for now.

source: Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Even the fiercest mononoke is no match for you!
target: Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Even the fiercest mononoke is no match for you!

source: 'Tis difficult to appreciate while under threat of slicing and dicing, but the monks amassed a truly impressive collection of blades here.
target: 'Tis difficult to appreciate while under threat of slicing and dicing, but the monks amassed a truly impressive collection of blades here.

source: To say naught of our most enspirited armor!
target: To say naught of our most enspirited armor!

source: Perhaps the soul of the warrior who once wore it yet lingered, awaiting his chance to take to the battlefield once more...
target: Perhaps the soul of the warrior who once wore it yet lingered, awaiting his chance to take to the battlefield once more...

source: Or perhaps his sword was a treasure with a life of its own.
target: Or perhaps his sword was a treasure with a life of its own.

source: A vexing conundrum─what to bring back to Kugane, that is. I don't suppose you've space in your bag...?
target: A vexing conundrum─what to bring back to Kugane, that is. I don't suppose you've space in your bag...?

source: Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are an unholy terror on the battlefield─and I mean that in the most flattering way.
target: Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are an unholy terror on the battlefield─and I mean that in the most flattering way.

source: To think that our secret passage would lead us to such an immaculate armory... Perhaps the monks utilized this as a shelter in times of strife.
target: To think that our secret passage would lead us to such an immaculate armory... Perhaps the monks utilized this as a shelter in times of strife.

source: I doubt they expected the armor they stored to come to life, however. Quite the harrowing foe, that one.
target: I doubt they expected the armor they stored to come to life, however. Quite the harrowing foe, that one.

source: ...Which leads me to believe that the armor itself must be one of the treasures we seek!
target: ...Which leads me to believe that the armor itself must be one of the treasures we seek!

source: Despite its storied history, it looks almost pristine. I suspect the monks tended to it regularly.
target: Despite its storied history, it looks almost pristine. I suspect the monks tended to it regularly.

source: It shall prove quite the challenge to bring back...but I daresay my falcon and I are up to the task! Pray accept my unending gratitude for your assistance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: It shall prove quite the challenge to bring back...but I daresay my falcon and I are up to the task! Pray accept my unending gratitude for your assistance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: A clash for the ages! Life-threatening circumstances aside, 'tis always a pleasure to witness bushido at work.
target: A clash for the ages! Life-threatening circumstances aside, 'tis always a pleasure to witness bushido at work.

source: I had guessed the passage we traversed would lead us to the stores' most valuable contents─lo and behold!
target: I had guessed the passage we traversed would lead us to the stores' most valuable contents─lo and behold!

source: Such exceptional relics are a rarity indeed...this armor not least of all.
target: Such exceptional relics are a rarity indeed...this armor not least of all.

source: The spirit that enlivened it may have been one of the very tsukumogami of rumor.
target: The spirit that enlivened it may have been one of the very tsukumogami of rumor.

source: In an ideal world, I would not hesitate to bring home every last blade the mononoke touched... Alas, my falcon can only bear so much weight.
target: In an ideal world, I would not hesitate to bring home every last blade the mononoke touched... Alas, my falcon can only bear so much weight.

source: This calls for serious consideration... Pray leave me to my thoughts for a moment.
target: This calls for serious consideration... Pray leave me to my thoughts for a moment.

source: How pleasingly picturesque! Had we no demons to slay, I would suggest a more leisurely stroll.
target: How pleasingly picturesque! Had we no demons to slay, I would suggest a more leisurely stroll.

source: I shudder to think of the chaos should those creatures find their way to civilization...
target: I shudder to think of the chaos should those creatures find their way to civilization...

source: I suppose we're obliged to take the scenic route.
target: I suppose we're obliged to take the scenic route.

source: That ahead is Shojo Temple, home to Gorai and his accursed collection!
target: That ahead is Shojo Temple, home to Gorai and his accursed collection!

source: If only we had time for the typical ablutions... But a proper pilgrimage must wait for another day.
target: If only we had time for the typical ablutions... But a proper pilgrimage must wait for another day.

source: For now, treasure awaits! As do the monk and his minions, of course. Do have care.
target: For now, treasure awaits! As do the monk and his minions, of course. Do have care.

source: I admit that I was equally tempted to pull that rope, though part of me wishes you hadn't...
target: I admit that I was equally tempted to pull that rope, though part of me wishes you hadn't...

source: The statues keep silent vigil in their masters' absence...but they are not the treasures we seek. Onward!
target: The statues keep silent vigil in their masters' absence...but they are not the treasures we seek. Onward!

source: The temple stretches on ever further. Step lively, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We've plenty to explore.
target: The temple stretches on ever further. Step lively, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We've plenty to explore.

source: Even the inner sanctum is plagued with demons. If any who remained did survive, 'twould be nothing short of a miracle.
target: Even the inner sanctum is plagued with demons. If any who remained did survive, 'twould be nothing short of a miracle.

source: Splendid as these statues are, they appear lacking in the “accursed” aspect. Our quarry must lie further in.
target: Splendid as these statues are, they appear lacking in the “accursed” aspect. Our quarry must lie further in.

source: Though the temple's isolation is a blessing for the smallfolk, I imagine it made the monks' experience all the more harrowing...
target: Though the temple's isolation is a blessing for the smallfolk, I imagine it made the monks' experience all the more harrowing...

source: We have yet to see hide nor hair of Gorai...
target: We have yet to see hide nor hair of Gorai...

source: Breathtaking! 'Tis as though the majestic tiger it depicts might pounce off the screen at any─ Oh?
target: Breathtaking! 'Tis as though the majestic tiger it depicts might pounce off the screen at any─ Oh?

source: That was <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> an invitation! Your assistance, please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: That was <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> an invitation! Your assistance, please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: That precarious pile of crates is a mountain unto itself!
target: That precarious pile of crates is a mountain unto itself!

source: Somehow, I doubt that brute has learned its lesson... But let us continue on.
target: Somehow, I doubt that brute has learned its lesson... But let us continue on.

source: By the kami, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how did you get up there?
target: By the kami, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, how did you get up there?

source: Adventurers and their climbing... Why, just the other day, on Kugane Tower─ But perhaps that is a tale for another time.
target: Adventurers and their climbing... Why, just the other day, on Kugane Tower─ But perhaps that is a tale for another time.

source: That sounded promising... If you suddenly hear my winsome wailing, you had best come running!
target: That sounded promising... If you suddenly hear my winsome wailing, you had best come running!

source: Ah, a secret stairwell! How very convenient.
target: Ah, a secret stairwell! How very convenient.

source: Both master and minion, irascible to the last...
target: Both master and minion, irascible to the last...

source: Tokimori's words ring true. These creatures allow for not a modicum of mercy.
target: Tokimori's words ring true. These creatures allow for not a modicum of mercy.

source: With your victory, we may now free the mountain of Gorai's influence─by liberating these treasures from his collection, of course.
target: With your victory, we may now free the mountain of Gorai's influence─by liberating these treasures from his collection, of course.

source: Any one of them may have harbored spiritual forces. Perhaps all of them─it would certainly explain Gorai's impressive transformation.
target: Any one of them may have harbored spiritual forces. Perhaps all of them─it would certainly explain Gorai's impressive transformation.

source: As for which deserves a place in my collection... Gorai's biwa, of course! A fine addition.
target: As for which deserves a place in my collection... Gorai's biwa, of course! A fine addition.

source: And with that, we may be on our way. Your company has been a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: And with that, we may be on our way. Your company has been a pleasure as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: And so the demon is slain!
target: And so the demon is slain!

source: Though his avarice availed him curious tools, your skill carried the day.
target: Though his avarice availed him curious tools, your skill carried the day.

source: One wonders what artifacts he might have unveiled had you waited a touch longer to deal the killing blow...but there's naught to be done about it now.
target: One wonders what artifacts he might have unveiled had you waited a touch longer to deal the killing blow...but there's naught to be done about it now.

source: Naught but to take the lesson of his life to heart, perhaps. Never shirk the proper appraisal of items with dubious histories!
target: Naught but to take the lesson of his life to heart, perhaps. Never shirk the proper appraisal of items with dubious histories!

source: Bearing this firmly in mind, I shall help myself to that hammer of his.
target: Bearing this firmly in mind, I shall help myself to that hammer of his.

source: 'Twas an honor and a privilege to accompany you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Shall we begin our preparations for the journey back?
target: 'Twas an honor and a privilege to accompany you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Shall we begin our preparations for the journey back?

source: Admirable as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Few would be so keen to face down a rat of that size.
target: Admirable as always, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Few would be so keen to face down a rat of that size.

source: To say naught of his unusual sousing. When the unholy draught touched his lips, I feared his fury would consume the entire temple.
target: To say naught of his unusual sousing. When the unholy draught touched his lips, I feared his fury would consume the entire temple.

source: I should like to know precisely what baleful influence was wrought upon the drink...but not enough to test it myself.
target: I should like to know precisely what baleful influence was wrought upon the drink...but not enough to test it myself.

source: Nay, I must bring back a less volatile artifact of our endeavors...
target: Nay, I must bring back a less volatile artifact of our endeavors...

source: The living lanterns─chochin, as the Hingans say─were particularly fascinating, were they not?
target: The living lanterns─chochin, as the Hingans say─were particularly fascinating, were they not?

source: Now that they are returned to their original form, I may safely seek to learn more of the spirits they once harbored. Let us add them to my collection forthwith!
target: Now that they are returned to their original form, I may safely seek to learn more of the spirits they once harbored. Let us add them to my collection forthwith!

source: Curious... This lantern shines differently than the rest. The mononoke's influence, perhaps?
target: Curious... This lantern shines differently than the rest. The mononoke's influence, perhaps?

source: No, some other mechanism. What if I...
target: No, some other mechanism. What if I...

source: Lesson learned, Hancock─do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> prod eerily glowing objects!
target: Lesson learned, Hancock─do <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> prod eerily glowing objects!

source: In any case, the monks went to great pains to conceal this path. What could have warranted such secrecy?
target: In any case, the monks went to great pains to conceal this path. What could have warranted such secrecy?

source: Kami forfend! We could suffocate under this wicked haze...
target: Kami forfend! We could suffocate under this wicked haze...

source: I'd wager the tsukumogami is the pipe itself─its body a mere illusion.
target: I'd wager the tsukumogami is the pipe itself─its body a mere illusion.

source: A brilliant display! With the demonic smoke dispelled, we may breathe easy once more.
target: A brilliant display! With the demonic smoke dispelled, we may breathe easy once more.

source: Only an entity of great power could transform its surrounds so dramatically. You did well to outmaneuver it.
target: Only an entity of great power could transform its surrounds so dramatically. You did well to outmaneuver it.

source: Now, I espied something resting within the shrine earlier...
target: Now, I espied something resting within the shrine earlier...

source: I have seen depictions of this pipe before. There can be no doubt that it is an age-old treasure.
target: I have seen depictions of this pipe before. There can be no doubt that it is an age-old treasure.

source: Gorai must have known that a fierce tsukumogami slumbered within it. Thus he stored it apart, far from the sanctity of the temple...
target: Gorai must have known that a fierce tsukumogami slumbered within it. Thus he stored it apart, far from the sanctity of the temple...

source: But its will was too strong to be consigned to such ignominy, and in its neglect, its power only grew. Until it was strong enough to enshroud the mount entire...
target: But its will was too strong to be consigned to such ignominy, and in its neglect, its power only grew. Until it was strong enough to enshroud the mount entire...

source: Now that this lord among demons is slain, we can assume that peace shall return to the region. We must report the good news to Mistress Tsubaki posthaste!
target: Now that this lord among demons is slain, we can assume that peace shall return to the region. We must report the good news to Mistress Tsubaki posthaste!

source: I─and my growing collection─should not have fared half so well without you here. I am in your debt!
target: I─and my growing collection─should not have fared half so well without you here. I am in your debt!

source: Shrink before my might! Quiver in awe!
target: Shrink before my might! Quiver in awe!

source: A path straight up the holy mount, is it? How refreshingly dangerous!
target: A path straight up the holy mount, is it? How refreshingly dangerous!

source: Why, these hills stretch on for malms! Would that they were not alive with the sound of demons.
target: Why, these hills stretch on for malms! Would that they were not alive with the sound of demons.

source: The Hingans call these clay figures “dogu”─but why is one here, of all places?
target: The Hingans call these clay figures “dogu”─but why is one here, of all places?

source: Best to let sleeping dogu lie. For all we know, it could be cursed.
target: Best to let sleeping dogu lie. For all we know, it could be cursed.

source: If that dogu turns on us, its extermination shall be <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> responsibility, I hope you know!
target: If that dogu turns on us, its extermination shall be <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> responsibility, I hope you know!

source: Fallen leaves and fresh greenery in such close proximity? 'Tis passing strange.
target: Fallen leaves and fresh greenery in such close proximity? 'Tis passing strange.

source: There are few things more breathtaking than autumnal leaves...even if they are out of season. The influence of a treasure, I suspect.
target: There are few things more breathtaking than autumnal leaves...even if they are out of season. The influence of a treasure, I suspect.

source: I understand you adventurers enjoy the roads less traveled, but─ And there <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> goes. Courage, Hancock!
target: I understand you adventurers enjoy the roads less traveled, but─ And there <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> goes. Courage, Hancock!

source: Such a tranquil place, these mountain heights. By the look of it, I presume it is not a path that many tread.
target: Such a tranquil place, these mountain heights. By the look of it, I presume it is not a path that many tread.

source: Hmm... 'Tis not the first of those stones we've encountered. Do they serve as shrines of some sort?
target: Hmm... 'Tis not the first of those stones we've encountered. Do they serve as shrines of some sort?

source: No shrine is built without purpose...or so I have heard. If such is the case, then what might this one be for?
target: No shrine is built without purpose...or so I have heard. If such is the case, then what might this one be for?

source: Oho! I knew from the first that the dogu was meant for something greater.
target: Oho! I knew from the first that the dogu was meant for something greater.

source: I, for one, have <var 1A 02 /var>naught but respect<var 1A 01 /var> for our new clay comrade! ...Do you think it can hear us?
target: I, for one, have <var 1A 02 /var>naught but respect<var 1A 01 /var> for our new clay comrade! ...Do you think it can hear us?

source: The warding talismans on this boulder give me pause...but it shall serve as well as any bridge, I suppose.
target: The warding talismans on this boulder give me pause...but it shall serve as well as any bridge, I suppose.

source: One cannot go wrong with a rustic log bridge─assuming the trunk is free of angry spirits, of course...
target: One cannot go wrong with a rustic log bridge─assuming the trunk is free of angry spirits, of course...

source: Gods be good! I know not how, but the statue has awakened...and it did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> wake on the right side of the proverbial bed!
target: Gods be good! I know not how, but the statue has awakened...and it did <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> wake on the right side of the proverbial bed!

source: Just a moment─I have read of this before! If I am not mistaken, that mononoke is Shishio, king among nue!
target: Just a moment─I have read of this before! If I am not mistaken, that mononoke is Shishio, king among nue!

source: Even a king of beasts is no match for you, I see! Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: Even a king of beasts is no match for you, I see! Well done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: The most, in a word, <var 1A 02 /var>vivid<var 1A 01 /var> Shishio myth tells of its ravenous rampage across the countryside. It had quite the appetite for mortal flesh!
target: The most, in a word, <var 1A 02 /var>vivid<var 1A 01 /var> Shishio myth tells of its ravenous rampage across the countryside. It had quite the appetite for mortal flesh!

source: 'Tis also said that its harrowing cry is a harbinger of misfortune, but I say we should consider ourselves lucky to have chanced upon a living legend.
target: 'Tis also said that its harrowing cry is a harbinger of misfortune, but I say we should consider ourselves lucky to have chanced upon a living legend.

source: As for what freed it of its lithic bonds... Perhaps the revelry of its fellow mononoke roused its fighting spirit.
target: As for what freed it of its lithic bonds... Perhaps the revelry of its fellow mononoke roused its fighting spirit.

source: Alas, the beast held no treasures of Gorai's, but fret not─I shall make do with what we have here and claim a suitable souvenir.
target: Alas, the beast held no treasures of Gorai's, but fret not─I shall make do with what we have here and claim a suitable souvenir.

source: Though our hike was fraught with peril, 'twas exhilarating in equal measure! You have my thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: Though our hike was fraught with peril, 'twas exhilarating in equal measure! You have my thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: A deed fit for legend! Quite literally, for Shishio appears in countless Hingan myths.
target: A deed fit for legend! Quite literally, for Shishio appears in countless Hingan myths.

source: One, in fact, tells of a wayfaring warrior who triumphed over it long ago.
target: One, in fact, tells of a wayfaring warrior who triumphed over it long ago.

source: As such, I was aware that its harrowing cry could warp the very earth...but to see it firsthand is a wholly different beast, I'm sure you agree.
target: As such, I was aware that its harrowing cry could warp the very earth...but to see it firsthand is a wholly different beast, I'm sure you agree.

source: Though the creature bore none of Gorai's treasures, we can take comfort in the knowledge that it will terrorize Lord Uzumibi's people no more.
target: Though the creature bore none of Gorai's treasures, we can take comfort in the knowledge that it will terrorize Lord Uzumibi's people no more.

source: ...And in the no less valuable artifacts we've spotted over the course of our journey to the summit, naturally.
target: ...And in the no less valuable artifacts we've spotted over the course of our journey to the summit, naturally.

source: All that remains is to carry the spoils to our waiting falcons. I trust I can count on you?
target: All that remains is to carry the spoils to our waiting falcons. I trust I can count on you?

source: That is one mononoke felled─though if the legends are to be believed, Shishio is a wholly different beast than its tsukumogami brethren.
target: That is one mononoke felled─though if the legends are to be believed, Shishio is a wholly different beast than its tsukumogami brethren.

source: It came to the mountain long before Gorai's time─was sealed here by the very founder of Shojo Temple, in fact.
target: It came to the mountain long before Gorai's time─was sealed here by the very founder of Shojo Temple, in fact.

source: 'Tis enough to make one wonder if that boulder we felled did not possess some greater significance...
target: 'Tis enough to make one wonder if that boulder we felled did not possess some greater significance...

source: But let us turn from that dark path, and instead appreciate the sacred scenery before us! Breathtaking, is it not?
target: But let us turn from that dark path, and instead appreciate the sacred scenery before us! Breathtaking, is it not?

source: ...Do let me know if you spy any artifacts of value. I should like something to commemorate this trek.
target: ...Do let me know if you spy any artifacts of value. I should like something to commemorate this trek.

source: You, of course, must have my sincerest thanks for making the perilous climb!
target: You, of course, must have my sincerest thanks for making the perilous climb!

source: A harrowing display! Such ferocity have I rarely seen!
target: A harrowing display! Such ferocity have I rarely seen!

source: And Shishio was quite fearsome as well. It puts me in the mind of the Western chimera.
target: And Shishio was quite fearsome as well. It puts me in the mind of the Western chimera.

source: Yet of all that I have seen today, I am most taken with the dogu. I admit, I had my doubts...but to restore life to nature is no common feat.
target: Yet of all that I have seen today, I am most taken with the dogu. I admit, I had my doubts...but to restore life to nature is no common feat.

source: I should like to take it back to Kugane. On the off chance it is sentient, we must hope it sees fit to forgive my earlier misgivings.
target: I should like to take it back to Kugane. On the off chance it is sentient, we must hope it sees fit to forgive my earlier misgivings.

source: Our risks thus far have paid fine dividends, and I have you to thank for it. You have my utmost gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: Our risks thus far have paid fine dividends, and I have you to thank for it. You have my utmost gratitude, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: You have done well to forestall your fate... But your end is come!
target: You have done well to forestall your fate... But your end is come!

source: The chorus of steel rings eternal!
target: The chorus of steel rings eternal!

source: Mark where the armor readies its blade─though it has quite a reach, it cannot strike everywhere at once!
target: Mark where the armor readies its blade─though it has quite a reach, it cannot strike everywhere at once!

source: Could this be an accursed treasure, I wonder? That blade in the box we encountered was rather suspicious as well...
target: Could this be an accursed treasure, I wonder? That blade in the box we encountered was rather suspicious as well...

source: A sorry attempt at an ambush, if you ask me...but let us continue on.
target: A sorry attempt at an ambush, if you ask me...but let us continue on.

source: Arrive on the landfast floe
target: Arrive on the landfast floe

source: Clear the landfast floe
target: Clear the landfast floe

source: Arrive in Cyancap Cavern
target: Arrive in Cyancap Cavern

source: Clear Cyancap Cavern
target: Clear Cyancap Cavern

source: Arrive in the Deep Below
target: Arrive in the Deep Below

source: Defeat the Octomammoth
target: Defeat the Octomammoth

source: If you would oppose our crusade, then come!
target: If you would oppose our crusade, then come!

source: But know that none shall deny us salvation.
target: But know that none shall deny us salvation.

source: I will free us from the wheel!
target: I will free us from the wheel!

source: I will suffer no obstacles!
target: I will suffer no obstacles!

source: You wretch!
target: You wretch!

source: Such is your power?
target: Such is your power?

source: No matter the foe, I will stay the course...
target: No matter the foe, I will stay the course...

source: Look to the heavens for your doom!
target: Look to the heavens for your doom!

source: Ware my rime-kissed blades!
target: Ware my rime-kissed blades!

source: A raging gale to rend you asunder!
target: A raging gale to rend you asunder!

source: This place shall be your tomb!
target: This place shall be your tomb!

source: Let lightning surge!
target: Let lightning surge!

source: Come forth, my servant of shadow!
target: Come forth, my servant of shadow!

source: Dragon! Hear me and obey!
target: Dragon! Hear me and obey!

source: With abyssal dark and hero's blade, I bring my people liberation!
target: With abyssal dark and hero's blade, I bring my people liberation!

source: You shall know true terror!
target: You shall know true terror!

source: Crush them!
target: Crush them!

source: Begone!
target: Begone!

source: Bathe them in black flame!
target: Bathe them in black flame!

source: Render unto me your all!
target: Render unto me your all!

source: My meteors will extinguish your Light!
target: My meteors will extinguish your Light!

source: Our salvation is at hand!
target: Our salvation is at hand!

source: I am Asura, and on battle I thrive.
target: I am Asura, and on battle I thrive.

source: Have you the courage and strength to face me?
target: Have you the courage and strength to face me?

source: Will you dodge or will you bleed?
target: Will you dodge or will you bleed?

source: You've not time to blink!
target: You've not time to blink!

source: Tremble before the might of the Manusya!
target: Tremble before the might of the Manusya!

source: Come forth, embodiment of carnage!
target: Come forth, embodiment of carnage!

source: Revel on the bloody field of war!
target: Revel on the bloody field of war!

source: The spirit of battle awakens!
target: The spirit of battle awakens!

source: Behold the sixfold blade!
target: Behold the sixfold blade!

source: The face of battle is ever changing...
target: The face of battle is ever changing...

source: The frail shall fall!
target: The frail shall fall!

source: The weak shall perish!
target: The weak shall perish!

source: Show me your steel!
target: Show me your steel!

source: I am unrelenting!
target: I am unrelenting!

source: I will scatter your bones!
target: I will scatter your bones!

source: Defeat Athena
target: Defeat Athena

source: Show me your all, that I might become divinity manifest!
target: Show me your all, that I might become divinity manifest!

source: From nothing, I mold life!
target: From nothing, I mold life!

source: These chains are forged from the fabric of creation!
target: These chains are forged from the fabric of creation!

source: To silent vessels, I give voice!
target: To silent vessels, I give voice!

source: This is but a glimpse of a god's strength!
target: This is but a glimpse of a god's strength!

source: Behold such power as you will never wield!
target: Behold such power as you will never wield!

source: From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble!
target: From the deepest pit of the seven hells to the pinnacle of the heavens, the world shall tremble!

source: Such a singularly resolute soul...
target: Such a singularly resolute soul...

source: You cannot escape my eternal gaze.
target: You cannot escape my eternal gaze.

source: Shine brilliant for me!
target: Shine brilliant for me!

source: Today, my theories shall be proven as fact!
target: Today, my theories shall be proven as fact!

source: Miscalculations are inevitable...but vexing.
target: Miscalculations are inevitable...but vexing.

source: What arrogance to defy a god!
target: What arrogance to defy a god!

source: Could my theories have been flawed...?
target: Could my theories have been flawed...?

source: Although I wished so ardently...
target: Although I wished so ardently...

source: But perhaps...with the Heart of Sabik!
target: But perhaps...with the Heart of Sabik!

source: Yes... The flaws are not mine...
target: Yes... The flaws are not mine...

source: This misbegotten world is to blame...
target: This misbegotten world is to blame...

source: Only the hands of a god can fix it─my hands!
target: Only the hands of a god can fix it─my hands!

source: I can create worlds─or unmake them!
target: I can create worlds─or unmake them!

source: Only I can guide this star to its rightful place!
target: Only I can guide this star to its rightful place!

source: The heavens bend to my will!
target: The heavens bend to my will!

source: Denizens of the abyss! From ink of blackest night, I summon you!
target: Denizens of the abyss! From ink of blackest night, I summon you!

source: Misfortune hangs heavy on the prideful. Poor cover for when the heavens fall.
target: Misfortune hangs heavy on the prideful. Poor cover for when the heavens fall.

source: From base elements is greatness forged!
target: From base elements is greatness forged!

source: The wheel of life turns by my hand!
target: The wheel of life turns by my hand!

source: The elements flow according to my design.
target: The elements flow according to my design.

source: Creation's course is mine to set!
target: Creation's course is mine to set!

source: A god's will cannot be disobeyed!
target: A god's will cannot be disobeyed!

source: This world must be made anew!
target: This world must be made anew!

source: I will not be denied!
target: I will not be denied!

source: Why do you suffer this pathetic existence!?
target: Why do you suffer this pathetic existence!?

source: I...I am infallible...
target: I...I am infallible...

source: Why...does this world persist?
target: Why...does this world persist?

source: Why...do <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> persist?
target: Why...do <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> persist?

source: Defeat Themis
target: Defeat Themis

source: My heart quivers in anticipation!
target: My heart quivers in anticipation!

source: Now to take your measure...
target: Now to take your measure...

source: Will Light embrace, or Darkness consume?
target: Will Light embrace, or Darkness consume?

source: I learned this technique from a dear friend!
target: I learned this technique from a dear friend!

source: The balance must needs be maintained...
target: The balance must needs be maintained...

source: Submit to the emissary's judgment!
target: Submit to the emissary's judgment!

source: These magicks are not for you to wield!
target: These magicks are not for you to wield!

source: Emet-Selch himself could do no better!
target: Emet-Selch himself could do no better!

source: Warriors forged in my own image!
target: Warriors forged in my own image!

source: I must fashion more robust champions...
target: I must fashion more robust champions...

source: How transcendent, the flames of battle!
target: How transcendent, the flames of battle!

source: I am the emissary, and I shall never die!
target: I am the emissary, and I shall never die!

source: Will you be judged worthy to exist?
target: Will you be judged worthy to exist?

source: Long have I dreamed of the day that we match wits...
target: Long have I dreamed of the day that we match wits...

source: But every dream must come to an end!
target: But every dream must come to an end!

source: Defeat Pandæmonium
target: Defeat Pandæmonium

source: You will go no further!
target: You will go no further!

source: Like a spider, I spin my web...
target: Like a spider, I spin my web...

source: Webs like unto chains!
target: Webs like unto chains!

source: A tangled morsel awaiting death...
target: A tangled morsel awaiting death...

source: This prison offers no escape...
target: This prison offers no escape...

source: I am Pandæmonium, and these cells are mine!
target: I am Pandæmonium, and these cells are mine!

source: I must watch over all life...
target: I must watch over all life...

source: All paths lead back to me!
target: All paths lead back to me!

source: These bars are unbreakable!
target: These bars are unbreakable!

source: Your punishment shall be unending!
target: Your punishment shall be unending!

source: I offer a glimpse of Lady Athena's power!
target: I offer a glimpse of Lady Athena's power!

source: I'll give you special cells!
target: I'll give you special cells!

source: Stay where you are!
target: Stay where you are!

source: To the depths with you!
target: To the depths with you!

source: For Athena... For Mother!
target: For Athena... For Mother!

source: I mustn't disappoint Lady Athena!
target: I mustn't disappoint Lady Athena!

source: Bare yourselves to me!
target: Bare yourselves to me!

source: Your soul screams!
target: Your soul screams!

source: This vessel can be so much more!
target: This vessel can be so much more!

source: Enemy power boost in:
target: Enemy power boost in:

source: You dare stand before the great and all-powerful Goldor!?
target: You dare stand before the great and all-powerful Goldor!?

source: Impressive... But you are still no match for the power of my crystal!
target: Impressive... But you are still no match for the power of my crystal!

source: O crystal, I beseech you─lend me strength to smite my foes!
target: O crystal, I beseech you─lend me strength to smite my foes!

source: Yes! The power courses through me!
target: Yes! The power courses through me!

source: Hmph! I will not be bested so easily!
target: Hmph! I will not be bested so easily!

source: So long as the crystal's light holds strong, so too shall I!
target: So long as the crystal's light holds strong, so too shall I!

source: Clear Aloalo Island
target: Clear Aloalo Island

source: Clear the Sands of Morn
target: Clear the Sands of Morn

source: Defeat Ketuduke
target: Defeat Ketuduke

source: Clear the Roots of Gloam
target: Clear the Roots of Gloam

source: Defeat the lala
target: Defeat the lala

source: Defeat Statice
target: Defeat Statice

source: Look, three paths forward. Which one should we take?
target: Look, three paths forward. Which one should we take?

target: Это... меня... не удержит!

source: My thanks.
target: Спасибо.

source:
...On your guard.
He means to unleash hell!
target:
...Берегись!
Он готовит адскую волну!

source:
すべてを潰すつもりか！？
あのまま、振り下ろさせるわけには……！
target:
すべてを潰すつもりか！？
あのまま、振り下ろさせるわけには……！

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: Still in the fight?
target: Всё ещё на ногах?

source:
These blades, they're feeding him power...
But not if we break them!
target:
Эти клинки, они усиливают его...
Нужно сломать их!

source:
Still with me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
Let's finish this!
target:
Со мной, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
Покончим с этим!

source: Stay sharp─you can evade the worst of his blows!
target: Соберись — каким бы ни был удар, ты можешь уворачиваться!

source:
Well done.
Now it's your turn!
target:
Отлично.
Теперь твоя очередь!

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, no!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, нет!

source: I've failed...
target: Я не смог...

source:
There's too damn many!
We cannot rely on steel alone...
target:
Их слишком много!
Одна сталь тут не поможет...

source:
Just a few more, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
We leave none standing!
target:
Ещё немного, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
Пусть знает, с кем связался!

source: From dreams of endless Dark, I awaken.
target: From dreams of endless Dark, I awaken.

source: O stifled Darkness in moon abiding...
target: O stifled Darkness in moon abiding...

source: Coalesce and consume creation!
target: Coalesce and consume creation!

source: My Darkness shall devour all Light.
target: My Darkness shall devour all Light.

source: You shall know no hope, nor salvation!
target: You shall know no hope, nor salvation!

source: I shall rend the very walls of reality!
target: I shall rend the very walls of reality!

source: Further! I must go further!
target: Further! I must go further!

source: Beyond the veil my home doth lie...
target: Beyond the veil my home doth lie...

source: What is this place? Wherefore am I here?
target: What is this place? Wherefore am I here?

source: Stand aside, I beseech you.
target: Stand aside, I beseech you.

source: I wish but to return home.
target: I wish but to return home.

source: In my memory the stars yet shine, attending the moon...
target: In my memory the stars yet shine, attending the moon...

source: Bright as stars in the night.
target: Bright as stars in the night.

source: Her will...<var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> will...shall not be denied.
target: Her will...<var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> will...shall not be denied.

source: The time is come to rejoin the great flow.
target: The time is come to rejoin the great flow.

source: By my power shall all know salvation!
target: By my power shall all know salvation!

source: To the last you would deny my heart's desire...
target: To the last you would deny my heart's desire...

source: Your flesh shall melt and seethe!
target: Your flesh shall melt and seethe!

source: Begone, contemptible Light!
target: Begone, contemptible Light!

source: This world is beyond salvation.
target: This world is beyond salvation.

source: 'Tis time to set forth─for warmth and radiance!
target: 'Tis time to set forth─for warmth and radiance!

source: Your souls are mine!
target: Your souls are mine!

source: Ah, the Darkness! It riseth!
target: Ah, the Darkness! It riseth!

source: All are as one in Darkness.
target: All are as one in Darkness.

source: Be at peace in oblivion.
target: Be at peace in oblivion.

source: In Darkness be steeped.
target: In Darkness be steeped.

source: At the heart of primordial Darkness...
target: At the heart of primordial Darkness...

source: The kindling of life's spark...
target: The kindling of life's spark...

source: The glory of creation!
target: The glory of creation!

source: Oh, to look upon such splendor once more...
target: Oh, to look upon such splendor once more...

source: Return to me, my beloved star!
target: Return to me, my beloved star!

source: All who oppose me shall be consigned to nothingness.
target: All who oppose me shall be consigned to nothingness.

source: In endless Dark embrace your end.
target: In endless Dark embrace your end.
